name: 1964 Car Bomb
instructions: Pour the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a beer mug filled with Budweiser, and serve.

name: 2000 Flushes
instructions: Combine the Captain Morgan Original spiced rum and Parrot Bay mango rum in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao, shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add Sprite and lemonade, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay mango rum

name: 209 East Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

ingredients.name: Marie Brizard® Creme de Fraise des Bois

name: 3 for a Dollar Special
instructions:
Boil the sugar and water in a bowl. Chill for 20 minutes.

Add the chopped mangos, along vodka, triple sec and two limes to a blender with 40 ice cubes. Blend, add the water and sugar mixture, and blend again. Serve in your glass of choice.

name: 4 Godfathers
description: 4 Godfathers originated at a private 21st birthday party in the Hudson Valley during the Summer of 1993.Pour the whiskeys and tequila into a whiskey sour glass, stir gently, and serve. Alternatively, pour the whiskeys and tequila over 2 ice cubes, stir, and serve.
instructions: Pour the whiskeys and tequila into a whiskey sour glass, stir gently, and serve. Alternatively, pour the whiskeys and tequila over 2 ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: 414SS Daiquiri
description: A typically strong 151-rum mix. The 414SS Daiquiri works best after a few reqular Daiquiris.Add daiquiri mix and the required amount of ice stated on the packet to a blender. Add the Bacardi light rum and then the Bacardi 151. Splash in some more 151 if desired. Blend together for a few seconds, and pour into cocktail glasses. Attempt to drink.
instructions: Add daiquiri mix and the required amount of ice stated on the packet to a blender. Add the Bacardi light rum and then the Bacardi 151. Splash in some more 151 if desired. Blend together for a few seconds, and pour into cocktail glasses. Attempt to drink.

name: 57 Chevy
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice, and serve.

name: 5th Avenue
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old fashioned glass, straight up or on the rocks, and serve.

name: 6 Wise Men
instructions: Pour all 6 whiskeys into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes, and serve.

name: 73 Bus
instructions: Mix all three ingredients with ice in a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: 73 Bus #2
instructions: Pour the gin, triple sec and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour straight into a cocktail glass. Unsweetened cranberry juice is best if you don't like sweet drinks.

name: 8th Birthday
instructions: Add all ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker, shake, and pour into a martini glass.

name: A Brain Teaser
instructions: Shake everything with ice and pour into glass with a couple of ice cubes.

name: A Joy of Almond
instructions: Pour the kahlua into a chilled rocks glass. Carefully layer the amaretto and creme de almond on top.

name: A Kissed Buttery Nipple
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with 4 or 5 cubes of ice. Pour the whole thing into a glass and add cherries.

name: A Little Dick'll Do
instructions: Pour the George Dickel into the glass. Top off with Mountain Dew, and serve.

name: A Monkey's Rum Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Garnish rim of glass with shredded coconut. Strain into glass and serve.

name: A Nap at Charlie's
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail / martini glass, garnish with Tang around the rim and serve.

name: A Night At Naughty Nikki's
instructions: Place the skittles, or other fruity chewy candy in the bottom of a shot glass then pour 7-up and vodka.

name: A Night In Georgia
instructions: Mix the two in a shot glass and let them seperate before drinking.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay pineapple rum

name: A Pimp Named Slickback
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a goblet with a sugared rim. Hold up to light and swirl contemplatively.

name: A Popular Guy
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass.

name: A Roa
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker, shake 3 - 4 times and strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: A True Amaretto Sour
instructions: Rub the rim of an old-fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim. Shake amaretto with lemon juice, and strain into the glass; over ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: A Very Berry Surprise
instructions: Thoroughly mix all ingredients in a blender to make a smoothie. Serve in a classic margarita glass. Garnish with either cherry, raspberries, strawberries, or all!

name: A-Bomb
instructions: Build this drink over ice and stir. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

name: A. F. Tini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: A. J.
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: A. J.
instructions: Shake ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Strain into cocktail glass and serve.

name: A1 Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, Grand Marnier, lemon juice and grenadine over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Abbey Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: ABC Pousse Cafe
instructions: Pour into a pousse-cafe or cordial glass, in order; amaretto, bailey's irish cream, and cointreau.

name: Abe's Tropical Night in Hell
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and stir. Add ice. Then enjoy your night in Hell!

name: Aberfoyle
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Abigail
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Abortion
instructions: Pour the creme de cacao into a shot glass. Layer the amaretto and then the bailey's to create a 3 layer drink. Insert a toothpick to the bottom of the shot glass and dribble some grenadine so it floats in the bottom of the glass.

name: Abracadabra
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Abrupt Realization
instructions: Pour into glass, stir and enjoy.

name: Absent Friend
instructions: Shake well and strain into a cordial glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Absinthe Cocktail
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Absinthe Curacao Frappe
instructions: Stir ingredients and pour over crushed ice in a deep-saucer champagne glass. Add an orange slice.

name: Absinthe Drip
instructions: Add absinthe and one large cube of ice to an old-fashioned glass. Place an absinthe spoon across the top of the glass with the sugar on it, and pour drops of water onto the spoon. The water will drop through the holes in the absinthe spoon.

name: Absinthe Flip
instructions: Shake ingredients well with ice. Strain into a prechilled Delmonico glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Absinthe Martini
instructions: Stir well with ice. Strain into a prechilled cocktail glass. Very pleasant with an onion stuffed olive. Some bartenders pour a soucon of Absinthe into the glass, swirl it around and then add the martini.

name: Absinthe Minded Martini
instructions: Properly chill 1 cocktail glass. In mixing glass with ice, pour gin and absinthe, and stir. In your cocktail glass, roll 1/2 oz of dry vermouth and throw away the excess. Strain other ingredients into cocktail glass and float 1/2 oz of grand marnier over top. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Absinthe Olde-style
description: This is as close to the original Absinthe as you can get. Absente is very similar, but substitutes "Southern Wormwood" -- which is thujone free -- so it can be sold legally anywhere. Wormwood extract is safe in moderation, and is also legal. Mixing with ice and sugar produces a proper "louche", as per the original preparation method, which entailed pouring iced water over sugar cubes set on a slotted spoon balanced over one's glass of Absinthe -- the shaker method works better, and is less complex.Pour the Absente liqueur (legal to import), granulated sugar, and 20 drops (approx 1/2 tsp) liquid wormwood extract (available from many health food stores -- Herb Pharm is a good choice) into a shaker with ice. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Absente liqueur (legal to import), granulated sugar, and 20 drops (approx 1/2 tsp) liquid wormwood extract (available from many health food stores -- Herb Pharm is a good choice) into a shaker with ice. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Absinthe Suissesse
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Absinthtini
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Absolut Dream
instructions: Pour Absolut Mandrin into a cocktail/martini shaker. Add sweet and sour mix, and Chambord raspberry liqueur. Rim a cocktail glass with sugar. Shake and strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange, and serve.

name: Absolut Evergreen
instructions: Mix, pour over ice and top with bitter lemon.

name: Absolut Hunk
instructions: Pour the Absolut Vanilia vodka over ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Add the gomme syrup, fresh lime juice and a splash of pineapple juice. Shake or stir well. Strain into a chilled martini glass, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Absolut Manx Whore
description: Invented by Marcus J., a bartender at The Plant in north Idaho, the Absolut Manx Whore was created for his onetime love interest, Anna C., a student from the Isle of Man.  The drink has become quite popular at The Plant, as patrons share in his sweet tasting homage to Anna, an absolute Manx whore.Build the drink in a beer mug or mason jar filled with ice.  If served to a Manx woman, add a dash or two of bitters.
instructions: Build the drink in a beer mug or mason jar filled with ice.  If served to a Manx woman, add a dash or two of bitters.

name: Absolut Redhead
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Absolut Reese's
instructions: Spoon ice cream into a blender, pouring vodka and rum over it. Blend together, gradually adding ice until desired thickness. Serve in large party cups. Garnish w/ peanut butter cup optional.

name: Absolut Royal Fuck
instructions: Chill in tumbler, shake, and serve up in a rocks glass.

name: Absolut Santo
instructions: Fill mixing glass with ice. Add vodka and Chambord. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Absolut Sex
instructions:
Shake Absolut Kurant, Midori, and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice.

Strain into a rocks glass with a splash of seven on top.

name: Absolut Trouble
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Absolute Vacation
instructions: Shake everything with ice; pour into glass filled with ice.

name: Absolutely Bananas
instructions: Shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Absolutely Heaven
instructions: Pour Absolut Citron, Hypnotiq, Malibu, and Pineapple Juice into shaker. Shake. Add Blue Curacao for color....just a splash! Pour into chilled martini glass and garnish with a lemon wedge on the rim of the glass.

name: AC Lime
instructions: Pour ingredients into a old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir.

name: Acapulco
instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: Acapulco Clam Digger
instructions: Mix over cracked ice in an lowball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon. Note: you can substitute Clamato juice (6 oz.) for the tomato juice and the clam juice.

name: Acapulco Dream Cream
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a cocktail glass. Dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Acapulcoco
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Accordion
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ace Ventura
instructions: Take a large chilled cocktail glass and fill it 1/4 full with ice, and top to 3/4 full with sprite. Add the vodka, rum and tequila. Fill the glass with the flavored sambucas in layers. Garnish with an umbrella and serve with a bendable straw.

name: Acid Trip
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Adam
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Adam and Eve
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Adam Sunrise
instructions: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with bartons vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.

name: Addison Special
instructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.

name: Admiral
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Admiral Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Adonis Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Adult Hot Chocolate
instructions: Warm your mug first, it makes the drink stay warmer longer. Put the schnapps into your mug, and fill it with hot chocolate. Top with whipped cream, and chocolate shavings are good too!

name: Affinity
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Afghan Monkey
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: African Breeze
instructions: Cover rim of glass with brown sugar. Fill glass with crushed ice. Pour cointreau over ice, followed by amarula cream. Add garnish.

name: After Dinner Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: After Dinner Mint
instructions: Shack vigorously and serve.

name: After Five #2
instructions: Add the vodka, Bailey's irish cream and 7-up to an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: After Glo
instructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass.

name: After Supper Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Afterburner #3
instructions: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Agave Suave
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Agent Provocateur
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime or cherry.

name: Aggravation
instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice, then add Scotch and Kahlua. Float cream on top and stir.

name: Agincourt Cocktail
instructions: Pour vermouths, amaretto and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Agua de Valencia
instructions: Put all ingredients in a pitcher. The Cava can be very cold.

name: Alabama
instructions: Put everything into shaker with ice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Alabama Afterburner
description: Alabama Afterburner requires Buffalo Rock Ginger Ale specifically--it's much spicier than your regular ginger ales. Unfortunately, you can only get it in Alabama.Put a shot of Captain in the bottom of a glass, then pour in the can of Buffalo Rock. Drink.
instructions: Put a shot of Captain in the bottom of a glass, then pour in the can of Buffalo Rock. Drink.

name: Aladdin Sane
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice. Shake, allow to chill for 5 minutes, re-shake, and pour into a martini glass.

name: Alaine Cocktail
instructions: Combine the Bacardi Limon rum, amaretto and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Alaska
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Alaska Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Alaskan Oil Slick
instructions: Layer blue curacao on bottom, peppermint schnapps in the middle, and Jager on top.

name: Alaskan Oil Spill
instructions: Shake Curacao and Rumple Minze together, let chill and pour into a snifter. Layer the Jagermeister on top and drink like a shot.

name: Alaskan Orange
instructions: Blend briefly with a half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a goblet with grated orange zest, chocolate and nutmeg.

name: Albert 2000
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked/broken ice. Add a maraschino cherry.

name: Albino Russian
instructions: Pour the vanilla vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

name: Albus Dumbledore
instructions: Rim cocktail glass with lemon juice and powdered sugar. Add vodka and lemon juice.

name: Alcudla
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of grapefruit peel.

name: Alexander
instructions: Shake all on Ice and strain into a Cocktail Glass.

name: Alexander Baby
instructions: Pour the dark rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the creme de cacao and double cream. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg on top, and serve.

name: Alexander Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Alexander Cocktail #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Alexander The Great
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

name: Alexander Young
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Alexander's Big Brother
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Alexander's Sister
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, creme de menthe, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Alexandra #2
instructions: Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer.

name: Alexi's Spicy Bloody Mary
instructions: Add vodka, sauces, pickle juice and brine to a mug full of ice. Fill with tomato juice. Add salt, pepper and celery salt to taste. Pour mixture back and fourth between two glasses to mix it well. Garnish with olives, a pickle and a slice of lime.

name: Alfie Cocktail
instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Alfonso Special
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Alfredo
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Use 1 to 2 ounces as you prefer.

name: Algebra
instructions: Combine with ice in a cocktail shaker, strain and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Algonquin
instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Algonquin Bar Punch
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with cracked ice. Add an orange slice or a cherry.

name: Alhambra
instructions: Make the cocoa in an irish coffee cup and add the cognac.

name: Alice in Wonderland
instructions: Combine all three ingredients in equal parts in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Alien Booger
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Alize and Hpno
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice in a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Alize Bleu Bling Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients together with a few ice cubes and serve straight up with a twist of lemon in a cocktail glass.

name: Alize Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Alize Emerald
instructions: Combine both ingredients in equal parts in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Alize Martini
instructions: Mix in a martini glass.

name: All American
instructions: Serve with two ice-cubes. You can vary the amount of coca-cola depending on how soft you want your drink to be.

name: All Killer with No Filler
instructions: Place beer, lager and Tequila into a cocktail shaker and shake for 10-15 seconds. Then pour into a pre-chilled beer glass. Then add the whipped cream on the top and volla!

name: All Plucked Up
instructions: Add ice, orange juice, lime juice, pineapple juice, dark rum and coconut rum to a shaker. Shake until very chilled and blended. Strain out ice as you pour the remaining contents into a cocktail glass (looks great in a martini glass). Add grenadine. Use one slice of orange to decorate glass rim.

name: All White Frappe
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Allegheny
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Allen Cocktail
instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Alliance
instructions: Shake everything in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes.

name: Allied Requirements
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Allies Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Allietini
instructions: Rim cocktail glass with sugar and set aside. Add Ketel One and Chambord to a mixer with ice, shake vigorously, and pour into glass. Garnish with small lemon peel if desired. Drink by sipping on sugar. Rotate glass with each sip so that sugar is always obtained with drink. You should have finished the sugar when you've finished the drink.

name: Alligator
instructions: Fill glass half way with ice. Add o.j. and Midori and give a little stir.

name: Alligator Piss
instructions: Shake, strain into glass.

name: Allison's Purple Nurple
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker and strain into glass.

name: Almeria
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Almond Casa Noble
instructions: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, except almond, then strain into a cocktail glass. Drop lime in glass.

name: Almond Cocktail
instructions: Warm the gin up in a mixing glass and add the brandy, the sugar syrup and 6 almond slivers. Chill. When needed, pour the chilled mixture over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Stir in the remaining ingredients.

name: Almond Fog
instructions: Mix the Amaretto and Bailey's together in a cocktail shaker; strain into a coffee mug. Add milk to taste/to fill the mug, and serve.

name: Almond Grove
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Almond Joy
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Almond Joy #3
instructions: Measure in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass, and serve.

name: Aloe
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-full of ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Aloha
instructions: Shake with ice cubes and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Alternatini
instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sweetened cocoa powder and garnish with a hershey's kiss.

name: Amade
instructions: Shake with three or four ice cubes in a cocktail shaker, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Amalfi Dream
instructions: Pour vodka, the juice from half a lemon and Limoncello into a shaker filled with ice. Add 5 fresh mint leaves and shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Pour into chilled cocktail glass and enjoy.

name: Amalyzer
instructions: Shake the amarula cream, vodka and coffee liqueur together in a  cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top up with cola, and serve.

name: Amaretto 151
instructions: Pour amaretto, sweet and sour mix, and bacardi into a cocktail shaker. Shake and serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Amaretto Alexander
instructions: Combine liquers in shaker along with cream and ice. Shake and strain into a brandy snifter. Garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

name: Amaretto And Cream
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto Cherry Sour
instructions: Chill all ingredients before serving. Pour over crushed ice in a medium-sized cocktail glass, and stir well. Top with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Amaretto Chi-City
instructions: Mix Amaretto di Saronno in equal parts with E&J or if u choose a bit more E&J. Mix to your taste with sweet and sour mix in a shaker. Add ice and shake well. Pour into your favorite glass and watch for the hook - its real slow and tasty.

name: Amaretto Coffee
instructions: Very tasty! Put a shot of amaretto into a coffee mug and fill it up with coffee. A little whipped cream on top is the perfect garnish!

name: Amaretto Cola
instructions: Put some ice into a glass and pour a shot of amaretto over the ice. Then take the cola and pour it in to the glass and stir it together. Add the wedge of lemon on the rim of the glass and enjoy.

name: Amaretto Frappe
instructions: Add to a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Serve with short straws and a cherry.

name: Amaretto Freeze
instructions: Blend vanilla ice cream and amaretto in a blender until smooth. Pour into cocktail glass and add a cherry on top!

name: Amaretto Heartwarmer
instructions: Warm the southern comfort and add the almonds, peach and sugar. Stir. Allow to cool and add the vermouth and amaretto. Stir again and strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Amaretto Mist
instructions: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

name: Amaretto Shake
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Serve in chilled champagne saucer garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.

name: Amaretto Sombrero
instructions: Mix in lowball glass.

name: Amaretto Sour
instructions: Pour the amaretto liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add a splash or two of sweet and sour mix, and shake well. Strain or pour into an old-fashioned glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Amaretto Sour #3
instructions: Pour the amaretto, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a shaker two-thirds full of ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled sour glass. Garnish with the cherry, and serve.

name: Amaretto Spritzer
instructions: Take glass full of ice and add 3 oz. Amaretto. Fill with 7-up or sprite. Add a cherry for apperance. Mix. Yum Yum!

name: Amaretto Stinger
instructions: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto Sunrise
instructions: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

name: Amaretto Sunrise Crush
instructions: Blend orange juice, amaretto, grenadine and ice cubes in blender until smooth. Pour into margarita/coupette glass and add lemon juice.

name: Amarula Colada
instructions: Blend all ingredients with crushed ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Amber Dream
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass with ice and stir. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: Ambijaxtrious
instructions: Pour mixture into a cup filled with crushed ice and stir briskly.

name: Amer Picon Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amer Picon Punch
instructions: Fill old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in grenadine and Amer Picon. Fill glass with soda, leaving room for brandy. Float brandy on top of drink.

name: American Beauty
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, vermouth, creme de menthe, orange juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Pouring slowly and carefully, float the port on top.

name: American Flag Pousse Cafe
instructions: Layer in order in a pousse cafe glass.

name: American Grog
instructions: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with hot water. Stir.

name: American Woman
instructions: Shake everything with ice, strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Americum
instructions: Mix pina colada and rum separately. Pour grenadine over ice into glass, then layer the mixed pina colada/rum. Add curacao last.

name: Amerman's Specialty
instructions: Put 1 to 2 shots of Malibu Coconut Rum in a glass. Add crushed ice and fill the glass with pineapple juice.

name: Amethyst Mist
instructions: Shake the ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Amigo
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Amnesia
instructions: Combine both the watermelon and grape-flavored schnapps, Bacardi limon, orange juice and pineapple juice in an old-fashioned glass. Serve.

name: Amnesia #2
instructions: Mix the shots together completely, then pour soda in slowly enough to not cause fizzing. Enjoy the drink.

name: Amor de Cosmos
instructions: Shake rye, grenadine and cranberry juice with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add a splash each of ginger ale and club soda. Add a maraschino cherry.

name: Amsterdam
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour, unstrained, into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Amsterdamned
instructions: Add all the ingredients except the champagne to a cocktail shaker with some crushed ice. Shake well. Pour the champagne into a cocktail glass. Add the mixture, garnish it with some mint leaves, and serve.

name: Anaconda
instructions: Pour liquors on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Top with whipped cream, sprinkle with cayenne pepper, and serve.

name: Anchors Aweigh
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, triple sec, peach brandy, cherry brandy and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Andalusia
instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Andalusian Smile
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into an old-fashioned glass, three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Andrea's Colada Collision
instructions: Fill blender about 1/4 full with ice. Add all ingredients to blender. Blend to a smooth consistency. Serve in either a hurricane glass or a tall glass or goblet. Garnish with a pineapple spear is optional.

name: Andrej's Blue
instructions: Put a few ice cubes in the glass, then put blue curacao, gin and sprite. Do not shake and drink easy. Decorate with lemon slice.

name: Andy's Manhatten
instructions: Pour Canadian rye whiskey, Cointreau, sweet vermouth and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Stir ingredients together to chill. Strain over fresh ice in a cocktail glass, add an orange twist, and serve.

name: Anestesia
instructions: In a shaker glass put all ingredients and shake for 10 seconds. Then serve it in a coctail glass adding a piece of orange and a cherry.

name: Angel Face
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Angel Face
instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Angel's Delight
instructions: Shake well in a shaker filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Angel's Kiss
instructions: Pour ingredients carefully, in order given, into a pousse cafe glass so that they do not mix.

name: Angel's Kiss #2
instructions: Pour the vodka and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with an orange twist.

name: Angel's Lips
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Angel's Tip
instructions: Layer in a cordial glass, cream on top.

name: Angel's Tip #2
instructions: Layer in a cordial glass, cream on top. Spear a cherry with a cocktail pick, rest across the top of the glass, and serve.

name: Angel's Tit
instructions: Pour ingredients into glass in order given, carefully so each layer floats on top of the previous one with mixing. Chill for 1/2 hour before serving.

name: Angel's Treat
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and sprinkle grated chocolate on the surface.

name: Angel's Wing
instructions: Pour ingredients carefully, in order given, into a pousse cafe glass so that they do not mix. Serve without mixing.

name: Angela's Cantaloupe Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Angelfire
instructions: Pour 1/2 oz. of each; Stolichnaya Rasberi vodka, Absolut Mandrin vodka, Midori melon liqueur and Malibu coconut rum over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with equal amounts of cranberry juice, orange juice and pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Angler's Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, pour contents into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Angry Irishman
instructions: Pour Bailey's and whiskey over 3 cubes of ice and stir.

name: Angry Pirate
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps, coconut rum, Maui Blue Hawaiian schnapps, Melloni and pineapple juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with chilled 7-Up, garnish with lime, and serve.

name: Anisette Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain into a cordial glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Ankle Breaker
instructions: Combine all ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Ann Sheridan Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Bacardi rum, orange curacao and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Annabele Special
instructions: Mix with cracked ice in a mixing tin and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Annabelle Special
instructions: Pour the ingredients over cracked ice in a mixing glass. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ante
instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Anti-Freeze #4
instructions: Chill w/ ice cubes in shaker. Pour into rocks glass or split into two shots.

name: Antibes
instructions: Pour the gin, benedictine and grapefruit juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Antoine Special
instructions: Float vermouth on top of chilled Dubonnet in a red wine glass and serve.

name: Antoine's Lullaby
instructions: Pour dark rum, port, orange curacao and lemon juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass, garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Antoines Tarred Image
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Anton's Ecto Cooler
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

name: Anus Butter
instructions: Mix ingredients into a shooter.

name: Anzu
description: Bombay London dry gin is recommended for this drink; "anzu" is Japanese for apricot.Shake with ice; strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.
instructions: Shake with ice; strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apache
instructions: Layer the ingredients in a pousse-cafe glass in the following order: Kahlua, Bailey's, Melon Liqueur.

name: Apeach Martini
instructions: Add the first three ingredients into an iced shaker. Shake to the rhythm of your favorite summertime tune. Strain into a cocktail glass, and sink the grenadine to the bottom. Gently stir the grenadine up to give the drink a peach color, and serve.

name: Aperitivo
instructions: Pour gin, sambuca and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Aperol '86
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with strawberry.

name: Aperol Sour
instructions: Shake well over ice in a shaker. Strain into a sour glass, and serve.

name: Apollo 1
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice. Pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass,

name: Apollo 13
instructions: Pour the white rum, cream, Grand Marnier, Galliano and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a 5 oz champagne saucer or glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Apothecary
instructions: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Appalachia
instructions: Shake everything with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Appetizer
instructions: Pour the Dubonnet and orange juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Appian Way
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into the glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Apple a la Mode
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double cocktail glass with a sprig of mint.

name: Apple Batorade
instructions: Pour 6 oz. of the beer of your choice into a plastic beer cup. Next pour the 6 oz. of fruit punch or berry Gatorade in the cup. Finally add the 2 oz. of Apple Schnapps. Stir and drink. Best if served cold.

name: Apple Bee
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-full of ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Apple Blossom
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass almost-filled with ice. Stir, and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Apple Brandy Cocktail
instructions: Pour the apple brandy, grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apple Brandy Sour
instructions: Shake apple brandy, powdered sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with a half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Apple Car
instructions: Shake well over ice in a shaker. Strain into a sour glass, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Apple Cart
instructions: Pour the apple brandy, Cointreau and lemon juice into an old-fashioned (preferably chilled) glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Apple Coconut Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Shake and pour into an old fashioned glass over cracked ice and serve.

name: Apple Comfort
instructions: Add ingredients to a heatproof cup.

name: Apple Daiquiri
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker 1/3 full of ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Apple Dubonnet
instructions: Pour the apple brandy and Dubonnet into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass, garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Apple Eden
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old fashioned glass and stir. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Apple Fairy
instructions: For this recipe, make some apple juice ice cubes before you start. Then add 3 apple juice cubes to a cocktail glass. Add absinthe and apple vodka, and fill with cider.

name: Apple Grande
instructions: Chill both ingredients! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!

name: Apple Granny Crisp
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend well, and pour into a cocktail glass. Add whipped cream, dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Apple Jack
instructions: Blend ingredients in a mixing glass. Serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass.

name: Apple Jack (Original)
instructions: Mix in glass on the rocks.

name: Apple Jim
instructions: Blend ingredients together in a mixing glass. Serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass.

name: Apple Jolly Rancher
instructions: Chill in tumbler, shake. Serve up in rocks glass.

name: Apple Judy
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Serve without garnish in a cocktail glass.

name: Apple Kiss
instructions: Mix all, adding cream last.

name: Apple Manhattan
instructions: Stir the whiskey and liqueur in a mixing glass with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of apple, and serve.

name: Apple Martini
instructions: Poor all ingredients into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass.

name: Apple Martini #2
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apple Martini #3
instructions: Chill a champagne or cocktail glass. Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into glass and serve.

name: Apple Mash
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice into an old-fashioned glass and enjoy!

name: Apple Pie Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Apple Pie Cocktail #2
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Stir well, dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Apple Pie Cocktail #3
instructions: Build apple schnapps and cinnamon schnapps over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of apple, dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Apple Pie Margarita
instructions: Chill all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice. Rim the glass with cinnamon and sugar (liberally). Shake and strain into a margarita glass, there will be usually be a lot left in the tin, for seconds or thirds. Sauza tequila (a light tequila) is recommended for this cocktail. Enjoy, tastes just like sweet apple pie!

name: Apple Pie Martini
instructions: Pour the vanilla vodka, Calvados brandy and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a thin slice of apple, and serve.

name: Apple Pie With A Crust
instructions: Combine the apple juice and malibu rum in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle cloves or cinnamon on top, and serve; warm, or cold.

name: Apple Rouge
instructions: Pour both the Dubonnet wine and the Applejack brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apple Rum Cooler
instructions: Mix rum, brandy and lemon juice in a shaker half-full of ice cubes. Shake well and strain over ice cubes into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Apple Sharlotka
description: Tastes like grandma's apple pies, might also work as a hot drink if warmed.Combine the Zubrowka vodka with clear apple juice, to taste, and add ice. Stir but don't shake.
instructions: Combine the Zubrowka vodka with clear apple juice, to taste, and add ice. Stir but don't shake.

name: Apple Slut
instructions: Pour shots in glass and add Sprite to your taste.

name: Apple Toddy
instructions: Place the baked apple, sugar and applejack into a glass or mug. Fill the glass two-thirds full with boiling water, and grate a little nutmeg on top.

name: Applebottom Pimp
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff green apple twist into a cocktail glass, and add the Pimp juice energy drink.

name: Applecar
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Appled Rum Cooler
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, applejack, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda.

name: Applejack Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Applejack brandy, grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Applejack Cocktail #2
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Applejack Daisy
instructions: Pour Applejack brandy, lime juice, grenadine and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Applejack Manhattan
instructions: Pour the Applejack brandy, vermouth and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Apples and Oranges Martini
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a large pitcher with ice. Stir 50 times to properly dilute the drink and remove ice. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use. Pour into a chilled martini glasses. Garnish each with a twist of orange peel and an apple slice, and serve.

name: Appletini
instructions: Stir ingredients together with crushed ice in a cocktail/martini glass, and serve.

name: Appletini #2
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Appleton's Spiced Ice Tea
instructions: Pour 2 oz. Appleton Estates Jamaican Rum into a large glass or mug. Add Spices if desired. Add Lipton Brisk Ice Tea. If the drink is too strong for one's liking, use ice for an "on the rocks" version.

name: Apres Ski
instructions: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Serve with a slice of lime or mint sprig.

name: Apricot Babe
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Apricot Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apricot Crowfoot
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Apricot Crush
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice.

name: Apricot Jack
instructions: Pour two shots of Jack Daniels into a whiskey sour glass. Add one shot of Apricot Brandy. Combine with apricot nectar and sweet and sour mix. Top with a lemon, cherry, or orange slice. Stir, and serve.

name: Apricot Kiss
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy, Scotch whisky and sweet vermouth into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir gently and serve.

name: Apricot Lady
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Apricot Sour
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail glass half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Apricot Tree
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Apricot-Mango Martini
instructions: Muddle the fresh mango in the bottom of a mixing glass and add all other ingredients. Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Apricots And Cream
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into cocktail glass.

name: April Apple
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail glass.

name: April Rain
instructions: Pour Vodka, Vermouth and Rose's lime juice into shaker over ice. Shake with care not to bruise. Strain into chilled cocktail (martini) glass. Garnish with lime peel (zest).

name: April Shower
instructions: Shake over ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: April's Apple
instructions: Pour the Apple Pucker into glass, add Grenadine, then fill glass with Lemonade. Can be served on ice.

name: April's Summertime Punch
instructions: Pour the cherry vodka, lime vodka and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: April's Violet
instructions: Pour the gin, blue curacao and grenadine into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Aprishot
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Aqua Fodie
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in 1 oz. of Gin followed by 1 oz. of Blue Curacao. Fill glass with Orange Juice, garnish with Orange and Cherry, and serve.

name: Aquapolitan
instructions: Shake all ingredients except champagne and lime slices, in a shaker. Strain into cocktail glasses. Add 1 tbsp champagne to each glass and decorate with a lime slice.

name: Aquarius
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky, cherry brandy and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Aquatini
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Aqueduct
instructions: In a shaker half filled with ice, shake ingredients vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Arago
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer.

name: Aragorn
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Arawak Cup
instructions: Pour the dark rum, passion-fruit syrup, pineapple juice, lime juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple stick, and serve.

name: Arawak Punch
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into old fashioned glass. Do not garnish.

name: Arcadia
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Arcadian Lovemaker
instructions: Mix, drink profusely, start speaking Southern drawl.

name: Arch de Triumph
instructions: Pour the brandy, lemon juice and sugar into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Archbishop
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Archdruid
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Arctic Orange
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and set on high for 30 seconds. Pour into an old fashioned glass.

name: Arctic Red
instructions: Place sugar at bottom of a cocktail glass, and grind the lime slices down. Add cranberry vodka and carbonated water, and mix thoroughly with a spoon. Add a couple ice cubes and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Are You Tough Enough?
instructions: Using only 100 proof liquors, ensure all schnapps are ice cold. Combine and mix all five liquors in a cocktail glass and drink like a shot.

name: Argentine-Style Bellini
description: This Italian-style cocktail combination is very popular in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Though you can find many variations on this classic, some of which include peach schnapps and other liqueurs, the simplest one seems to be the most elegant and tasty. Served in a champagne flute, this light cocktail is a great way to start any evening or party. Pour the peach nectar into an 8-ounce champagne glass or flute. Slowly add the sparkling wine or champagne. Stir, garnish with the peach slice and raspberry, and serve immediately.
instructions: Pour the peach nectar into an 8-ounce champagne glass or flute. Slowly add the sparkling wine or champagne. Stir, garnish with the peach slice and raspberry, and serve immediately.

name: Arielle's Fuck 'n Run
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ario Bomb
instructions: Build over ice in glass. Garnish with 3 cherries.

name: Arizona Buttkicker
instructions: Pour both ingredients over crushed ice in a cocktail glass, stir, and serve.

name: Arizona Sunrise
instructions: Add ice into a tall-stemed cocktail glass, pour grenadine over ice, add enough that some settles on the bottom of the glass Add tequila, orange juice, and lime juice into shaker with ice. Shake thourghly. Garnish with a straw, lime wedge OR orange and cherry.

name: Arizona Sunset
instructions:
1. Add ice to a tall-stem cocktail glass. Slowly pour cream de noyaux over ice until some settles on the bottom. 

2. Add tequila, triple sec, lime juice, & orange juice into a shaker with ice, and shake thoroughly. 

3. Pour over ice. 

3. Garnish with straw, and lime slice or orange & cherry.

name: Arkansas Razorback
instructions:
Add all together in a mixing tin with ice, Shake to a froth, and strain off the ice into the glass.

The ice is just to get it cold and the shaking is to make it froth. Don't worry if it doesn't stay frothy.

name: Armada Martini
instructions: Pour vodka and Amontillado sherry over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Stir well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Armored Car
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Armour Cocktail
instructions: Pour the sherry and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Army Ranger
description: The idea behind this concoction was clear to the 2nd ranger bat. during a cold weather training exercise. The 151 was for warmth, the Red Bull was for the extra needed energy and the Jager was added as flavor. Created by Ranger Joe, 2nd Ranger Bat.Mix the Jagermeister herbal liqueur, Bacardi 151 rum and Red Bull energy drink in a mug or tall glass. Float a slice of both lime and lemon on top, and serve.
instructions: Mix the Jagermeister herbal liqueur, Bacardi 151 rum and Red Bull energy drink in a mug or tall glass. Float a slice of both lime and lemon on top, and serve.

name: Army Special
instructions: Pour Vodka, Gin and Rose's lime juice into glass, and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.

name: Arnie's Cocktail
instructions: Pour ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Around The World
instructions: Pour rum, cognac, orange juice, sour mix and creme de noyaux into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth, pour into a wine goblet, and serve.

name: Arrowhead
instructions: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass, three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Arthur Tompkins
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Arthur Tompkins
instructions: Pour gin, Grand Marnier and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Artic Red
instructions: First smash the limes and sugar to bottom of the glass. Then add vodka and soda. Mix the drink with a spoon. Add ice cubes and lemon.

name: Artillery
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Artists' Special
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Aruba
instructions: Pour the Absolut Raspberri Vodka into an ice filled cocktail glass. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur and Sprite and then the grenadine. Top with a cherry, and serve.

name: Aruba Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, white curacao, egg white, lemon juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Asbury Park
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Ash Blonde
instructions: Shake lillet and cointreau with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Add splash of vermouth for color.

name: Aspiration
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Add a cocktail olive.

name: Assassin
instructions: Pour whiskey, tequila and peppermint schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, fill with chilled Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Asskicker
instructions: Pour the four ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake very well. Pour the shaken mixture into a cocktail glass over ice. Serve with a cherry and a orange slice.

name: Astoria
instructions: Shake with cracked ice: strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with twist of orange or lemon.

name: Astral Trip
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: AT&T
instructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass. Add tonic water last. Stir.

name: AT&T
instructions: Pour vodka and gin over ice, add tonic water and stir.

name: Atlanta Brave
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Atlas
instructions: Mix in shaker with ice. Strain and serve.

name: Atomic Orange Cream
instructions: Pour the milk and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao and orange juice. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Attaboy
instructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Audrey's Russian
instructions: Mix Bailey's, cream, and Buttershot Schnapps together well. Serve on the rocks.

name: August Moon
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Aunt Agatha
instructions: Pour the rum and orange juice into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes. Float the bitters on top, garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Aunt Jemima
instructions: A classic pousse-cafe. Layer in Brandy, white creme de cacao and Benedictine.

name: Aurum Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Autumnal Equinox
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Averno
instructions: Shake all ingredients(exept orange) with ice and strain into the glass. Squeeze orange rind over drink and drop it in.

name: Aviation
instructions:
Fill cocktail shaker with ice. Juice the lemon and add to the shaker. Add a little sugar, if desired. Pour in gin and maraschino, and shake. Serve straight up in a cocktail glass.

The strict recipe does not have any sugar, but I like to add a little.

name: Aviator Fuel

name: Banaquiri
description: You can use this recipe to make any kind of fruit daiquiri. Just substitute 2 ounces (about 1/2 cup) of fruit (such as melon, peaches, strawberries, apricots, litchis, kiwi or mango) for the banana. If you like, you can also replace the maraschino with a complementary liqueur or brandy (Midori with melon, peach brandy with peaches, etc.). Garnish with the mint sprig and a piece of whatever fruit went into the mix, skewered on a cocktail pick. Blend the rum, banana, lime juice, syrup, maraschino liqueur and ice in an electric blender until smooth, about 15 seconds. Pour into a large cocktail glass or old-fashioned and garnish with the mint sprigs and skewered banana slice.
instructions: Blend the rum, banana, lime juice, syrup, maraschino liqueur and ice in an electric blender until smooth, about 15 seconds. Pour into a large cocktail glass or old-fashioned and garnish with the mint sprigs and skewered banana slice.

name: Barbados Fondue
description:
A fantasy island adventure in a tumbler, this refreshing cocktail mingles tempting tropical fruit flavors with a splash of peach-infused vodka.Muddle the lime, mango and coconut with the sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker. Add a scoop of ice, then the vodka and guava juice. Shake vigorously, pour into a chilled tumbler, and garnish with half a strawberry.

For the peach-infused vodka: 
Pour your chosen spirit into a four-cup airtight or screw-top container (reserve the empty bottle). Add 3 sliced peaches, seal the lid tightly, and store in a dark, cool, dry place for 3-5 days. Gently shake the mixture now and then, and check how the flavor is developing. The longer you leave it, the stronger it will become. 

If it becomes too strong, dilute it with unflavored spirits until you reach your preferred intensity. When you're done, strain the liquid into the original bottle and store in a freezer, ready to drink.

Pour your chosen spirit into a four-cup airtight or screw-top container (reserve the empty bottle). Add 3 sliced peaches, seal the lid tightly, and store in a dark, cool, dry place for 3-5 days. Gently shake the mixture now and then, and check how the flavor is developing. The longer you leave it, the stronger it will become. 

If it becomes too strong, dilute it with unflavored spirits until you reach your preferred intensity. When you're done, strain the liquid into the original bottle and store in a freezer, ready to drink.

name: BeeGee OJ
description: The BeeGee OJ (Bee=Bourbon + Gee=Grenadine + OJ=Orange Juice) is essentially a Tequila Sunrise, but with Bourbon. Our contributor Sean R McKinley says it's great when made real strong (1 to 1 ratio). All sorts of folks like this drink: from the lightweights to the lushes. It's sure to please, and easy to make and remember. Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a large old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add the orange juice, a little grenadine, and serve.

Arizona green tea works fairly well, but the best is a chinese grand called "tong yi" that makes bottled sweet green tea.

name: Being Bobby Brown
instructions: In an ice filled cocktail glass, throw in the Wild Turkey and top it off with Coca-cola. Sprinkle powdered sugar around the rim of the glass. Mix and serve.

name: Belgian Berry
instructions: Combine Black Haus and Bailey's irish cream over ice in a rocks or old-fashioned glass. Garnish with fresh berries, and serve.

name: Belgian Brownie
instructions: Pour the gin, cognac and chocolate liqueur over the ice cubes. Fill with heavy cream. Stir gently.

name: Bellamy Scotch Sour
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky, orange juice, lemon juice, honey and angostura bitters into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, garnish with ginger, and serve.

name: Belle Melon
instructions: Shake and pour into cocktail glass.

name: Belle of Ellis Island
instructions: Pour the vermouth, brandy, Cointreau, sugar and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Belles Of St. Mary's
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bellini #3
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a blender with ice; blend well. Pour into a Champagne flute, and serve.

name: Bellini Martini
instructions: Add ice cubes to shaker. Add vodka. Add peach schnapps. Add peach nectar. Shake. Strain into glass. Add lemon twist.(peel)

name: Bellinski
instructions: Puree ripe peaches by forcing them through a sieve and spoon into a large, chilled wine goblet. Sweeten to taste with maraschino liqueur. Add vodka, fill with chilled champagne, and serve.

name: Bellwitch
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Belmont
instructions: Shake and strain into a cordial glass and serve.

name: Belmont Stakes
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Bend Me Over
instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice if desired.

name: Benedictine Cocktail
instructions: Shake the Benedictine and bitters. Wet the rim of a cocktail glass with lemon juice and frost with caster sugar. Strain into the glas. Garnish with a maraschino cherry if desired.

name: Bengal
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bengal Tiger
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Benji
instructions: Stir everything together well.

name: Bennet Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice.

name: Bennett Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bent Nail
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bentley
instructions: Stir apple brandy and Dubonnet with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bergenline
instructions: Put all ingredients in a shaker. Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Berlin Martini
instructions: Take a shaker filled with ice. Add 2 oz smirnoff vodka, 3 dashes of schnapps, a wee splash of black zambuca and shake well, keeping your feet firmly planted, posture perfect. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a blackberry.

name: Bermuda Bloom
instructions: Put ice into a cocktail shaker. Dash Triple Sec over the ice. Add in gin, lemon juice, O.J., and brandy. Pour in sugar syrup. Shake well and strain into a cold cocktail glass.

name: Bermuda Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, peach brandy, grenadine and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a delmonico glass (whiskey sour glass), and serve.

name: Bermuda Rose
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle
instructions: Stir or shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into sour glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange or a Maraschino Cherry.

name: Bernardo
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Berry Buster
instructions:
Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake vigorously for 20 sec. Strain and serve with one fresh ice cube.

A mighty tasty drink that goes down smooth. If it's too sweet, try more vodka. If you really want to wow someone, double the recipe, add one egg white and shake for 15 sec instead of 20 sec.

name: Berry Chocolate Martini
instructions: Pour Black Haus into a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Smirnoff raspberry twist vodka and white creme de cacao. Shake, and strain into a cocktail/martini glass. Garnish with white chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Berry Cobbler
instructions: Pour equal parts blackberry brandy and rasberry schnapps over a scoop of vanilla ice cream. Top with a swirl of whipped cream.

name: Berry Fusion Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with frozen blueberries placed inside the glass.

name: Berryjito
instructions: Throw mint, sugar, and strawberry (cut up) into the glass and muddle. Then fill glass with ice. Add the Captain Morgan's and shake to mix it all up. Great alternative to a regular mojito!

name: Bertiebreezer

name: Bertrand's Black Magic
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Bessemer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Best Year
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice.

name: Betsy Ross
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Betty Paige
instructions: Mix the gin and vermouth like you would a normal martini. Pour into cocktail glass and add cherry liqueur. Garnish with cherry.

name: Between The Sheets
instructions: Pour cognac, rum and triple sec into an ice-filled rocks glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix, and serve.

name: Biffy Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Big Apple Cinnatini
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Big Apple Margarita
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a slice of green apple, and serve.

name: Big Blue Sky
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth. Serve in a red wine glass.

name: Big Booty Shake
instructions: Blend.

name: Big Brothers
instructions: Combine ingredients on-the-rocks (over ice cubes) in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Big Bull
instructions: Mix tequila and kahlua in a whiskey glass and serve with lotsa ice...

name: Big Cran Apple
description: "I love the taste of (non alcoholic) cran-apple juices -- so I wondered how an alcoholic version would taste. I first ordered it at a club in DC. The Barmaid was curious about the drink, so she tried it out. She enjoyed it as did I. Simple to make and cheap to buy!"Add rum and then juice over ice. Stir and enjoy!
instructions: Add rum and then juice over ice. Stir and enjoy!

name: Big Daddy Woo Woo
instructions: Mix ingredients in beer mug and enjoy.

name: Big Dipper
instructions: Pour the Pusser's rum, brandy, lime juice, sugar and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda, and serve.

name: Big Easy Martini
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into chilled, sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Big Game Punch
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a shaker. Shake and remove lid (carefully, sprite in glass makes contents under pressure-it has a tendancy to "explode").  Pour into cocktail glass, garnish with Orange.

name: Big Hicky
description: The Big Hicky uses 100% cranberry juice, not the commercial kinds with sugar or other juice. This is pure cranberry and very bitter. It gives the cocktail a beautiful deep red with the grenadine, and is not as sweet as others.Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a lime wedge and serve.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Big Hug
instructions: Pour the irish cream into an Irish coffee cup or glass filled 3/4 with hot chocolate. Add creme de cacao. Add whipped cream and garnish with shaved chocolate on top.

name: Big Pine Puss
instructions: Make shot in mixing glass with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Big Red Cocktail
instructions: Pour the sweet vermouth, dry vermouth, sloe gin and orange bitters into an old-fashioned glass two-thirds filled with crushed ice. Stir well, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Big Red Hooter #2
instructions:
Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a pint glass or 500ml tall glass. Fill to the top with ice. Carefully add the vodka which should remain seperate above the Midori. Pour orange and cranberry juice in equal measures until the glass is 3/4 full. Pour a ring of cherry brandy. Add 1/3 of a can of red-bull (or similar energy drink), and finally pour a ring of galliano on top, and serve.

When done correctly the glass will be almost full, there will be a green layer at the bottom from the midori and the rest of the drink will be red.

name: Big Skyy
instructions: Put slices of lemon and lime into glass. Pour in rum, and then vodka. Add a little crushed ice. Next fill the cup up with Sprite. Stir.

name: Big Titty Ho on a Motorcycle
instructions: Add about 4 ice cubes to an old fashioned glass. Add the amaretto, tequila, and whiskey sour mix, then Pepsi. Garnish with an umbrella and serve.

name: Big Toe
instructions: Stir and strain into a liqueur or cordial glass. Serve with a cherry on a stick.

name: Bighorn
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass on the rocks, and serve.

name: Bijou Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Bikini Cocktail
instructions: Shake rum, vodka, milk, sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Bikini Martini
instructions: Add equal parts of each ingredient to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled martini glass with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Bikini Wax
instructions: Shake all ingredients except lemon twist in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Bill Clinton Politically Erect
instructions: Mix liquids over rocks. Garnish with 2 hazelnuts.

name: Bill Clinton Zipper Dropper
instructions: Add liqueur over rocks.

name: Bill Leaves Town

name: Bill Murray and The Ghostbusters

name: Billy Bishop
description: The drink gets it's name from a Canadian World War II hero. The gin represents England, the Cointreau represents France, the rye represents Canada, and the OJ represents the US. Typically, the drink is served only once a year in Canada, Veteran's Day, and only to veterans.Fill an old-fashioned glass 2/3 full with ice. Pour in the English gin and Cointreau. Put a splash of rye whiskey on top. Finish by filling the glass with orange juice.
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass 2/3 full with ice. Pour in the English gin and Cointreau. Put a splash of rye whiskey on top. Finish by filling the glass with orange juice.

name: Billy Hamilton
instructions: Pour the brandy, orange curacao and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Biohazard
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a margarita glass, and serve.

name: Bird of Paradise
instructions: Combine all ingredients, stir, and serve.

name: Birger Jarl
instructions: Pour over rocks in highball glass. Garnish with 1/2-inch chunk of firm smoked fish on toothpick or mini-halberd.

name: Birky's Bubblegum
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, banana liqueur, irish cream and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Birth Control
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned or rocks glass, swill and serve.

name: Biscay
instructions: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange twist.

name: Biscayne Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, light rum, forbidden fruit liqueur and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Bitch on Wheels #2
description: This cocktail is served at The Vortex in Atlanta. Other versions at other bars use Pernod and white creme de menthe, but this is the real thing. A gorgeous emerald green beauty that will kick your ass.Coat a martini glass with a few drops of green creme de menthe. Put six ice cubes into a cocktail shaker and add the liquor. Shake to chill and strain into the martini glass.
instructions: Coat a martini glass with a few drops of green creme de menthe. Put six ice cubes into a cocktail shaker and add the liquor. Shake to chill and strain into the martini glass.

name: Bitches Tit

name: Bitter Apples
instructions: This drink requires a large open top glass to let the drink breathe during creation. Combine the gin and Sour Apple together and stir. Pour the JíƒÂ¤germeister over the center of the glass and add in the drops of Aftershock. Swirl the glass around three times and drink!

ingredients.name: 12 drops Aftershock® Hot & Cool cinnamon schnapps

name: Bitter Bikini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over ice.

name: Bitter End

name: Bitter Evan

name: Bitter Lime

5 ice cubes in a Coupe glass first. Pour Courvoisier(1oz) then
Hypnotiq (2oz) then Midori(melon). 

Stir drink do not shake. And serve. Great Cocktail before dinner(italian, Jamacian, or Island foods). Careful it's a creeper drink but very mellow.

name: Black Magick

name: Black Marble

instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Shake gently. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Black Russian #3

name: Black Russian #4
instructions: Pour the vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a mixing glass with a few ice cubes and stir well. Pour that and the Coca-cola into an old-fashioned glass, and stir. Pour Guinness on top from a height to create a creamy head, and serve.

name: Black Tartan

instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blimey
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Blind Melon
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.
