instructions: Make by the glass for a few guests or in a shaker or pitcher for a large party. Serve in a cocktail glass, garnishing the glass rim with a half slice of fresh lime.

name: Cranberry Margarita
instructions: Add all ingredients into blender with ice. Blend until smooth.

name: Cranberry Newt
instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

name: Cranberry Smash
instructions: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Cranberry Splash
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a rocks glass. Add a splash of cranberry juice.

name: Cranberry Steamboat
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cranberry Toad
instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

name: Cranberry Vodka Slush
instructions: Mix all ingredients a day ahead and place in freezer. When ready to serve, take out of freezer and scoop and serve with ginger ale, if desired.

name: Cranberry Zambonee
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass, and serve.

name: Cranilla Dew
instructions: Mix equal portions of cranberry juice, Mountain Dew, and Vodka (vanilla). Pour over ice and serve.

name: Crantini
instructions: Add all the ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Then shake, pour into martini glass and add a few cranberries to complete the drink.( Soak the cranberries in vodka first)

name: Crapple Juice
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or rocks glass, and serve.

name: Craptini
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Crapton
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Crash Landing
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Crater Face
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Crazy Caribbean Gentleman
instructions: Mix Frangelico, Rum and sour mix in a shaker with ice, shake and pour into glass.

name: Crazy Cat
instructions: In a shaker put ice, add both rums, one splash of 7-up or Sprite, 2 splashes of cranberry juice and shake. Pour into a large cocktail glass, garnish with a cherry.

name: Crazy Huey
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Crazy Jew
instructions: Fill your nice, cold beer mug with ice. Mix all liquors then add juices. Shake it up and serve it to your best customers when they ask for something new, strong, and sweet!

name: Crazy Juice
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Serve on ice.

name: Crazy Parrot
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Cream Samba
instructions: Combine all ingredients with some crushed ice in a blender. Blend for 2 minuets. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with dessicated coconut and fruit identical to the flavor of the ice-cream.

name: Cream Sherry Cobbler
instructions: Add the sugar to an old-fashioned glass. Pour in the club soda, and stir to dissolve. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full, then add sherry, and stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, a slice of orange, and a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Cream Sherry Flip
instructions: Combine the sherry, egg, sugar and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a dusting of nutmeg, and serve.

name: Creamsicle #3
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice, give it a few good shakes and strain into a cocktail glass with a sugar rim. More potent than the original. Enjoy!

name: Creamsicle #4
instructions: Place about 4 ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Pour in Absolut Citron and fill the glass around three-quarters of the way with orange juice. Top off with grenadine, stir and serve.

name: Creamsicle #7
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker or blender with crushed ice, depending whether you want it chilled or not. May have to adjust orange juice and cream for taste, whether you like it tart or not. These are just approx. on juice and cream. Excellent drink for the person who likes creamy drinks.

name: Creamsicle Margarita
instructions: Blend all ingredients until slushy. Serve in a margarita glass.

name: Creamsicle Martini
instructions: Add ingredients, shake over ice and pour into a chilled martini glass. Serve.

name: Creamy Bush
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Creamy Comfort
instructions: Pour over ice.

name: Creamy Crispy Crunch
instructions: Shake with ice (drink should be a bit foamy). Pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Creamy Crotch
instructions: Add all ingredients to an old-fashioned glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Creamy Kiss
instructions: Mix ingredients in order; cream last, stir, and serve.

name: Creamy Mimi
instructions: Build in a glass over ice.

name: Creamy Orange
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Creamy Pflueger
instructions: Combine peach schnapps and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add half-and-half, and serve.

name: Creamy Root Beer Float
instructions: Fill a frosted beer mug with ice. Pour 1 1/2 to 2 ounces of Dr. Vanillacuddy's over ice, fill glass with root beer about 3/4 of an inch from the top. Top off with cream to taste.

name: Creamy Russian
instructions: Fill glass 1/3 of the way with Vodka (Stoli Vanil recommended). Top off with your favorite Ginger Ale and stir well. Tastes like cream soda.

name: Creamy Tan
instructions: Add ice and all the ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Then serve in a large glass.

name: Creature from the Black Lagoon
instructions: Combine both the Grey Goose vanilla vodka and the green creme de menthe in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass that has been drizzled with chocolate syrup. Enjoy!

name: Creek Juice
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, add the vodka. Nearly fill with cranberry juice, and float Midori on top. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Cremat
description: Cremat is a popular drink in Catalonia, north east of the Spanish peninsula. It is drunk along the Mediterranean Catalan coast, which is known as "Costa Brava". While it burns, people sing traditional songs called "habaneres". Probably Catalan sailors that traveled from Cuba invented it while on board.Add all ingredients to a terracotta pot. On the side, heat up some rum on the stove. Once the rum is hot, light it and slowly pour it into the terracotta pot. Stir the beverage slowly until 2/3 of the liquid remains, then serve. Serves 8 people.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a terracotta pot. On the side, heat up some rum on the stove. Once the rum is hot, light it and slowly pour it into the terracotta pot. Stir the beverage slowly until 2/3 of the liquid remains, then serve. Serves 8 people.

name: Creme De Cachaca
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice. Strain over ice into an old fashioned glass.

name: Creme de Cafe
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Creme de Gin
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Creme de Gin Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Creme De Moonthe
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Creme Dream
instructions: Mix together in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Creme Soda
instructions: Stir ingredients gently together in a chilled cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice, and serve.

name: Creole
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Creole Lady
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with both a red and green maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Creole Scream
instructions: Mix the rum, grenadine, vermouth and angostura. Shake with ice. Add the olive.

name: Cricket
instructions: Combine ingredients in an ice-filled shaker. Shake well, strain into old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Crickets
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice. Add enough ice-cream to make the drink thick like a malt. Serves two.

name: Crimean Cocktail
instructions: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the soda, garnish with two cherries on a stick, and serve.

name: Crimson Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Float port on top, and serve.

name: Crimson Fizz
instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a wine goblet, add a little club soda, and serve.

name: Crimson Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients together with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist, and serve.

name: Crimson Pod
instructions: Mix crushed raspberries and vodka together, pour over ice, top up with cranberry juice and stir.

name: Crimson Sunset
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink and float the port on the top.

name: Crimson Sunset
instructions: Pour the gin and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink and float port on top. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cristianne
instructions: Pour Blue Curacao in a champagne flute, followed by Vodka and White Wine. Then pour Grenadine. Don't shake it!

name: Crooked Sister
instructions: Stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Crow's Nest
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled rocks glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Crownarita
description: The ingredients are nothing new, but the term Crownarita was coined at the Wirefly X-Prize Cup in Las Cruces New Mexico by two X-Prize Cup volunteers: Dan Baca and Sean O'Dell.  The drink was invented on the spot in the VIP tent when ingredients for a simple whiskey sour where not at hand.  Remarkably, the drink was an instant favorite and was being ordered by VIPs for the remainder of the event. Due to the nature of the X-Prize Cup event, many aerospace industry officials and rocket scientists were present. As such, the drink went through brief series of space related names including Laika Sour and Rocket Fuel before settling on the more descriptive name Crownarita.Combine ingredients and serve over ice in an old fashioned glass.  Stir gently and garnish with a single cherry if desired.
instructions: Combine ingredients and serve over ice in an old fashioned glass.  Stir gently and garnish with a single cherry if desired.

name: Crowning of the Bull
instructions: Fill glass with ice and equal amounts of Crown and Red Bull.

name: Crowning the 7 Captains of Bombay
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: CRS
instructions: Pour the alcohol into a mixing glass with ice, and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the splashes of 7-up and sour mix, and serve.

name: Cruising Van
instructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass.

name: Crum
instructions: Pour hte Crown Royal into a brandy snifter filled with ice. Add Parrot Bay, stir gently and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Crunchy Kitty
description:
Mae Anna McIntosh, inventor. Thrown together when she worked at a small bar in Missouri, where a customer requested "something different". Quickly became popular among the younger crowd, and also called a "Crunchy Pussy" by most. The amounts of the juice and liquer may be toyed with, but this is the original recipe. Occasionally a cherry was used, too, rather than the peach wedge.Fill margarite glass half with crushed ice. Pour in 3/4 ounce of pineapple juice, peach liquer. Pour in OJ, fill glass as desired with champagne, stir with straw.
Top with whipped cream and peach wedge.
instructions:
Fill margarite glass half with crushed ice. Pour in 3/4 ounce of pineapple juice, peach liquer. Pour in OJ, fill glass as desired with champagne, stir with straw.
Top with whipped cream and peach wedge.

name: Crunk Juice
description: Popular with rap artists (Lil Jon, Ying Yang Twins) and in the south. This cocktail was created before the production of the "Crunk Juice" energy drink and was the original inspiration for the product. Lil' Jon himself is used in promotion of the soft drink and acknowledges this. The original cocktail is named after the style of rap Lil' Jon made popular, known as Crunk (Lil' Jon named two albums after the drink, Kings of Crunk and Crunk Juice). The mixture of cognac and caffeine/glucose acts as a greater stimulant than alcohol would alone, akin to similar concoctions. Pour both ingredients into a cup or glass, stir slightly, and serve.
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cup or glass, stir slightly, and serve.

name: Crush de Valencia
description: A popular drink to many, Crush de Valencia appeals mostly to girls who seem to enjoy it more. Courtesy of Emily Brown of the Union Hotel in Adelaide, Australia. Muddle 1/3 orange and 2 wedges of lime (skin on). Add mango liqueur, malibu and cointreau & a good scoop of ice. Shake vigorously. Rim a wide mouth, thin glassed spirit glass with brown sugar. Pour shaker contents into glass. Top with ruby red grapefruit juice. Sprinkle with brown sugar.
instructions: Muddle 1/3 orange and 2 wedges of lime (skin on). Add mango liqueur, malibu and cointreau & a good scoop of ice. Shake vigorously. Rim a wide mouth, thin glassed spirit glass with brown sugar. Pour shaker contents into glass. Top with ruby red grapefruit juice. Sprinkle with brown sugar.

name: Crushed Orange
instructions: Pour Cointreau, sweetened lime juice, and Absolut Mandarin vodka over 8 ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. If available, garnish with a slice of fresh orange on glass rim. Serve immediately while it is still extremely cold.

name: Crusta
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cruzan Confusion
instructions: Stir together in a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Crypto Nugget
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Crystal Cranberry
instructions: Fill glass half full with ice and add the vodka. Put in the cranberry and orange juice next, then float the other liquors. Add grenadine to color, mix and garnish with a straw and a lemon.

name: Crystal Slipper Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Crystal Telekenisis
instructions: Pour the Mountain Dew Baja Blast into a cocktail glass. Add peach schnapps (or Hpnotiq liqueur), stir briefly and serve.

ingredients.name: Mountain Dew® Baja Blast lime soda

name: Crystal Vault
instructions: Stir over ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Cuban Cherry
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Cuban Cigar
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into Test Tube.

name: Cuban Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cuban Island
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cuban Manhattan
instructions: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Cuban Martini
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Cuban Sour
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cuban Special
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cubano
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled shaker, shake well and strain into a glass.

name: Cucaracha
instructions: Place equal measures of tequila and kahlua in a glass with ice, stir, and serve.

name: Cuckoo Coconut
instructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass.

name: Cucumber-Melon Delight
instructions:
Fill your blender with ice (I used a magic bullet wich is like 1/3 of a blender). Add the cut up cucumber on top of ice. Pour the bacardi over the cucumber. Pour in the sweet and sour mix. Blend. Add a squeeze of lime and blend again- 2 seconds. Pour into glass and enjoy.

(Add more cucumber to taste, i leave the seeds in. depending on the brand of melon liquor depends on the taste of the cucumber.)

These are great-NO JOKE!

name: Cuff and Buttons
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Cul-De-Sac
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Culross
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cum Guzzler
instructions: In a blender mix ice cream, chocolate syrup, instant coffee, milk and cookies. Blend together. Add gin and blend again. Pour into mug and top with whipped cream.

name: Cum in your Mouth
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cumulus
instructions: Shake intensely with ice. Serve in a frosted glass, and sprinkle with powdered coffee or nutmeg.

name: Cupid's Kiss
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a brandy snifter or goblet.

name: Cuyahoga Cocktail
instructions: Pour vermouth and gin into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Cyber Smoke
instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into champagne flute. Add a small piece of edible dry ice.

name: Cyberlady
instructions: Shake well and pour in a cocktail glass, frosted with strawberry.

name: Cyclone Attack
instructions: Layer both ingredients in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cynar Cocktail
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in an aperitif or cordial glass, and squeeze in an orange wedge. Serve.

name: Czar
instructions: Shake ingredients (except wine) in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a wine glass, and top with the sparkling white wine.

name: Czarina
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Czarina #2
instructions: Stir the Stoli raspberry vodka, Bailey's irish cream and half-and-half with ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with maraschino liqueur, and serve.

name: Czarine
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: D Devils
instructions: Add all ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: D.O.M. Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: D.R.F.O.
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half filled with ice. Stir, strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dabadooley
instructions: Mix all ingredients together over ice. Add a wedge of lime and enjoy!

name: Daily Double C
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with two maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Daily Mail
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a lowball or old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Blossom
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Cocktail #2
instructions: Shake ingredients with shaved ice, strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Liberal
instructions: Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Natural
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Party Punch
instructions: Thaw the two cans of limeade until they are liquid. In the party punch bowl, mix the limeade, rum, and cointreau. Slice in the fresh lime and muddle it with the punch. Throw in the ice and stir again. Taste and optionally dilute with ice water or soda water. Serves 4 serious cocktail drinkers or about a dozen pre-dinner guests.

name: Dale's Bloody Mary
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass and roll back and forth to gently mix. Strain into a large goblet or pint glass over ice, and serve.

name: Dali Lama
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Drizzle the chocolate syrup into an old-fashioned glass, coating the edges and leaving a pool of chocolate in the base of the glass. Pour the contents of the cocktail shaker through a strainer into the chocolate-lined glass, and serve.

name: Dalton
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes.

name: Damn Right
instructions: Pour the sprite and then the shot of Aftershock. Mix and enjoy.

name: Damn-The-Weather Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Damn-Your-Eyes
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, dubonnet, and dry vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Dan's Dewberry Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker cup. Add ice last. Stir ingredients (do not shake unless asked to). Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

name: Dance With A Dream Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dancin' Bones
instructions: Pour vermouth, gin and cherry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, and stir. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dancing Dana
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Add water to taste if required. Rim a margarita glass with sugar if desired. Pour the blended drink mixture into the margarita glass and serve.

name: Dancing Lady
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a sword and cherry on the rim.

name: Dandy Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of both lemon and orange peel, and serve.

name: Dangerous Liaisons
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a sherry glass.

name: Daniel Island Cosmopolitan
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with slices of lime and cracked ice. Shake hard and well, then strain into a chilled martini glass. The pulp from the lime slices will act as the garnish. Serve.

name: Danish Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with an olive, and serve.

name: Danish Toddy
instructions: Pour into a heat-proof cup and serve immediately.

name: Danny Borracho
description: The inventor, Dan Bennett earned the nickname Danny Borracho for his love of tequila. When Danny Borracho finished bartending school, he and Brandon Glass brainstormed on his first cocktail. Several failed but still potent prototypes later, the Borracho was born.Combine vodka, tequila, and lime juice over ice in a rocks glass. Fill the rest w/ Sprite or 7-up. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.
instructions: Combine vodka, tequila, and lime juice over ice in a rocks glass. Fill the rest w/ Sprite or 7-up. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Danny Sheldon
instructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass. Squeeze the lime wedge into the drink before dropping in.

name: Danny's Delight
instructions: Wash an old-fashioned glass with bitters and ice. Discard excess. Add vermouth, whiskey and wine. Top with lemonade, to taste, and serve.

name: Danny's Special
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Darb Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daring Dylan
instructions: Let the mexican hot chocolate cool to room temperature. Pour all of the ingredients into an irish coffee glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Dark 'n Stormy
description: Dark 'n Stormy is the unofficial national drink of Bermuda. Gosling owns the trademark on the actual recipe, meaning you cannot use a different brand of rum and call it a Dark 'n Stormy. Not that we'd want to, mind.Mix ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass over cracked ice, and serve.
instructions: Mix ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass over cracked ice, and serve.

name: Dark Eyes
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into snifter.

name: Dark Horse
instructions: Pour the rum, Kahlua, vermouth and lemon into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a Champagne flute over crushed ice. Top with Coca-cola. Garnish with a lemon slice, and serve.

name: Dark Lord
instructions: Mix all ingredients with ice. Strain and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive.

name: Dark Mark
instructions:
Combine equal amounts of both ingredients. Serve cold to very cold in wine glass or similar "elegant" presentation. 

NOTE: Mountain Dew Pitch Black original OR sour (type II) may be used, but sour/II gives a better effect.

name: Darkside Martini
description: As first served at now defunct Smith Brothers restaurant in Port Washington, Wisconsin.Pour ingredients into shaker over lots of ice. Shake 37 times, this is critical! Strain into martini glass and sip liberally.
instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker over lots of ice. Shake 37 times, this is critical! Strain into martini glass and sip liberally.

name: Darkwood Sling
instructions: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefer Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.

name: Darren's Vodka Kicker
instructions: Blend and drink until sober!

name: Dartmouth Green
instructions: Put all ingredients in a blender and mix. Or, simply pour ingredients over ice in a glass.

name: Dave Matthews
description: A popular recipe, particularly on the east coast of Canada. Apparently originated in Fredericton, New-Brunswick.Shake amaretto, rum and juices together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into an ice-filled cocktail glass, and serve.
instructions: Shake amaretto, rum and juices together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into an ice-filled cocktail glass, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Davey Crockett
instructions: Mix the blue curacao, peach schnapps and orange juice together in a mixing glass. Pour over crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass or large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: David Bareface
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: David Caradine
instructions:
Mix in the order: cacao, menthe, whiskey, milk. Try to keep the layers separate. Float on the back of a spoon, tilt the glass and pour very gently, etc. 

I suggest tilting the glass. When you tilt the glass you can, when pouring the cream/milk, rotate the glass causing the cream to swirl down through the other layers which looks good. Serve in an apertif glass.

name: David's Red Robbin
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Davis Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

name: Davis Dream
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender. Serve in cocktail glasses.

name: Dawn Chorus
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add cola, and serve.

name: Day Dreaming
instructions: Pour the Licor 43 into a shaker, then the milk and then the orange juice. The egg is optional but add it in if you want. Shake everything (jeje, but shake it well) pour in a glass with lots of ice.

name: Daydream
instructions:
In cocktail mixer filled with ice, combine all ingredients. Shake or stir & strain into rocks glass or large shot glass. 

Tip: If the right amount of grenadine is used, it should be the color of orange sherbert.

name: Daydream Martini
instructions: Stir ingredients together well in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: De Rigueur
instructions: Shake all ingredients except champagne in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a wine glass and fill with champagne. Add a couple of ice cubes.

name: Dea Lea
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain over ice cubes in a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Dead Grasshopper
instructions: Shake creme de menthe, creme de cacao and milk with ice cubes in a shaker. Pour into a cocktail glass and add a dash of aftershock. Do not stir.

name: Dead Hand
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Dead Lawyer
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dead Lizard
instructions: Pour vodka into glass. Add cordial until colour becomes light red. Add coke until definite colour change occurs. Drink.

name: Dead Man's Handle
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

name: Dead Pirate Seaspray
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum and Kahlua into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Deanne
instructions: Pour vodka, vermouth and Cointreau into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Deansgate Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Death by Chocolate Martini
instructions:
Mix 3 tablespoons Oreo cookie crumbs (available in most groceries in baking isle) plus 1 tablesoon powdered sugar on a flat plate. Coat rim of chilled cocktail Martini glass with lime and then dip rim of glass in Oreo mixture. Set aside.

Mix Godiva liqueur, creme de cacao, vodka, and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into the set aside cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Death By Oreos
instructions: Combine ingredients in a plastic cup. Garnish with oreos and chocolate shavings.

ingredients.name: Just Desserts® chocolate chip cookie cream liqueur

name: Death Dream
instructions: Mix absinthe with the aftershock, then add the pernod and drink straight down stick to 1 to 2 any more in one session and your likely to wake up and not remember a thing.

name: Death Everywhere
instructions: Mix all ingredients into a shaker filled with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Death From Above
instructions: In a freezingly chilled glass pour in Bacardi 151 and gin. Now light the drink on fire (be extra careful!) After a few seconds of burning the drink, pour in the coke, and serve.

name: Death of a Virgin
instructions: Pour vodka, schnapps and lime juice into a glass. Add orange juice until the glass is half-filled, and fill completely with 7-up. Stir well, and serve.

name: Death to Smurfette
instructions: Pour all the ingredients into a large blender. Blend with enough ice to give the cocktail the consistency of a frozen margarita. Pour into a margarita glass and garnish as you see fit.

name: Death's Chocolate Design
instructions: Combine the sugar, cinnamon, and cocoa and rim the edge of a chilled cocktail glass with it. Drizzle chocolate syrup around the inside of the glass. Fill a shaker 1/3 full of ice, and add creme de cacao, white chocolate liqueur, vodka, and cream. Shake well and strain into the glass. Garnish with cherries and top with a puff of whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

name: Deauville Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Debonaire Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients together to chill, strain into a chilled martini glass, and serve.

name: Debutante's Dream
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Decadance
instructions: Put equal parts of everything (except whipped cream) into shaker, mix over ice. Strain into the glass. Use whipped cream as a garnish.

name: Deceiver
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir briefly, and serve.

name: DeeDee Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, cranberry juice, maraschino liqueur, lemon juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with gin-infused cranberries, and serve.

name: Deep Blue
instructions: Stir vodka and blue curacao together with ice in a glass. Top with champagne, and drop a blue maraschino cherry to the bottom.

name: Deep Blue Sea
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, and strain into a martini glass.

name: Deep Dark Love
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a couple of whole coffee beans, and serve.

name: Deep Dark Secret
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Deep Sea Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Deep Sea Martini
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Deep South
instructions:
Mix pineapple juice and molasses well, either shake or blend, stirring won't work. Pour into glass and drop rum on top but do not stir in. Splash on cherry syrup and garnish with a pineapple wedge or pineapple chunks. 

Serve slightly cooler than room temp, or over ice.

name: Degobah Dropkick
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Deidru
instructions: Add brandy to glass and fill with lemonade. Add ice if desired. Stir.

name: Deja Vu
description: Why is this drink called a deja vu? Simply... why not?  But if you really need a reason, it's because it's so good, you'll have to have another, and another... Put ice into double old-fashioned glass. Add one or two shots of vanilla vodka, depending on preference. Add 6 oz. (half a can) of root beer or diet root beer.
instructions: Put ice into double old-fashioned glass. Add one or two shots of vanilla vodka, depending on preference. Add 6 oz. (half a can) of root beer or diet root beer.

name: Delhis Devils
instructions: Add all ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or serve on the rocks.

name: Delicious Martini
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Delilah
instructions: Add gin, cointreau and lemon juice to an ice-filled shaker. Shake for 30 seconds and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Dellen Delight
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Delmonico #2
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Delmonico Cocktail
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, brandy, sweet vermouth, dry vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Delta Cocktail
instructions: Pour the scotch whisky, Southern Comfort, lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a fresh slice of peach, and serve.

name: Delta Sunset
instructions: Mix ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass over ice, and serve.

name: Demon-Raped Soul
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Dempsey Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Denmark Orgasm
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Depth Bomb
instructions: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glassh half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Derby Cocktail
instructions: Stir gin and peach bitters (or peach brandy) in a cordial glass. Add an olive and a mint leaf, and serve.

name: Derby Daiquiri
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup shaved ice in an electric blender at a low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Derby Special
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: DeRosier
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: DeRosier's 19th Hole
instructions: Pour the anejo rum, bourbon whiskey, creme de cacao, Drambuie and hot coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon on top of the drink so that it floats, and serve.

name: Desert Martini
description: The driest Martini cocktail in the world.Dip a toothpick into dry vermouth. Pour the gin into a cocktail/martini glass and stir it with the toothpick.
instructions: Dip a toothpick into dry vermouth. Pour the gin into a cocktail/martini glass and stir it with the toothpick.

name: Deshler Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel, and serve.

name: Desiree
instructions:
Serve on the rocks. 

Optional garnish: lemon or lime twist.

name: Desperate Housewife
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drizzle with chocolate sauce, and serve.

name: Desperate Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh blackberries, and serve.

name: Destroyer
instructions: Add frozen limeade concentrate in blender; fill the same can with vodka and add to blender; fill can with Half and Half and add to blender along with 6 ice cubes. Blend, pulse until ice is crushed. Pour into any type of glass.

name: Detroit Fermi
instructions: Combine all ingredients in an old-fashioned or lowball glass; ignite, extinguish and serve.

name: Detroit Red Wing
instructions: Build over ice in a double old-fashioned glass.

name: Detroit River Martini
description: The amounts are just what my wife and I have come up with after seeing the ingredients on the drink menu at Rochester Mills Brewery in Rochester Michigan.  About 12 miles north of Detroit.  The drink itself should be an odd brown/purple/green color.... like that of the Detroit River.Combine all ingredients in a shaker..... shake..... pour into a Martini style cocktail glass.  Enjoy.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker..... shake..... pour into a Martini style cocktail glass.  Enjoy.

name: Devil Cocktail
instructions: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Devil's Advocate
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well, strain over ice cubes in a glass, and serve.

name: Devil's Cocktail
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Devil's Sweat
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing tin. Pour over ice cubes in an old-fashioned, rocks or lowball glass, and serve.

name: Devil's Torch
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel, and serve.

name: Dew Me
instructions: Pour the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey, Southern Comfort and lemon juice into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with or add to taste the Mountain Dew, and serve.

name: Dew the Dancin Captain
instructions: Add rum to glass, then fill with root beer and Mountain Dew.

name: Dew-Driver #2
instructions: The first thing to do is add the ice. 4 large cubes work well. Then add the vodka. A good way to measure is to fill it almost to the top of the ice cubes. Add the Orange Juice until it is almost to the top of the glass and then add a little mountain dew. The more dew you add, the less vodka taste you have. (The oj also does a nice job of killing the vodka taste). Then enjoy.

name: Dewberry Martini
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Dewing the Captain
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over crushed ice. Add Mountain Dew.

name: DewRunRum
instructions: Place two ice cubes into a 16 oz. cup. Add one shot of bacardi 151 proof rum, and pour the mountain dew over the top.

name: Diablo
instructions: Pour casa noble reposado tequila, creme de cassis and fresh lime juice into a glass with ice. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve with a wedge of lime on top.

name: Diablo de Blanco
instructions: Shake the Dr. McGillicuddy's vanilla schnapps and gin together in a cocktail shaker. Pour into an old-fashioned or rocks glass and stir in the milk. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Diablo's Blood
instructions: Pour both ingredients together and mix well. Serve cold.

name: Diabolique
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Diamond Head
instructions: Shake all ingredients vigorously with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Diamond Romeo
instructions: Pour liquor in a glass over ice. Fill with 7-Up, add cherry juice for color.

name: Diana Cocktail
instructions: Pour the white creme de menthe into a brandy snifter filled with crushed ice. Carefully pour the brandy over the back of a teaspoon in order to float it on top of the creme de menthe. Serve.

name: Dianne-On-The-Tower
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dick Deming Martini
instructions: Mix. Pretend it's a martini. Plastic glasses are the best for this beast.

name: Dick Wells
instructions: Fill shot glass 2/3 full with Bailey's and then top it off with Crown Royal.

name: Dickey Wallbanger
instructions: Fill glass 3/4 with ice. Add Tequila and Vodka, fill glass with O.J.

name: Didaccino
description: A chocolate and coffee-flavored digestif invented in the DIDA bar in Paris, France.Combine the Kahlua coffee liqueur, chocolate liqueur and milk in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, pour into a coffee mug or glass, and serve.
instructions: Combine the Kahlua coffee liqueur, chocolate liqueur and milk in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, pour into a coffee mug or glass, and serve.

name: Die Hard
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Diki-Diki
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dimple Cocktail
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps and Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry and orange juices. Garnish the drink with 2 cherries, and serve.

name: Dinah Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: Dinguskhan
instructions: Pour the bourbon into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew, and serve.

name: Diplomat
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon and cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the lemon slice, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Dirty Apple #2
instructions:
Mix all ingredients in martini shaker over ice until frosted.  Strain into cocktail glass and serve.  

Looks like apple cider, taste like apple cider and can't even taste the Jager.....great drink for women and men alike.

name: Dirty Ashtray
instructions: Fill a cup or highball glass with ice and combine all ingredients. Stir and serve.

name: Dirty Blonde
instructions: Shake ingredients except vermouth in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass,then sprinkle vermouth over the top to make it dirty.

name: Dirty Bloody Martini
instructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker, except olives, and shake until shaker is frosted. Pour into cocktail glass, add olives and serve.

name: Dirty Bloody Red Headed Slut
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, and serve without ice in a small rocks glass.

name: Dirty Bone on the Rocks
instructions: Pour vodka into rocks glass over ice. Add a few splashes of olive juice and two queen sized olives on a toothpick.

name: Dirty Bong H20
instructions: Shake all ingredients except 7-up (or Sprite) in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass or serve on the rocks. Top off with 7-up (or Sprite).

name: Dirty Dante
instructions: Add blue curacao to a cocktail glass. Shake JíƒÂ¤germeister, peach schnapps and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker with lots of ice and gently layer them over the blue curacao.

name: Dirty Dick's Downfall
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, and campari. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Dirty Donkey
instructions: Add chocolate liqueur and rum in glass, drizzle with Goldschlager. Can be served over ice or straight up. Makes a great shooter too!

name: Dirty Futo
instructions: Stir together in a cup, and serve.

name: Dirty Glass
instructions: Pour whisky into glass over ice. Squeeze half a lemon in, stir, and add cola to taste.

name: Dirty Grandmother
instructions: Pour Newfoundland Screech dark rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with milk or light cream, stir and serve.

name: Dirty Ice-cap
instructions: Put ice in shaker, pour in 3 parts vodka, one part of each of the rest, shake, and pour into glass.

name: Dirty Martini
instructions:
1. Place an ice cube and a small amount of water in a cocktail glass. Place in freezer for 2 - 3 minutes. 

2. Fill a mixer with all ingredients including garnish. Cover and shake hard 3 - 4 times. 

3. Remove cocktail glass from freezer, and empty. Strain contents of the mixer into the cocktail glass, include one of the olives, and serve with a mysterious smile.

name: Dirty Martini #2
instructions: Use mixing glass with ice pour gin and splash of olive juice from the jar or fruit tray. Shake or stir does not matter. Strain into Martini glass. Garnish with at least 3 olives.

name: Dirty Monkey
instructions: Pour into a brandy snifter in the order listed, and serve unstirred.

name: Dirty Mother
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, stir well, and serve.

name: Dirty Mother #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Dirty Orgasm
instructions: Layer in order.

name: Dirty Pat-Trick
instructions: Fill a cup with ice. Pour the Kahlua, then add the root beer, and serve.

name: Dirty Redheaded Slut
instructions: Equal parts of Crown Royal, Chambord, and Southern Comfort. Shaken and strained into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Dirty Rotten
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass filled with ice, combine the rum, sherry and lime juice. Fill with club soda. Garnish with lemon peel, and serve.

name: Dirty Sewer
instructions: Combine ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Dirty Shaft
instructions: Shake root beer and sambuca vigorously in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Splash Irish cream on top.

name: Dirty Snowball
instructions: Pour irish cream and peppermint schnapps over ice in a medium rocks or old-fashioned glass. Top with milk, stir, and serve.

name: Dirty Sock
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir briefly, and serve.

name: Dirty South
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dirty South #2
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with ice and serve.

name: Dirty Strawberry
instructions: Add ingredients to glass with ice and stir. Garnish with strawberry.

name: Dirty Tuaca
instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a short glass.

name: Dirty Vodka Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with an olive, and serve.

name: Dirty Volcano
description: This drink was mentioned in a recent episode of Desperate Housewives, contributed and invented by Casey Bleeker after a failed chemistry test.Shake the vodka and rums and strain into a rocks glass. Add sweet & sour mix, fill with cranberry juice, and serve. A splash of amaretto or triple sec is a great addition to this drink.
instructions: Shake the vodka and rums and strain into a rocks glass. Add sweet & sour mix, fill with cranberry juice, and serve. A splash of amaretto or triple sec is a great addition to this drink.

name: Dirty White Mother
instructions: Pour brandy and Kahlua into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and stir. Float cream on top and serve.

name: Dirty Whore
instructions:
1. fill a rocks glass about 2/3 full with apple juice.
2. sink a shot of jagermeister into the bottom of the glass
3. float about a shot of razz-matazz on top, or enough to finish filling the glass

Apple juice should be chilled to start... no ice, serve immediately... drink can be sipped or slammed... sweet, smooth flavor, and pleasing layers of color...

name: Dirty's Liquid Lovin'
instructions: Mix Malibu, Creme de Cacao White and Milk. Shake like crazy. Strain into glass add a pinch of powdered sugar on top for garnish. Enjoy!

name: Dirty, Dirty
instructions: Mix vodka and olive juice in shaker over ice. Shake well and pour into martini glass. Garnish with the 2 garlic stuffed olives.

name: Disaronno and Cream
instructions: Build over ice in rocks glass.

name: Disco Inferno
instructions: Start with one part Grey Goose, one part Hennessy, fill with Dom Perignon.

name: Discordia
instructions: Mix rum and heavy whipping cream in a 2 quart pitcher until frothy. Add orange juice to top of pitcher. Stir lightly. Pour into old fashioned glasses.

name: Diva Style
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into martini glass or glass of your choice.

name: Diva-Licious
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with umbrella.

name: Dive Bomb
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Diwali
instructions: Use a frosty pint glass and make sure the ingredients are ice cold. Drop in the wine and whiskey. With the remaining room, fill half with the pink lemonade and the other half with the club soda.

name: Dixie Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dixie Dew
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dixie Stinger
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dixie Throw
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Dixie Toss
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Dixie Whiskey Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dizzy Dame
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a speared cherry, add short straws, and serve.

name: Do Be Careful
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Do Me Now
instructions: Pour the 151, peach schnapps and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a frosted cocktail glass. Add a splash of Sprite, and serve cold.

name: Dobbs Ferry Fruit Punch
instructions: Take your shaker and fill it with ice. Then add the Absolut Vodka, the Fruit Punch, and lemonade. Close the shaker and shake for about 1 minute. Then pour into cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Dobroj Nochi
instructions: Mix the two in any order you see fit and enjoy. Substituting Strawberry Crush for Code Red is a good variation.

name: Doc Harris
description: Although a strange drink and an acquired taste for most, this will warm your body, freshen your breathe, and give the barmaid a reason to remember you.  Great for those that want a sipping drink with a non-"spirits" taste. Doc Harris was invented by Dr. Harris  (AKA Freak Boy) of Platteville, WI. Pour the Dr McGillicuddy's Mentholmint schnapps and Coca-cola into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add and stir with a stirring stick, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Dr McGillicuddy's Mentholmint schnapps and Coca-cola into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add and stir with a stirring stick, and serve.

name: Doctor
instructions: Mix it together and shake (not too hard). Pour it into an ordinary cocktail glass.

name: Doctor - Patient Relationship
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Doctor Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dodge Special
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Doggy Style On the Beach
instructions: Add all ingredients (except 7-Up) to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes, Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, top with 7-Up, and serve.

name: Doh Doh
instructions: Pour vodka, gin, lime juice and lemon juice into a medium-sized glass. Top with 7-up, to taste, and serve.

name: Dolly Iced Tea
instructions: Prepare iced tea as per usual or by instructions on can. Add grenadine and bitters to a cocktail glass, and pour in the iced tea mixture. Add vodka. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Dolores
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Dolphin Fin
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Dolphin's Foam
instructions: Shake vigorously in a shaker with lots of ice. Strain into a glass, garnish with a red cherry, and serve.

name: Dominican Coco Loco
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender with about a 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth and serve in a wine glass.

name: Dominican Goddess
instructions: Mix ruby red grapefruit juice and lemon-lime vintage seltzer water. Add the rum (as much as desired) and shake.

name: Don Giovanni
instructions: Pour liquids into a champagne saucer. Add a dollop of whipped cream to the center, sprinkle with chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Don Matteo
instructions: Stir together in a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Don Pablo
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Don Roberto Old-Fashioned
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with semi-crushed ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Don's Bloody Mary
instructions:
Put 4 or 5 ice cubes in a large old-fashioned glass and fill 3/4 full with Clamato juice. (Clamato may be mixed 1/2 and 1/2 with any other favorite tomato or veggie juice). Add the vodka, Worcestershire, Tabasco, and Horseradish and stir thoroughly with a spoon or swizzle. 

Twist the lime slice over the glass edge and stick a scallion in as a casual stirrer and delicious finish to the drink.

name: Don's Rusty Nail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a rocks glass.

name: Don's Sunset
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass with rocks (or straight into a cocktail glass).

name: Donald Cox
description: Donald Cox apparently originates from the 16th century when travellers did not have enough cans of Stella to last them for an hour (i.e. 30). So a man named Donald Cox created this recipe and is now popular wherever travelling bands and 'sweaty foxes' can be found.Combine ingredients together in a large container, mix and serve into cocktail glasses.
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a large container, mix and serve into cocktail glasses.

name: Donkey Semmen
instructions: Put 4 ice cubes in shaker. Add ingredients. shake well and serve in a margarita glass. Garnish with lime.

name: Donna Reed
instructions: Pour cranberry juice (more or less to taste) and sour mix over one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend for a few seconds, add vodka and blend again until frothy. Serve in a cocktail or margarita glass, or freeze until slushy.

name: Doo-littles
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cup. Stir well.

name: Doorknob
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Double Bubble
instructions: Mix the firewater and pina colada mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Double Fudge Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a chocolate straw, and serve.

name: Double Fudge Martini #2
instructions: Shake the Absolut vodka, Kahlua coffee liqueur, espresso coffee and chocolate topping with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. In a fresh shaker, shake cream and DeKuyper Buttershots (butterscotch liqueur) until thickened and float on top of the chocolate mix. Garnish with grated chocolate and chocoloate topping, and serve.

name: Double Standard Sour
instructions: Pour the whiskey, gin, lemon juice, sugar and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice, and serve.

name: Double Your Pleasure, Double Your Fun
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake, pour into cocktail glass and garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Double-O-Seven
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with crushed ice. Add Stoli O vodk, and almost fill the glass with 7-up. Top with a splash of orange juice, and serve.

name: Doublemint
instructions: Pour mint schnapps into an Irish coffee cup or glass and fill with hot coffee. Top with whipped cream, add creme de menthe for color, and serve.

name: Douglas Fairbanks
instructions: Shake ingredients extremely well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Douglas Martini
instructions: Pour the vermouth into a cocktail glass. Swirl it around until the glass is coated. Pour out excess vermouth. Place the glass in the freezer until thoroughly chilled. Shake the Stoli vodka with ice for at least 20 seconds. Pour into the chilled cocktail glass, garnish with two grapes, and serve.

name: Douglas Town
instructions: Pour the Kahlua, tequila and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Down and Dirty Dry Martini
instructions: Shake the gin and olive brine with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Rub the rib with a wedge of lemon and drop into glass. Garnish with two cocktail onions, and serve.

name: Down the Hatch
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Down Under
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Down Under Dreamsicle
instructions: Add Irish cream, OJ and carbonated water to a blender. Blend with ice and pour into a coupette glass. Add an orange wheel and a cherry, then float the rum on top.

name: Down Under Snowball
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender and blend with ice. Serve in a coupette glass.

name: Downhill Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Doyles' Deliberation
instructions: Pour vodka and melon liqueur into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dr. Blue
instructions: Put ice in glass if not chilled already. Then add the Blue Maui and fill with the Dr. Pepper.

name: Dr. Canadian
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Dr. Dewar's
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Add ice, stir again, and serve.

name: Dr. Dye's Revenge
instructions: Combine all ingredients over ice in this order: liquors, cranberry juice, ginger ale, aour mix, orange juice, and bitters. Cover and shake well. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Dr. Funk
instructions: Add liquid ingredients to crushed ice in shaker. Cut limes in half and squeeze into shaker, dropping in the shells; add sugar. Shake well; pour the whole mess into a 12-oz chimney glass; fill rest of glass with charged water and decorate with fruit or freshly picked geranium leaf.

name: Dr. Gold's
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dr. Jager
instructions: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a cocktail glass; stir and serve.

name: Dr. Jim
instructions: Stir together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

ingredients.name: Jim Beam Black Label bourbon whiskey

name: Dr. Monkey
instructions: Mix vodka and Dr. Pepper in a glass and garnish with a lemon slice on the side.

name: Dr. Pepper Slammer
instructions: Add beer and Dr. Pepper into a pint glass. Drop a shot glass full of coconut liqueur into the glass and drink quick.

name: Dr. Peppermint
instructions: Mix together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Dr. Vodka
instructions: Pour ingredients, stir, and serve on the rocks. Enjoy!

name: Dracona
instructions: Pour Adocaat and orange fruit juice straight into the glass, there will be a little curdling but dont worry. Add the ice cubes into the glass then Sambuca , slide creme de menthe down the side. A yellow green yellow formation should occur, then add lemonade.

name: Dragon Piss #2
instructions: Pour the tequila and Midori liqueur into a cocktail glass. Top with Mountain Dew, and serve.

name: Dragon Slayer
instructions: Shake all ingredients except grenadine and 7-up in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a sour glass. Top with 7-up and add a dash of grenadine.

name: Dragoon
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a pousse cafe glass.

name: Drambuie Cider
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug, and serve with a cinnamon stick.

name: Drambuie Espresso Martini
instructions: Combine all three ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dream Cocktail #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dreamin' Caribbean Cocktail
instructions:
In a shaker filled with ice, combine the Midori, Bacardi rum and pineapple juice. Shake well until the shaker is too cold to hold. Then strain the contents into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

Rinse shaker, then fill again with ice. Combine the blue Curacao and Coco Lopez cream of coconut. Shake well until the shaker is too cold to hold. Then strain contents into the same glass in three seperate spot pours around the inner wall of the glass.

You now have created a cocktail with the appearence of the Caribbean ocean having the patchwork look of rich blue and sea green waters.

name: Dreaming in Antalya
instructions: Mix in a mixing glass with ice cubes and pour into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Dreamsicle
instructions: In a lowball glass combine the two and stir.

name: Dreamsicle #5
description: This recipe was picked up in Fayetteville, Arkansas in the mid 70's. The Dreamsicle drink has quite a few (completely different) variations, but this is probably one of the earlier and more original versions, and it really tastes like the old dreamsicle popsicle.Combine creme de noyaux, orange juice and half-and-half with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
instructions: Combine creme de noyaux, orange juice and half-and-half with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dreamy Banana Smoothie
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. The milk is optional, it gives a milder taste. Garnish with a slice of banana on rim of the glass.

name: Dreamy Chocolate Winter
instructions: Pour kahlua and irish cream into a heatproof cup with hot chocolate. Add amaretto, to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Dreamy Winter
instructions: Pour hot chocolate into a heatproof cup. Add irish cream, to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Dreamy Winter Delight
instructions: Pour irish cream into a heatproof cup with hot chocolate. Add amaretto, to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Dreamy Winter Night
instructions: Pour hot chocolate into a heatproof cup. Add amaretto, to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Dressed Up Like A Dogs Dinner
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Drew Special
instructions: Pour Sparks Plus into glass and drop in a shot of Jagermeister.

name: Drink of the Gods
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Droog's Date Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Drool
instructions: Pour aftershock into milk mix until light pink. Drink up.

name: Drug Test Specimen
instructions: Mix it all up and pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Drunk on Christmas
instructions: Mix and shake irish whiskey, midori, and apple schnapps with ice. Fill whiskey sour glass with ice. Strain mixture over ice in glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix. Garnish with several free floating maraschino cherries.

name: Drunken Monkey's Lunch
instructions: Pour the Kahlua, vodka, banana liqueur over cubed ice in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with milk.

name: Drunken Stupor
instructions: Pour the rye whiskey, Kahlua coffee liqueur and vodka into a beer mug. Top with Pepsi cola, and serve.

name: Drunken Superman
description: Drunken Superman, invented by Jarrod Brecht, is a popular drink in South Florida, South Carolina and New England.Combine all ingredients except 151 rum in a cocktail shaker and shake briskly. Pour over ice in a margarita glass, and add 151 over the top. Add a slice of orange, and serve..
instructions: Combine all ingredients except 151 rum in a cocktail shaker and shake briskly. Pour over ice in a margarita glass, and add 151 over the top. Add a slice of orange, and serve..

name: Dry Brandy Manhattan
instructions: Pour the brandy and dry vermouth into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir, garnish with 2 olives, and serve.

name: Dry Chocolate
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Dry Manhattan
instructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Dry Manhattan #2
instructions: Stir vermouth and blended whiskey with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with the olive as garnish.

name: Dry Martini
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive, and serve.

name: Dry Negroni Cocktail
instructions: Pour Campari, gin and vermouth into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Dry Rob Roy
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Du Barry Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Dubliner
instructions: Pour liquor into a mixing glass with ice and stir to chill. Strain into a goblet, top with cream, and serve.

name: Dubonnet Cassis
instructions: Stir dubonnet and creme de cassis over ice cubes in an aperitif glass. Fill with soda, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Dubonnet Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Dubonnet Kiss
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Add a thin slice of Red Delicious apple and serve.

name: Dubonnet Manhattan

name: Duchess

name: Duck Cocktail

name: Duck Sauce

name: Duck Shit Inn

name: Duck Soup

name: Duke Cocktail

name: Duke of Marlboro

name: Eclipse

name: Ectoplasm
description: The Ectoplasm is a hideous-looking green drink resembling the green slime from Ghostbusters. It also has a kick like a mule.Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Eenytini
instructions:
Pour blue curacao, gin and 7-up/sprite into a shaker tin filled with ice, swirl until tin is frosty. Pour into a cocktail glass. Repeat this with the cranberry juice and add to glass so that an electric-purple colour is achieved. 

Garnish with a cherry on a sparkler stick.

name: Egril

name: Ejhazz

name: Ekatherina Andreevna
instructions: Always put ice in glass first to cool the mixers when they are poured.

Pour a splash of grenadine syrup on top and serve.

name: Eucalyptus Martini
description: Created by bartender Humberto Marques in Oloroso cocktail bar, Edinburgh. Eucalyptus is perhaps a perfect compliment to the unique blend of herbs and botanicals that makes Millers gin. The inherent classic dry taste of this gin balanced by the citrus of cointreau and lime make the taste of this drink as special as it is.Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Double-strain into a cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with 4 eucalyptus leaves, and serve.

name: Fedbergs Favorite Caipirinha
description: Invented by former bartender Nikolaj Hyldig, in his search for the perfect summer drink.Slice a lime into eight slices and put two into a glass. Pour the tablespoons of cane sugar over it, and mash these together - if you don't have a long shafted mortar, the end of a ladle can be used. Pour coarsely crushed ice-cubes to the brim of the glass, and fill it with the Havana Club white rum. Serve with medium sized straight straws. Vary the lime / cane sugar ratio according to personal taste.
instructions: Slice a lime into eight slices and put two into a glass. Pour the tablespoons of cane sugar over it, and mash these together - if you don't have a long shafted mortar, the end of a ladle can be used. Pour coarsely crushed ice-cubes to the brim of the glass, and fill it with the Havana Club white rum. Serve with medium sized straight straws. Vary the lime / cane sugar ratio according to personal taste.

name: Federal Law
instructions: Fill a short glass with ice cubes. Add the Absolut Kurant vodka, Chambord raspbery liqueur, sour mix and cranberry juice. Stir well. Splash tonic water; stir again. Garnish as desired, and serve.

name: Federal Punch
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared cherry, and serve.

name: Feel The Burn
instructions: Layer all ingredients and light on fire to warm. Blow out flame and drink in one gulp.

name: Feeler Cocktail
instructions: Blend everything together in a blender and serve in champagne glasses.

name: Felching Banana
instructions: Combine ingredients into warmed old fashioned glass or shooter and drink through a straw.

name: Feliz Natal
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in the glass with a couple of ice cubes and enjoy!

name: Felony
instructions: Pour ingredients on the rocks.

name: Fern Gully
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a wine glass.

name: Fernet Branca Cocktail
instructions: Stir with ice to chill and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: Fernet Con Coca
instructions: Put some ice in a cocktail glass. Pour the fernet and then fill with coke. No mixing required.

name: Fernet with Coke
description: Fernet with Coke is one of the most popular drinks in Argentina. The Coca-cola (or Coke) should be cold but the Fernet Branca can be at a normal temperature.Place 2 or 3 ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Pour Fernet Branca over the ice, then holding the glass in a diagonal way, slowly pour the coke.
instructions: Place 2 or 3 ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Pour Fernet Branca over the ice, then holding the glass in a diagonal way, slowly pour the coke.

name: Ferocious Flip
instructions: Pour the brandy, port, egg, sugar and cream into a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a dusting of nutmeg, and serve.

name: Ferrari
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in a small highball glass, and serve.

name: Ferris Wheel
instructions: Pour the Sambuca and brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ce cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Festival Cocktail
instructions: Shake everything with ice; pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Festrus
instructions: Stir in mixing glass. Pour into cocktail glass and add a squeeze of orange peel.

name: Fiddlers Toast
instructions: Pour champagne, grand marnier and juices into a wine goblet three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add a slice of orange, and float a curacao-soaked sugar cube on top. Serve with short straws.

name: Field Artillery Special
instructions: In a shaker, combine bourbon, Jagermeister, powerade and ice. Shake well, strain and add to glass. Float everclear on top. Drink as a shooter.

name: Field of Hearts
instructions: In a cocktail glass, layer the strawberry liqueur onto the midori. Shake and strain frangelico, and layer onto the strawberry liqueur. On top of the creamy layer, add a couple of drops of red or pink food dye, run a toothpick through the center of each drop to create a heart shape. Garnish with an open strawberry.

name: Fierce 151
instructions: Pour 2 shots of Bacardi 151 into a cup full of Gatorade Fierce Grape. Mix well and drink.

name: Fiesta
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in a mixing glass, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fiestafied
description: Fiestafied was invented in the party town of Tavstock in South Devon, by Joanne Solman with friends Alice and Jessica. The lime mix is a premade combination of lime juice and sugar. Adjust to taste.Pour the Southern Comfort peach liqueur over crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Add the amaretto almond liqueur and lime syrup. Top with lemonade, stir and serve.
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort peach liqueur over crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Add the amaretto almond liqueur and lime syrup. Top with lemonade, stir and serve.

name: Fifty-Fifty
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cocktail olive.

name: Figs and the City
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass, and serve.

name: Filby
instructions: Stir everything with ice; strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Filthy Bitch
instructions: Mix drink ingredients together, shake for 5 seconds, serve over ice in a cocktail glass. Best enjoyed while bubbles are still "fizzing".

name: Fin n' Tonic
instructions: Mix ingredients and serve over ice.

name: Fine and Dandy
instructions: Combine the whisky, Dubonnet, Cointreau and bitters in an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Finn Roses
instructions: Stir and serve.

name: Fino Martini
instructions: In a mixing glas half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin or vodka and the sherry. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Fiorenza
