instructions: Pour the rum, amaretto and cola into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain over ice cubes in a brandy snifter, and serve.

name: Fire in the Disco
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker, and shake vigorously. Ensure the red curry paste is thoroughly dissolved. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fire in the Sky
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur into a cocktail glass. Carefully layer the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur on top. Do the same with the Tia Maria coffee liqueur, strawberry liqueur, and finally the cream. Add shaved ice. Fill a straw with grenadine and, after placing the straw on the base of the glass, release. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles, and serve.

name: Fireball
instructions: Mix the schnapps, southern comfort and tabasco sauce. Pour into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Firebird
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Firecracker
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Rocks Glass filled with ice.

name: Firehammer
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: First Avenue
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: First Degree Burn
instructions: Add the Fireball whiskey to the cranberry juice in a cup. Stir and serve.

name: First Love
instructions: Pour the champagne, gin, sugar and cherry heering into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: First Nighter
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Fish Bowl
instructions: Mix raspberry rum and Tropical Sprite in a glass. Add juice from one lemon wedge (or the whole wedge if you want). Drop in a couple of red Swedish fish candies.

name: Fish Lips
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fist Fight
instructions: Shake everything together and serve.

name: Fisting in a Mexican Prison
instructions: Shake the tequila, cranberry juice and the lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Fitzgerald
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Five Before Flying
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, Southern Comfort, creme de bananes, brandy, creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon, so that it floats on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Five in the Morning
instructions: Place ice in glass and pour in the five liquors. Next pour in the the orange juice and the sour mix. Finally shake and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Five-Dollar Margaret
instructions: Shake everything with ice and strain into a sour glass.

name: Fizzgig
instructions: Stir everything in a champagne glass. (Make sure the champagne is chilled first). Garnish with a lemon twist if desired.

name: Fizzle
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Put cherry, lime, mango, and orange on a straw for garnish.

name: Fjord
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Flageln
instructions: Pour the vodka into the glass first, then pour the red bull slowly into it. Add ice.

name: Flame of Love
instructions: Swirl the sherry in an old-fashioned glass to coat. Add vodka, garnish with orange peel, and serve.

name: Flamenco
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Flaming Blue Lamborghini
instructions: Take the 151 and put it into a cocktail glass. Light it on fire. Put two straws into the drink, begin to drink, and immediately pour the Kahlua and Spiced Rum into the glass. Then pour the Blue Maui and Milk into the glass and finish the drink off.

name: Flaming Delicious
description: This drink was originally invented in 1974 by Edwin Marshall at his bar in Philadelphia. Its popularity spread to other area bars until it became a nationwide sensation.Combine Everclear, Aristocrat vodka, triple sec and tequila in a cocktail shaker. Add heavy cream, salt, and molasses and decant into a wine goblet. Apply a flame, wait for 10 seconds, then cover goblet. Apply lemon twists and Worcestershire sauce and consume.
instructions: Combine Everclear, Aristocrat vodka, triple sec and tequila in a cocktail shaker. Add heavy cream, salt, and molasses and decant into a wine goblet. Apply a flame, wait for 10 seconds, then cover goblet. Apply lemon twists and Worcestershire sauce and consume.

name: Flaming Ferrari
instructions: Pour the rums into an old-fashioned glass. Seperately, pour the blue curacao into a double-shot glass. Ignite the rum mixture (use extreme caution) and suck with a straw; at the same time pour the blue curacao into the glass and finish.

name: Flaming Jagerbomb
instructions: Pour Red Bull into a glass. Ignite a shot glass of JíƒÂ¤germeister and drop it into the glass of Red Bull. Drink fast.

name: Flaming Kevin
instructions: Just mix and stir.

name: Flaming Lamborghini
instructions: Pour the sambuca and kahlua into a cocktail glass. Pour the baileys and blue curacao into two seperate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concoction in the cocktail glass and start to drink through a straw (this drink should be drunk in one). As the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the baileys and blue curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone.

name: Flaming Lamborghini #2
instructions:
Take a martini glass and set it on the table. Inside the martini glass put 1/2 ounce of curacao blue and 1/2 ounce of chartreuse green. Then place a 2 inch wide spacer on top of the martini glass so that you can place 3 cocktail glasses one on top of the other above the martini glass (upside down). 

Inside a separate brandy glass put 1 and 1/2 ounces of white sambuca and heat with an open flame and allow to catch on fire. Once lit pour the sambuce over the top upside down cocktail glass and let the flaming liquid flow down once it reaches the bottom glass.

Pour 1 ounce of galliano and 1 ounce of baileys into the martini glass where you already should have the 1/2 ounce of chartreuse and 1/2 ounce of curacao. Place a straw in the martini glass and the party drinking the drink sucks it dry and hopefully doesnt catch on fire. Enjoy.

name: Flaming Shocker
instructions: Add Aftershock, spiced rum and triple sec to glass and mix. Then add 151 to top and light on fire. Very spicy drink.

name: Flamingo Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Flamingo Squeezer
instructions:
Squeeze the juice of the orange into an empty cocktail shaker, then add rum, cream of coconut and grenadine and shake. Fill pint glass with ice and pour the shaker contents over the ice. Place a tiny plastic pink flamingo on the rim and serve with a straw.

For flair, combine all the ingredients except the Grenadine and pour over the ice. Put the drops of grenadine on top, then right before serving, stir it front of your guest.

name: Flapjack Shooter
instructions: Shake and strain into a cordial glass, and serve.

name: Flapper
instructions: Pour the rum and vermouth into a cocktail glass. Sweeten to taste. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Flatlander's Folly
instructions: Pour the grapefruit juice and Yukon Jack into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Flatliner #2
instructions: Shake goldschlager and grand marnier well in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a chilled cocktail/martini glass, top with bacardi 151 rum, and serve. (Can ignite rum if desired for optimal effect.)

name: Flavor Flav
instructions: Chill all ingredients. Pour Hypnotiq into a plastic cup. Add cognac, then JíƒÂ¤germesiter. Stir.

name: Fleet Street
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fleur De Lis
instructions: Shake both ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Flicker
instructions: Blend everything together and pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Flim Flam
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Flirtini
instructions: Muddle the pineapple pieces and cointreau in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add vodka and pineapple juice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and top with champagne. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Florida Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Florida Daiquiri
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Florida Rain
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Florida Special
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Florida Sunshine
instructions: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Floridanian
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

ingredients.name: Sunny Delight® California Style orange juice

name: Flower Of Nippon
instructions: Blend with ice and strained in to the cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of lime and red cherry.

name: Fluffy Cocktail
instructions: Pour the rums and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain over crushed ice in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fluffy Dog
instructions: Mix both ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass or serve over ice.

name: Fluffy Duck
instructions: Pour the creme de cacao into a chilled margarita glass one-quarter filled with crushed ice. Add the advocaat, and slowly fill with 7-up or soda. Stir, and serve.

name: Fluffy F
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Fluffy Pink Slipper
instructions: Simply shake/whisk/blend proportions of ingredients to taste and serve in a tall cordial glass. The more cherry brandy you add the pinker the slipper becomes. Whereas, the more you whisk the 'fluffier' it becomes.

name: Fluorescent Dream
instructions: Pour into a glass half filled with ice. Stir well.

name: Flying Dutchman
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

name: Flying Flamingo
instructions: Throw all ingredients into a blender and mix at medium speed, drink before ice melts.

name: Flying Fortress
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Flying Fuck
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Flying Grasshopper
instructions: Shake briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Serve with a short straw in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Flying Masturbator
instructions: Pour the vodka and amaretto into the cup first. Add OJ until the cup is about half full, add cranberry juice until the glass is about 3/4 full, add ice to fill the cup, and shake the drink vigorously for a few seconds. Enjoy.

name: Flying Scotsman
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Focal Point
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, light rum, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink, and serve.

name: Foggy Afternoon
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Foggy Day
instructions: Pour gin and pernod into an aperitif glass, fill with cold water, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Folke West
description: The original recipe for Folke West, created on merchant ship Viking Gabriella by customer Petri Viinikainen in 2001 consists of Rhum de Martinique by Altia Oyj, Helsinki, Finland and also brown creme de cacao by the same makers. We recommend you look for these when possible.Pour Martinique rum over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add brown creme de cacao, and serve.
instructions: Pour Martinique rum over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add brown creme de cacao, and serve.

name: Fondaudege
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Fondling Fool
instructions: Pour the brandy, madeira wine and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fontainebleau Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Foot in the Ass
instructions: Fill beer mug with 6 oz. of Vodka. Splash Apple Juice and Orange Juice in with it. Drink fast, cause it tastes bad. Get ready, it feels like a foot in the ass!

name: Football
instructions: Fill a glass with fernet branca. Drop in a splash of cream, either whipped or foamed, and serve.

name: Forbidden Smoke
instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Add a piece of edible dry ice.

name: Forest Dream
description: Created by Benjamin Lei at the Eastcoast Bar & Grill in Singapore, Beacon.Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with lime wheel and serve.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with lime wheel and serve.

name: Forester
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry if desired.

name: Forget-Me-Not
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Forgive Me
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fort Lauderdale
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Forza FCK
instructions: Mix the tequila, vodka, banana liqueur and coconut milk together. Shake it well together with crushed ice, and put it in an glass. Last, pour the creme de menthe into the glass so that it sinks to bottom of the glass.

name: Four Horsemen #3
description: The taste of this Four Horsemen recipe reminds most of Cinnaburst or Big Red gum, a very potent cinnimon flavor that will curl the hairs in your nose (and the person in the direct line of your exhale).Pour contents into an old-fashioned glass, give a slight stir and serve.
instructions: Pour contents into an old-fashioned glass, give a slight stir and serve.

name: Four Horsemen Hell Breed
instructions: Chill all ingredients except 151 rum. Add to glass finishing with 151 on top.

name: Four Roses Cocktail
instructions: Shake well in cracked ice, strain into cocktail glasses, serve with twists of lemon peel. Serves four.

name: Fox And Hounds
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fox River Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fox Trot
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Foxhound
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Foxy Lady
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Fraise de Champagne
instructions: Pour into a champagne saucer, and serve.

ingredients.name: Marie Brizard® Creme de Fraise des Bois

name: Francine
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add lemonade. Garnish with a lemon slice and sugar-dipped raspberry, and serve.

name: Frank Sinatra
description: This drink originated in Philadelphia, adapted by Michael S. Berlinger, but its popularity faded as the bar that created it changed ownership.  This drink can be considered a martini, but make sure to hold the olive.  It is a rather refreshing, sweet cocktail that is best enjoyed in the summer time.Get a martini shaker.  Add a few ice cubes, then add all ingredients.  Shake for ten seconds and serve in a martini glass or cocktail glass with a lemon twist.
instructions: Get a martini shaker.  Add a few ice cubes, then add all ingredients.  Shake for ten seconds and serve in a martini glass or cocktail glass with a lemon twist.

name: Frankenjack Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry and serve.

name: Franko Ra
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Frappe Ramal 5
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with ice. Serve in margarita glasses.

name: Fraser
instructions: Pour both ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Freakin' Willy
description: Freakin' Willy is almost identical to the Alabama Slammer. The main change is use of lime juice in preference of lemon or orange juice. It's a house cocktail in many of the bars in Winnipeg, Manitoba.Pour southern comfort over ice into a 3oz cocktail glass. Add amaretto and fill with lime juice. If desired, rim the glass with sugar for extra flavouring.
instructions: Pour southern comfort over ice into a 3oz cocktail glass. Add amaretto and fill with lime juice. If desired, rim the glass with sugar for extra flavouring.

name: Freefall
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass, and stir. Decorate with a piece of pineapple and a cherry. Serve.

name: French 95
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) with ice and strain into an ice-filled goblet. Top with champagne, and serve.

name: French Afternoon
instructions: Served on ice in a rocks glass. May be served with a little whipped cream on top.

name: French Bite
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: French Connection
instructions: Pour ingredients into a old-fashioned glass over ice, stir, and serve.

name: French Connection #2
instructions: Combine ingredients into a snifter and serve neat, or add a small amount of ice if desired.

name: French Cosmopolitan
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except grenadine) into a shaker, shake well and strain into a chilled large martini glass. Pour a drop of grenadine into the middle of the glass and let it fall to bottom. (It will color the stem red.) Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: French Daiquiri
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: French Dream
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: French Flamingo
instructions: Shake ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime peel, and serve.

name: French Gimlet
description:
"I first had this drink 20 years ago at a now closed five-star French
restaurant in San Antonio, Chez Ardid.  The 100 proof Vodka is essential  to making it right.  Most places don't carry 100 proof vodka, but will usually stock it if you area  regular, especially if you ask for Smirnoff, because it is not outrageously priced (20 percent more than 80 proof)."  David Anthony Richelieu, San Antonio TexasVery simple.  Just put some large ice cubes in a cocktail glass, add the  ingredients:  (2 jiggers of Smirnoff 100 proof Vodka, 1 jigger of Cointreau and 1 jigger of Rose's Lime Juice).  Stir.  Lime wedge on rim optional.  Drink. 

It is imperative that the ingredients be carefully measured because the amount of liquid is small (no water, soda etc,) and casual measurements can easily throw off the balance between the drink's sweet and sour flavors.

Smirnoff 100 proof is the clearest, most neutral tasting of the vodkas and Smirnoff is by far the least expensive of the high-test bottles  (vs.  Finlandia, Absolut and Stoly).
instructions:
Very simple.  Just put some large ice cubes in a cocktail glass, add the  ingredients:  (2 jiggers of Smirnoff 100 proof Vodka, 1 jigger of Cointreau and 1 jigger of Rose's Lime Juice).  Stir.  Lime wedge on rim optional.  Drink. 

It is imperative that the ingredients be carefully measured because the amount of liquid is small (no water, soda etc,) and casual measurements can easily throw off the balance between the drink's sweet and sour flavors.

Smirnoff 100 proof is the clearest, most neutral tasting of the vodkas and Smirnoff is by far the least expensive of the high-test bottles  (vs.  Finlandia, Absolut and Stoly).

name: French Green Dragon
instructions: Pour the cognac and green chartreuse into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: French Horn
instructions: Stir and strain into a cordial glass. Garnish with a speared cherry, and serve.

name: French Kiss
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a speared cherry or raspberry, and serve.

name: French Lift
instructions: Add glass half filled with chilled sparkling wine. Add grenadine and fill with bottled water. Drop in blueberries.

name: French Martini
instructions: Pour each of the above into a tall bar glass. Shake with ice, pour into a cocktail or martini glass, and serve.

name: French Martini #2
instructions: Place all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Can also be served on the rocks.

name: French Monkey
instructions: Add the 2 together and you've got "French Monkey Madness!".

name: French Night
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: French Orgasm
instructions: Pour the cognac into a brandy glass. Add irish cream, and serve unstirred.

name: French Port
instructions: Stir port and cognac in a glass with about three ice cubes. Perfect if your port is too sweet or you aren't up for just cognac.

name: French Rose Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: French Sailor
instructions: Mix warm cointreau and vodka into a tumbler with a cube of sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved.

name: French Toast #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: French Vanilla Godiva
instructions: Stir everything with a spoon.

name: French Watermelon Matini
instructions: Add the vodka, Chambord raspberry liqueur and Rose's watermelon cocktail infusion to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: French Whore
instructions: Shake vigorously over ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Frenchie
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail or rocks glass and stir.

name: Fresh Melon Martini
instructions: Cut up both melons and add to blender. Blend well and strain. Add Skyy melon vodka to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add about 2-4 oz of the blended melon juice. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a melon ball for garnish, and serve.

name: Fretful Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with an olive, and serve.

name: Friar Tuck
instructions: Shake and pour into a v-shape, and garnish with cinnamon.

name: Friar Tuck #2
instructions: Pour the Frangelico, brandy, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Friar's Luck
instructions: Mix the dark rum, juice, grenadine and Frangelico in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Frightleberry Murzenquest
instructions: Pour the vodka, Galliano, Cointreau, lime juice, maraschino liqueur and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Frisco Cocktail
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Frisco Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

name: Frisco Sour
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Squeeze in an orange wedge, garnish with a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Friskt Normansson
description: Named after the Norwegian poet Ekir Normansson, who was the first to mix the said cocktail and who had quite a few in his time. "Friskt" is a Swedish word and can mean cool, chilly or healthy.Shake with ice and strain in a chilled old-fashioned glass.
instructions: Shake with ice and strain in a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Frodka
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Frog Nuts
instructions: Put in a cooler and shake it.

name: Frooty Biznitch
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry, and serve.

name: Frost Bite
instructions: Mix vodka and icewine in a shaker with ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the grapes at the bottom, and serve.

name: Frosted Coke
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Add Coca-Cola, and serve.

name: Frosty Lay
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with 2 cranberries and a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Froth Blower Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Frothy Snowman
instructions: Combine Kahlua, vodka, milk, and chocolate in blender. Blend until frothy. Serve over ice in a large cocktail glass.

name: Froupe Cocktail
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail glass, stir and serve.

name: Frozen Apple
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frozen Aquavit
instructions: Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer heaped with crushed ice.

name: Frozen Barcelona
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender with three-quarters of a cup of crushed ice. Pour into a london dock or sherry glass, garnish with a light dusting of cinnamon, and serve.

name: Frozen Berkeley
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Frozen Bikini
instructions: Blend everything except champagne until smooth. Transfer to glass and top with champagne.

name: Frozen Black Irish
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Pour into a double-cocktail glass, garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Frozen Blue Daiquiri
instructions: Put all the ingredient into a blender. Blend at medium speed for about 20 seconds. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Frozen Brandy And Rum
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frozen Bull
instructions: Blend vodka and ice cubes in a bar blender until slushy. Pour into a cocktail glass and fill with Red Bull. Stir.

name: Frozen Cherry Daiquiri
instructions: Place all ingredients in blender with a cup of crushed ice and blend well. Serve in a margarita or hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Frozen Daiquiri
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Fruit Daiquiri
instructions:
Add pieces of a chosen fruit, syrup (of that chosen fruit), rums, sugar, lime juice and crushed ice to a blender, and blend. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Popular fruits to choose; bananas, pineapples and strawberries.

name: Frozen Fuzzy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 1/3 cup of crushed ice. Blend on low for 5 seconds then on high until firm. Pour into a cocktail glass, garnish with a slice of lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Frozen Gael
instructions: Blend briefly in a double-cocktail glass with a tablespoon of crushed ice. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Frozen Key Lime
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Leprechaun
instructions: Blend ingredients (except mint sprig) in a bar blender with ice until smooth. Pour into glass and garnish with mint leaf.

name: Frozen Margarita
instructions: Place salt in a saucer. Rub rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge and dip glass into salt to coat rim thoroughly, reserve lime. Pour tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and crushed ice into a blender. Blend well at high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Frozen Margarita #2
instructions: In a blender, add the can of limeade. Using the empty can measure the tequila and the triple sec and add to the blender. Blend, adding ice cubes until the drink becomes slushy and holds in peaks. Serves 4.

name: Frozen Martini
instructions: Place both ingredients, a cocktail shaker, a cocktail glass and 2 almond-stuffed olives in a freezer for approximately 4 hours. Remove when ready. Pour the gin and vermouth into the chilled cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the 2 almond-stuffed olives, and serve.

name: Frozen Matador
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, add the pineapple stick, and serve.

name: Frozen Melon Ball
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared melon ball and lime slice, and serve with a short straw.

name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Frozen Pussy
instructions: Place Irish Cream , strawberry liqueur and grenadine in a shaker with ice, and shake. Strain into cocktail glass and fill with 7-Up.

name: Frozen Real Strawberry Margarita
instructions: Mix the limeade, Cointreau and tequila in a mixing glass. Add 2 cups of ice to a blender, and add the strawberries and tequila mixture. Blend until smooth (thin with tequila if necessary). Serve in a margarita glass.

name: Frozen Sex
instructions: Put six scoops ice cream in blender, follow with alcohols. When blended, add ice and push to bottom of blender with rest of ice cream. Makes two big cups.

name: Frozen Southern Comfort
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass.

name: Frozen Strawberry Daiquiri
instructions: Pour the rum and lemon juice and sugar into a champagne saucer with some shaved ice. Stir well. Garnish with 4 strawberries, sliced or otherwise, and serve.

name: Frozen Strawberry Margarita
instructions: Pour all ingredients over finely shaven ice in a margarita glass, and serve.

name: Frozen Strawberry-Rhubarb Daiquiri
description:
"First created in a kitchen in Oakland, CA in the early 80's (thanx Pug!) and perfected through world travel ever since...this is smooooth but lethal."Roughly chop 1/2 lb. fresh rhubarb and heat in pan with 3/4 cup sugar.  Stir until sugar dissolves, bringing mixture to the boil.  Cover and simmer 8 minutes, then add 2 cups topped and sliced strawberries.  Bring back to the boil for 2 minutes, then let mixture cool.

Mix equal amounts of strawberry-rhubarb mixture, 151 proof rum and lime juice in blender (in a standard 40-oz. blender I like to use 10-12 oz. each of mixture, rum & lime juice, then fill to near the top with ice).  Blend until smooth and serve immediately in chilled cocktail glasses.
instructions:
Roughly chop 1/2 lb. fresh rhubarb and heat in pan with 3/4 cup sugar.  Stir until sugar dissolves, bringing mixture to the boil.  Cover and simmer 8 minutes, then add 2 cups topped and sliced strawberries.  Bring back to the boil for 2 minutes, then let mixture cool.

Mix equal amounts of strawberry-rhubarb mixture, 151 proof rum and lime juice in blender (in a standard 40-oz. blender I like to use 10-12 oz. each of mixture, rum & lime juice, then fill to near the top with ice).  Blend until smooth and serve immediately in chilled cocktail glasses.

name: Fruit Blast Martini Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a martini glass and garnish with a strawberry.

name: Fruit Fly
instructions: Drain syrup from the fruit cocktail. Mix fruit and cinnamon with 4 ice cubes in a blender. Add whisky according to taste. Let blend for about 2 1/2 minutes at high setting.

name: Fruit Frappe
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass, and pour into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Serve with a short straw.

name: Fruit Lush
instructions: Mix ingredients in order, stir, enjoy.

name: Fruit Rum Frappe
instructions: Pour the rum, creme de bananes, creme de cassis and orange juice into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: Combine all ingredients, pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fruit Salad Daiquiri
instructions: Fill blender 1/2 to 3/4 full with ice and add strawberries, pieces of watermelon, and slices of star fruit. Last add rum and pina colada mix. Blend until smooth and garnish with a slice of star fruit and an umbrella.

name: Fruit Tingle
instructions: Pour curacao over ice in a tumbler. Add raspberry cordial and lemonade at the same time so that the combined effect mixes the drink. Tastes like the lollies called Fruit Tingles.

name: Fruits of the Desert
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Fruity Pebble #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Fruity Pebbles #2
instructions: Mix ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into glass of choice - martini or margarita preferably. This really does taste like fruity pebbles. The above ought to make 1 large drink or two medium sized drinks.

name: Fruity Slut
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fruity Smash
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into a large hurricane glass. Garnish with maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Fruity Sprite Kicker
instructions: Add some ice into a beer mug. Add 4 oz. of Everclear, 6 oz. of strawberry margarita mix, and 8 oz. of sprite to the mug. Stir and enjoy.

name: Fruity Toad
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Frye's Crazy Lime
instructions: Add Sour Apple Pucker and Triple Sec to a cocktail glass. Add lime or lemon-lime Kool-aid. Stir and serve. Ice optional.

name: Frye's Tropical Blast
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a double rocks glass.

name: Fuck Me By The Pool
instructions: Start with one part Blue Maui, add one part Peach schnapps, and finish it up with orange juice.

name: Fuck Me Hard
instructions: Mix everything well and serve over ice.

name: Fucked by a Pharaoh
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Fucked Up Frozen Lemonade
instructions: Squeeze lemons into blender, and blend all ingredients together. Coat the rims of the glasses with sugar and pour in the mixture.

name: Fucked Up Lemonade
instructions: Mix ingredients in cup.

name: Fucked Up New Year
description: Fucker Up New Year is a fruity drink that packs a punch at the end so watch out. This drink was invented by Aj from Fayetteville, AR on the 2004 New Year and was a party favorite. You can use Heaven Hill bourbon whiskey or Smirnoff vodka as the base ingredient.Pour vodka into an old-fashioned glass until one-quarter full. Pour Welches strawberry breeze into the glass until one inch from the top. Add coke to top off, stir, and serve.
instructions: Pour vodka into an old-fashioned glass until one-quarter full. Pour Welches strawberry breeze into the glass until one inch from the top. Add coke to top off, stir, and serve.

name: Fucking Hot
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir briefly and serve.

name: Fudge Slide
instructions: Pour each ingredient into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fuji Apple
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Fuka
instructions: Pour all contents in glass over cubed ice and mix together.

name: Full Moon
instructions: Pour above ingredients into an ice-filled rocks glass, and serve.

name: Full Moon #2
instructions: Tilt a brandy snifter and pour in the amaretto. While still tilting, add grand marnier. Gently "roll" snifter in the tilted position, set upright, and serve.

name: Fun Ship
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker, filling with equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice. Shake and strain into cocktail glasses.

name: Fuquay Friday Night
instructions: Add absolut kurant and sprite to a cocktail glass. Mix in the grenadine syrup, and add the cherry cola. Serve. Add a dash of lime for a slightly different taste.

name: Fury
instructions: In a whiskey glass with ice, add equal parts vodka and spiced rum, a splash of sour mix, then top off with orange juice.

name: Fusion Rioja
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour (do not strain) into a highball glass and garnish with cherries.

name: Futurity
instructions: Pour the gin and vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the angostura bitters, and serve.

name: Fuzzball
instructions: Fill a cup 2/3 with sprite, 1/3 with peach schnapps, and add ice.

name: Fuzzy Bear
instructions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail glass with 1 1/2 oz of crushed ice. Pour the cola and milk simultaneously until full, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Bull
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over ice and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Fuzzy Cooter
instructions: Add the shots, and fill the rest with ginger ale, lemonade, and orange juice to taste.

name: Fuzzy Driver
instructions: Fill glass with ice.  Pour ingredients over ice, insert straw and enjoy! For a sweeter drink, substibute Original Sunny Delight for Orange Juice.

name: Fuzzy Duck
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Hard Navel
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into an old-fashioned or highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Logic #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and mix vigorously. Pour into glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Martini
instructions: Combine vodka and schnapps over lots of ice. Stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with fresh slice of peach.

name: Fuzzy Monkey #2
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Navel #2
instructions: Orange juice last, stir, and enjoy!

name: Fuzzy Pecker
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned rocks glass. Drink like a shot.

name: Fuzzy Pissbomb
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, and stir.

name: Fuzzy Rita
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Fuzzyberry
instructions: Mix ingredients together and top with ice.

name: G-Boy
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a sour glass.

name: G-Drink
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: G-Spot Martini
description: Originated as the perfectly refreshing, yet classy drink for Miami hot spots. G is the initial of its inventor's first name.Shake ingredients with ice and pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with one fresh rasberry, and serve.
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with one fresh rasberry, and serve.

name: G-String
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gadzooks
instructions: Pour vermouth, apricot brandy, gin, cherry brandy and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Gagarin
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except babycham) and strain into a cocktail glass. Add babycham, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Gagliardo
instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

name: Gala Appletini
instructions: In a shaker with ice, pour in rum, brandy, apple syrup, squeeze from half of a lemon wedge, and 2 dashes of bitters. Shake hard, and pour into a frosty martini cocktail glass. Top with a dash of cinnamon and garnish with a Gala apple slice. Now enjoy this perfect autumn apple pie like drink.

name: Gala Margarita
instructions: Shake and strain into a margarita glass with shaved ice, and serve.

name: Gale At Sea
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Galliano Daiquiri
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and pour into a frosted cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Galliano Toddy
instructions: Pour into a hot cup, sprinkle with grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: Galway Grey
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cream) together, and pour into a cocktail glass. Float fresh light cream on top, sprinkle with grated orange peel, and serve.

name: Gamble
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a wine goblet.

name: Gangplank
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into the glass.

name: Gangsta Colada
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass with/without crushed ice, and serve.

name: Garbo Cocktail
instructions: Combine the gin, lemon juice and Swedish punsch in a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a chilled martini cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Garden Fresh
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Gardenia
instructions: Shake and strain into a saucer. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Gareth Glowworm
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink.

name: Garlic Martini
description: "This is, by far, my favorite drink. Since inventing it, every other drink I've had has paled in comparison. Make sure you use good olives. "Shake all ingredients (minus olives) with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add garlic-stuffed olives.
instructions: Shake all ingredients (minus olives) with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add garlic-stuffed olives.

name: Gasoline
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Gasper
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Gateraide
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gates of Hell
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, lemon juice, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Drizzle the cherry brandy over the top.

name: Gator Piss
instructions: Pour midori and rum over ice, and top off with sweet and sour mix.

name: Gaugin
instructions: Blend ingredients (all except the maraschino cherry) in a blender with about a cup of crushed ice. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Gauguin
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cherry) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, add the cherry on top, and serve.

name: Gault's Gumption
instructions: Pour Canadian whisky, peach schnapps and sweet vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gay Marine
instructions: Muddle the mint leaves and lime wedges with cane sugar and Grand Marnier orange liqueur in a cocktail shaker. Add crushed ice and pour in the Mount Gay Barbados rum. Using a swizzle stick, stir the ingredients together so that the rum, lime and mint layers through the drink. Top up with apple juice. Serve with a mint garnish.

name: Gay Mountie
instructions: Pour the Canadian whisky over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Add the sweet vermouth, amaretto and Yukon Jack. Top with a cherry, stir and serve.

name: Gayley Avenue Margarita
instructions: In a blender, pour in ice first, then the sweet and sour mix, followed by the strawberry margarita mix, followed by the tequila and triple sec. Blend until you have a nice mix, pour into chilled glass or mug, top with the cherry.

name: Gazette
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Gecko
instructions: Add vodka, triple sec, then blue curacao. Fill with orange juice.

name: Gege
instructions: Shake ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry, and serve.

name: Gelcap
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gemini
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of orange, and serve.

name: Gene Tunney
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Generic Kamikaze
instructions: Pour vodka and lime juice over ice. Fill with sprite.

name: Geneva Convention
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Genie Martini
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a shaker filled with ice. Shake quickly and drain into a cockatil glass. Garnish with an olive. Alternatively add olive juice (from the jar) before mixing, according to taste.

name: Genoa
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Gent Of The Jury
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the onions.

name: Gentle Bull
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Gentle Sun Tan
instructions: Pour amaretto and coconut rum into glass. Add all the juices and shake.

name: Gentleman's Club
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Gentleman's Weekend
instructions: Put olives in glass and cover with a few small ice cubes. Add gin and olive juice, then fill with tonic water. Stir and serve.

name: George's Jungle
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Georgia Gin
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half full of ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Georgia Promenade
instructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Pour in the Stoli peach vodka, lemonade and cranberry juice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Georgio
instructions: Frappe in a parfait glass and garnish with mint leaves, whipped cream and a light dusting of cocoa.

name: Geraldine
instructions: Pour whisky, Chartreuse, Dubonnet, vermouth and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Gerbil
instructions: Mix and serve over ice in a lowball glass.

name: German Band
instructions: Stir with plenty of ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: German Beauty
description: Invented by Jessica St.Amour/Kindle. Popular in blackforest southern Germany during summer time when the fieldberry juices are ready made from fresh berries. Chill cocktail glass. Fill shaker half way with ice, add juices and shake vigorously. Drain in cocktail glass and add frozen berries.
instructions: Chill cocktail glass. Fill shaker half way with ice, add juices and shake vigorously. Drain in cocktail glass and add frozen berries.

name: German Bight
instructions: Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: German Cherry Bomb
instructions: Layer grenadine, then Godiva, then the cream. Shoot.

name: German Peach
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a cocktail glass over ice, and serve. Add more Rumple Minze to make it stronger or add seltzer water to make it weaker.

name: German Wake-Up Call
instructions: Stir together equal amounts of orange juice and Tropicana Peach Orchard Punch juice. Add as much Jagermeister as desired, stir again, and serve.

name: Get 'er Done
instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes. Add grenadine and vodka. Fill with Squirt and stir.

name: Get Her Done
instructions: Mix ingredients in equal parts over ice in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gettin' Loose
instructions: Fill glass halfway with ice then add vodka and amaretto. Fill the rest of the glass with sprite, give a little mix with a straw.

name: Ghetto Margarita
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a short glass, and serve.

name: Ghetto Screwupdriver
instructions: Combine ingredients in a beer mug.

name: Ghostini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Gibson
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onions and serve.

name: Gieco
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass half-way with ice. Pour the UV Blue raspberry vodka, then the Red Bull, and watch the transformation from blue to gieco green,

name: Gil's Revenge
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Gilbert Cocktail
instructions:
1.  Fill glassware to top with ice using preferably a pint glass or rocks glass.

2.  Add 3 to 4 ounces of plain Vodka of choice.

3.  Add Angostura Bitters to desired taste.  Recommend adding enough so that drink will be consistently light pink in color.

4.  Top with Club Soda or Sparkling Mineral Water.

5.  Stir and Enjoy.

name: Gilroy Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gimlet
description: Alcohol Content 0.59 Pour the gin and lime juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lime wedge.
instructions: Pour the gin and lime juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Gimlet #2
instructions: Fill the glass to 2/3 with ice cubes. Shake the gin and lime and pour into the glass.

name: Gimpy
instructions: Stir brandy, Campari, and curacao in a red wine glass half full of ice. Top off with red wine.

name: Gimto
instructions: Mix in a chilled lowball glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Gin Alexander
instructions: Rim a champagne saucer with lemon and sugar. Shake and strain ingredients into the glass, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Gin Aloha
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gin and Berry It
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gin and Bitters
instructions: Put Bitters into a cocktail glass and revolve the glass until it is entirely coated. Fill with gin.

name: Gin and Fresca
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Gin and It
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth in a cocktail glass. (No ice is used in this drink)

name: Gin and Pear
description: When making the Gin and Pear, ensure you place the bottle of gin in the freezer an hour or two beforehand, and make sure the Looza is refrigerated. If this drink (or even straight Looza) is served too warm it can seem really sickly sweet.Pour the Bombay Sapphire gin into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes, and fill the rest of the glass with Looza pear nectar. Stir with knife or back end of fork, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Bombay Sapphire gin into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes, and fill the rest of the glass with Looza pear nectar. Stir with knife or back end of fork, and serve.

name: Gin and Sin
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gin Blossam
instructions: Fill the glass about two thirds full of sprite. Pour in the schnapps, then gin. Put ice in glass to cool.

name: Gin Buck
instructions: Pour gin and juice of lemon into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Gin Burch
instructions: Combine gin and grenadine in shaker tin. Give a few hard shakes. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add orange juice, and serve.

name: Gin by Me
instructions: Add all three ingredients to a cocktail shaker with some ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherries and serve.

name: Gin Citric
instructions: In tall glass add Gin, fresh squeezed lime juice, lemon juice and grenadine. Fill glass with ice then fresh orange juice, enjoy.

name: Gin Cobbler
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the gin. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

name: Gin Cocktail
instructions: Stir gin and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Gin Crusta
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass rimmed with lemon juice and sugar. Garnish with a twist of a lemon peel.

name: Gin Cup
instructions: Place the mint sprigs and sugar syrup in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Stir about to bruise the mint slightly. Fill the glass with chopped / shaved ice. Add the lemon juice and gin and stir until a frost begins to form. Decorate with extra mint sprigs, and serve.

name: Gin Daiquiri
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

name: Gin Daisy
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Gin Flurrie
instructions: Blend Tanqueray Gin, Rose's Lime Juice and 15 ice cubes until it is slurry and pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Gin Gin
instructions: Pour ginger ale over gin in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gin Sling
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Gin Smash
instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

name: Gin Sour
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Gin Sunsplash
instructions: Shake gin and OJ in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Gin Toddy
instructions: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Gin-berry
instructions: Muddle the raspberries in the base of a whiskey sour glass with creme de mure and creme de framboise, then add crushed ice filling the glass. Add rest of ingredients and stir until the drink is a blood red color, and serve.

name: Ginananas
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Ginberry Cosmo
instructions: Put everything into a shaker full of ice, shake, strain into a cocktail glass and enjoy. Its like a classic cosmopolitan, only with a twist!

name: Ginelico
instructions: Stir gin and frangelico hazelnut liqueur with ice, strain into a cold cocktail glass, and garnish with some freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Ginger Apple Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with shaved ginger and a slice of apple.

name: Ginger in Fashion
instructions: Muddle about four peices of fresh ginger in the bottom of the glass. Put a spoon of bar sugar in the bottom of the glass with one ice cube and a dash of bitters.  While stiring add bourbon, bitters and ice.  Continue to slowly add the bourbon and ice for about 5-15 minutes to dilute and chill the drink. Just stick to the classic old fashioned method.

name: Ginger-bang Champagne
instructions: Muddle fresh ginger in the bottom of a bar glass. Add chilled champagne and simple syrup, stir gently and immediately strain into champagne flute. Serve.

name: Gingermint
instructions: Pour the Dr McGillicuddy's mint schnapps over 3 or 4 ice cubes in an 8-oz old-fashioned or lowball glass. Add ginger ale, more to taste if desired, and stir lightly. Serve.

name: Gingervitas
instructions: Pour absolut citron and vermouth into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and pour into a cocktail glass. Add ginger ale, and serve.

name: GinGold
instructions: Shake gin and GoldschlíƒÂ¤ger in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass and fill with 7-up.

name: Ginny's Slammin' Goddess
instructions: Pour liquors over ice. Mix orange juice and grapefruit juice exactly 50/50 in a separate container. Add the juice mixture to the liquors and stir well.

name: Ginny's Slammin' Goddess #2
instructions: Pour liquors over ice. Mix orange juice and ruby red grapefruit juice exactly 50/50 in a separate container. Fill the glass with the juice mixture and stir well.

name: Gino's Perfect Margarita
instructions: Place salt on a dish and rub rim of a margarita glass with a lime wedge. Dip glass in the salt to coat rim thoroughly. Pour teguila, triple sec, lime juice, sweet and sour, orange juice, and ice into a blender. Set on high speed until well blended. Pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with a lime, and serve. Optionally, pour Grand Marnier orange liqueur on top for a float, then serve.

name: Ginza Strip
instructions: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Gipsy
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Giraffe snot
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except passion-fruit) in a blender. Blend well and stop. Add passion-fruit, blend again quickly in order to keep seeds intact. Pour into cocktail glasses, and serve.

name: Girasole Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Girlie Martini
instructions:
Coat the inside of a chilled cocktail glass with dry vermouth.

In a mixing glass filled half way with crushed ice, combine vodka, champagne and maraschino liqueur. Stir and strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and a maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer.

name: Glacier Mint
instructions: Stir ingredients together and strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaves, and serve.

name: Glacier Mist
instructions: Build into a cocktail glass over ice.

name: Glad Eye
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Glasgow
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into an old fashioned glass.

name: Glasnost
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Glitch
instructions: Mix in order listed. The blue splash at the end makes the drink aquamarine colored, which is lovely.

name: Glo-Jito
instructions: Mash 5 spearmint leaves in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add the Everglo and rum, and top with soda.

name: Glo-Tini
instructions: Shake the Everglo and vodka together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a red wine glass. Float ginger ale on top. Garnish with a lime, and serve.

name: Gloom Chaser
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gloom Lifter
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gloom Raiser
instructions: Stir with ice. Strain in a cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry.

name: Glow Job
instructions: Pour on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass, stir and serve.

name: Gluhwein
instructions: Simmer gently for 30 seconds and strain into a heat-proof goblet.

name: Go for Broke Cocktail
instructions: Pour vermouth, gin, Cointreau and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Go Girl!
instructions: Mix ingredients together on ice.

name: Go Go
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with raspberry pieces, and serve.

name: Goat Herder
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add a cherry, and serve.

name: God's Child
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Godchild
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Goddess of Blood
instructions: Shake all ingredients except lime juice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Add lime juice and barely stir.

name: Godfather
instructions:
Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve. 

*Bourbon may be substituted for scotch, if preferred.

name: Godiva Irish Coffee
instructions: Mix Bailey's and Godiva in a coffee mug and fill with hot coffee. Top with whipped cream.

name: Godiva Peppermint Kiss
instructions: Stir over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Godiva Peppermint Patty
instructions: Pour hot chocolate into a brandy snifter. Add peppermint schnapps (rumple minze) and godiva, then stir. Top with whipped cream.

name: Godiva Polar Bear
instructions: Pour equal parts Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur and Peppermint Schnapps. Serve on the rocks.

name: Godiva Whisper
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Godmother
instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

name: Godson
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add 1/2 shot of Southern Comfort and 1/2 shot of whiskey to the glass. Top it up with ginger ale and splash a small amount of amaretto for taste.

name: Gogl-Mogl
instructions: This is essentially a hot eggnog. You beat an egg, add a tablespoon of honey and a jigger of whisky. Pour this into a irish coffee cup and then fill the glass with warm milk and stir until it's well mixed.

name: Goin' Home
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except apple juice) and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add apple juice, and serve.

name: Gold Card
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gold Driver
instructions: Fill a short glass with ice. Pour jose cuervo gold tequila into the glass until about half full (or more to taste). Top off with the orange juice. Squeeze a slice of lime into the drink, and serve.

name: Gold Dust
instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Serve chilled.

name: Gold Fizz
instructions: Build over ice in a pint glass.

name: Gold Margarita
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Gold Margarita #2
instructions: Build in a lowball or margarita glass, and serve.

name: Gold Mine
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice, and add lemonade. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry, and serve.

name: Gold Miner
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into martini glass and garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.

name: Gold Standard
instructions: Shake and serve in a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Gold Wizard
instructions: Shake the Chardonnay, the banana liqueur and the vodka together in a cocktail shaker with 2 ice cubes for 30 seconds. Pour into a cocktail glass with a cherry at the bottom, and serve.

name: Goldberg
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Golden Apple Cider
instructions: Fill a coffee mug with hot apple cider and add goldschlager.

name: Golden Bronx
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass.

name: Golden Cadillac
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at low speed for ten seconds. Strain into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Golden Cadillac #2
instructions: Add all of the ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a large chilled champagne flute. Garnish with shaved dark chocolate.

name: Golden Cinnamon Apple
instructions: Add the grenadine to the glass first, then add the GoldschlíƒÂ¤ger and apple pucker. The correct mixture will result in a nice gold or amber color.

name: Golden Coke
instructions: Pour the cola into a tumbler. Add the goldschlager and stir gently. Consume.

name: Golden Dawn
instructions: Shake all ingredients except grenadine with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Top with grenadine.

name: Golden Daze
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Golden Dream
instructions:
Fill shaker glass one third full of ice cubes. Add galliano, cream de cacao, triple sec, orange juice (non pulp), and light cream. Shake vigorously until creamy and strain into a champagne flute, or use a blender and blend until creamy.

Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with slice of orange.

name: Golden Drop Wineries Mango Daiquiri
instructions: Peel and slice the mango from the flesh & stone, place mango in the blender with all the ingredients except for the mint leaves. Blend until smooth & creamy. Serve chilled with a garnish of mint leaves.

name: Golden Fleece
instructions: Pour the yellow chartreuse and Danzig Goldwasser into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Golden Girl
instructions: SHake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with grated orange zest, and serve.

name: Golden Kiss Martini
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Golden Margarita
instructions: Shake ingredients vigorously with crushed ice in a shaker glass, and pour over crushed ice in a lightly salted margarita glass. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve with two cocktail straws.

name: Golden Martini
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into cocktail glasses, and serve.

name: Golden Miller
instructions: Mix above ingredients together with lots of crushed ice. Enjoy!

name: Golden Nail
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in a small highball glass, and serve.

name: Golden Russian
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Golden Shnoozberry
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Wild Turkey and Schnapps over ice. Squeeze lime wedge in drink and drop in. Fill with 7-up. Enjoy.

name: Golden Shooter
instructions: Layer ingredients in a sour glass in the following order: Drambuie, Amarula, Vodka. Enjoy.

name: Golden Shower
instructions: Shake all ingredients except ginger ale in a shaker with ice. Strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass and top with ginger ale. Garnish with lemon slice. Serve.

name: Golden Slipper
instructions: Stir brandy and chartreuse with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float unbroken egg yolk on top and serve.

name: Golden Sunset
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a half-slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Golden Tang
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Golden Tongue
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Golden Trailer Martini
instructions: Shake the Skyy vodka and Goldschlager in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with orange peel, and serve.

name: Golden Up
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes. Add the Goldschlager, and fill with 7-Up. Serve.

name: Goldfinger Martini
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Goldie
instructions: Heat in a heat-resistant glass, add orange peel, and serve.

name: Golf Cocktail
instructions: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Golf Martini
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

name: Gone Tomorrow
instructions: Build in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with just the stem of a cherry.

name: Good 'n Plenty
instructions: Cocktail can be served on the rocks or blended until smooth.

name: Good Action
instructions: Stir over ice in a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Good Golly
instructions: Pour the rum, Galliano, creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass, and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Good Morning Jamaica
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Good Morning Mexico
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Good Old Boy
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass half full of ice.

name: Good Stuff
instructions: Combine ingredients in a glass with ice.

name: Goodbye Sigh
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Add a cherry, and serve.

name: Goodness Gracious
instructions: Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Gorgeous
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Gorilla Cocktail
instructions: Add ingredients together and serve.

name: Gorilla Fart #4
instructions: Shake and strain, pour into rocks glass, straight up.

name: Gorilla Sweat
instructions: Mix all ingredients (except cinnamon stick) and heat gently until butter is melted. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

name: Gorilla's Tit
instructions: After mixing each ingredient in order shown, light the 151 with a match. Blow out the flames, and sip drink quickly with a straw.

name: Gorky Park
instructions: Pour vodka, cherry brandy and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Government Sponsored Killer (GSK)
description: Made for someone who is soon headed off to Iraq. The red and gold are the official colors of the United States Marine Corps.Pour all 4 shots into the glass then mix until the red and gold flakes are evenly mixed throughout the drink. Try to not let the gold gather in the middle as it's color has meaning to the drink. The first sip is usually dedicated to something Military related. Drink up Devil Dog!
instructions: Pour all 4 shots into the glass then mix until the red and gold flakes are evenly mixed throughout the drink. Try to not let the gold gather in the middle as it's color has meaning to the drink. The first sip is usually dedicated to something Military related. Drink up Devil Dog!

name: Graceland
instructions: Pour the vermouth, whisky and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Gracious Enjee
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a coffee mug, stir well, and serve.

name: Gradeal Special
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Grampa Doogin
instructions: Layer Yukon Jack on the bottom of an old-fashioned glass, add the blueberry then the orange juice. Top with cranberry juice.

name: Grand Apple
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Grand Blue
instructions: Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Grand Fashion
instructions: Muddle a teaspoon of sugar, cherry and orange in a chilled martini glass. Add ice, bacardi barrel aged rum, and rouge aperitif wine. Shake well. Garnish with a blood orange wheel.

name: Grand Marnier
instructions: Mix to dissolve sugar.

name: Grand Occasion
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Grand Passion
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Grand Pear
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

ingredients.name: Marie Brizard® Poire Williams pear liqueur

name: Grand Quetsch
instructions: Stir without ice and pour over ice into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Grand Slam
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Grandma's Bloody Mary
instructions:
Put ice in first, then a few pinches of salt, pepper, and celery salt. Pour about 1-2 tablespoons worchestire sauce over ice and dry ingredients, and add a few splashes of Tabasco sauce (to taste/preference). Add Vodka (1-2 shots), lemon juice (if desired), and pour tomato or vegetable juice over ingredients to preference. Mix well, do not shake or strain. Garnish with favorite accessory (celery, pickle, pickled green bean, etc), my personal favorite are pickled green beans.

Adding the ingredients in the order listed is important. The salts melt the ice slightly, allowing better mixing and even cooling throughout the cocktail.

name: Granny Smith
instructions: Add all ingredients together with ice.

name: Granny Smith's Best Apple Martini
instructions: Place vodka and green apple schnapps in a martini shaker with plenty of ice. Shake until very well chilled. Pour into two martini glasses and top with thin apple slices.

name: Granny Tequila
instructions: Pour the tequila and apple juice into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Granny's Apple Pie Martini
instructions: Pour Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps, Smirnoff vodka, sweet and sour mix and DeKuyper sour apple schnapps into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass rimmed with cinnamon and sugar, and serve.

name: Grape Martini
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry at the bottom, and serve.

name: Grape Nehi
instructions: Crush ice with lemon (or orange) and alcohols in a large glass. Use a strainer and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge or salt on the glass.

name: Grape Rocket
instructions: Mix ingredients in a large old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Grape Vodka Froth
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice .

name: Grapefruit Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Grapefruit Splash
instructions: Mix vodka with grapefruit soda to desired strength. Serve with ice in a rocks glass.

name: Grapes of Bath
instructions: Combine ingredients in a rocks glass. Best served ice cold.

name: Grapeshot
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Grapevine
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve with a short straw.

name: Grappa Strega
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Grass Is Greener
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled champagne flute.

name: Grass Skirt
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

name: Grasshopper
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Grassy Knoll Cocktail
