description: The Grassy Knoll Cocktail was invented by the four founding members of the Grassy Knoll Country Club from the the Rincon Valley region of Santa Rosa California it is best enjoyed after a long game of Mini Golf.  Due to its tasty nature The Grassy Knoll Cocktail is easily consumed in large quantities so please drink responsibly.Mix Monster Energy Drink with Green Apple Vodka.  Make sure the Monster is chilled and not put through a martini shaker because it is carbonated and shaking a carbonated beverage may cause undesired foaminess.
instructions: Mix Monster Energy Drink with Green Apple Vodka.  Make sure the Monster is chilled and not put through a martini shaker because it is carbonated and shaking a carbonated beverage may cause undesired foaminess.

name: Grease Lightning
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Great Attitude
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Great Caesar's Martini
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an anchovy-stuffed olive.

name: Great Dane
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Great Gatsby
instructions: Combine gin and vodka in a martini glass. Splash with sweet vermouth and add fresh lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Great Head
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Great Secret
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Great White Shark Attack
instructions: Put rum, coconut milk and pineapple into a bar blender with about 2 cups of ice. Blend until smooth and pour into a coupe glass. Pour raspberry liqueur over top.

name: Greathead
instructions: Pour the Canadian whisky and Applejack brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Greek Manhatten
instructions: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry, and serve.

name: Greek Tycoon
instructions: Add the tanqueray "malacca" gin, followed by the metaxa brandy, and serve.

name: Green Alexander
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

name: Green and Mean
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Green Apple #2
instructions: Place all ingredients (minus 7-up) in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Pour a splash of 7-up into an old-fashioned glass and add the contents of the shaker.

name: Green Apple Bomb
instructions: Pour the Absolut Mandrin and peach schnapps over ice in a whiskey sour glass. Add Jones green apple soda to taste, and serve.

name: Green Apple Tequini
instructions: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, then strain into a cocktail glass. Slice of green apple for garnish.

name: Green Appletini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into large cocktail glass. Add a big squeeze of lime juice. Garnish with a thin granny smith apple slice, and serve.

name: Green Bay
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Green Carnation
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Green Casa Noble
instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, except lime twist, then strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lime twist.

name: Green Cow
instructions: Blend the two ingredients together in roughly equal parts.

name: Green Cow #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together and serve.

name: Green Devil
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over a few ice cubes.

name: Green Dinosaur #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients and mix well. Add ice and drink up.

name: Green Dragon Cocktail #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Green Eyes
instructions: Pour over crushed ice and stir, or blend ingredients together.

name: Green Fairy
instructions: Shake thoroughly with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Green Fairy Blood
description: This particular recipe is the brainchild of a slighty insane man named Dr Lyons. It became a good way for him to dispose of shoddy absinthe without pouring it down the drain.Mix ingredients in above order over a sugar cube on an absinthe spoon, light the cube and when the flame dies immediately stir in the sugar until it dissolves; serve.
instructions: Mix ingredients in above order over a sugar cube on an absinthe spoon, light the cube and when the flame dies immediately stir in the sugar until it dissolves; serve.

name: Green Fantasy
instructions: Build in a cocktail glass and garnish with kiwi fruit slices.

name: Green Froggy
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and stir.

name: Green Gables #2
instructions: Pour the gin, vermouth and Chartreuse into a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Green Goblin Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Serve with a lime wedge.

name: Green Gulf
instructions: Shake with ice. Add creme de menthe.

name: Green Hope
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, and garnish with red cherries.

name: Green Horn
instructions: Blend everything except coconut rum in a bar blender. Pour into a cocktail glass and add coconut rum.

name: Green Hornet
instructions: Chill ingredients, pour lemon juice over pisco in a lowball glass and top off with tonic water. Serve with a slice of lime.

name: Green Ice
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Green Iguana
instructions: Mix tequila, midori melon liqueur and sweet and sour mix in a blender. Add ice. Serve in a margarita/coupette glass.

name: Green Iguana Margarita
instructions: Blend and pour into a salted glass.

name: Green Jolly Rancher
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Green K
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, and pour into four seperate sugar-rimmed cocktail glasses.

name: Green Lantern #2
description: This recipe for a variation of Green Lantern tastes like a creamy caramel apple.Pour Captain Morgan spiced rum and Southern Comfort peach liqueur into a cocktail glass. Add crushed ice, fill with Jone's green apple soda, stir and serve.
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan spiced rum and Southern Comfort peach liqueur into a cocktail glass. Add crushed ice, fill with Jone's green apple soda, stir and serve.

name: Green Lizard
instructions: Combine either Wild Turkey 151 or Bacardi 151 proof rum with the green chartreuse in an old-fashioned rocks glass or serve up in a cocktail glass.

name: Green Martini
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an almond-stuffed olive.

name: Green Mirage
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Green Mist
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of kiwi fruit and a mint.

name: Green Monster
instructions: Pour vodka over four ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add pickled pepper, and stir around with its stem. Devour pepper after draining drink.

name: Green Opal
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Green Poison
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Green Puma
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a glass, stir, and serve.

name: Green Pussy
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Green Room
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Green Russian #2
instructions: Stir over crushed ice in a small highball glass. Add a small amount of soda if desired, and serve.

name: Green Slime
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Green Stinger
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Green Summer
instructions: Take an ordinary glass, and put in the two shots of coconut rum. Malibu or coco ribe will work nicely. Then pour in cold/chilled mountain dew, and stir. Adjust ingredient quantities to taste.

name: Green Swamps
instructions: Fill a shaker halfway with ice, then add all ingredients except cherries. Shake well and pour into a chilled wine glass, garnish with a cherry.

name: Green Tea Martini
instructions: Combine ingredients in a martini shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Pour into a martini glass rimmed with lime juice and sugar. Garnish with lime slices.

name: Green Tee This
instructions: Pour vodka, then zen in an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with green tea and stir.

name: Green Widow
instructions: Pour blue curacao into a cocktail glass. Pour the orange juice over it. Stir and serve cold.

name: Green with Envy
instructions: Stir ingredients in cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into cocktail glass. Garnish with pineapple. Enjoy.

name: Green Zima
instructions: Combine ingredients in a beer mug. Stir well.

name: Green Zone
instructions: Pour all ingredients with an ice cube into a shaker.

name: Greenback
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Greenbrier Creek
instructions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a frosted (note: important) brandy snifter glass. Add the gin, and mix well. Drizzle the hot melted chocolate over the drink, being sure to let it slightly drip onto the side of the glass. Do not mix. Serve.

name: Greenham's Grotto
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Grim Reaper
instructions: Mix kahlua and 151 proof rum in an old-fashioned glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over the top to give an ice red tint.

name: Grimaldi
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Grinch's Christmas
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gringo Punch
instructions: Combine cognac and Mountain Dew and stir. Then add tequila and water. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Grizz Killer
instructions: Combine (except 151) over ice in a large rocks glass and float the 151 on top.

name: Grizzly Bear
instructions: Serve over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.

name: Grog
instructions: Pour the rum and the water into an old-fashioned glass with no ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Grovschpol
instructions: Fill a glass (40-50 cl) with whiskey, midori, bailey's and then coca-cola untill you have enough foam (it looks horrible). Drink it with a straw and don't look at the color.

name: Grown-up Lemonade
instructions: Pour the vodka, triple sec and amaretto over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill glass with desired amount of lemonade. Garnish with lemon slice, and serve.

name: Grumpier Old Man
instructions: Pack a rocks or old-fashioned glass with ice. Add old grand dad bourbon (high proof bourbon, similar to wild turkey), lime juice, and top with sour mix. Serve with a sip stick, no garnish.

name: Grumpy Old Man
instructions: Pack an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add old grand dad bourbon, lime juice and top with ginger ale. Serve with a sip stick, no garnish.

name: GSM
instructions: Stir it all together and serve.

name: GTV
instructions: The ingredients are best preserved cold for this purpose. To mix, just pour the ingredients into a glass. Add an ice cube, if you like.

name: Guajira
instructions: Shake all the ingredients (except syrup) together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour over the strawberry syrup in a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel, and serve.

name: Guavaberry Colada
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 1/4 cup crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a cocktail glass, and top with a dash of pineapple juice. Garnish with fresh grated nutmeg and a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Guesswork Cocktail
instructions: Shake, strain into a frosted cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Guinness Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a medium-large chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Guinness Top
instructions: Pull just under 1 pint of Guinness. Pour out some cola into a glass, then pour back & foward into another glass repeatedly until flat. Slowly dribble into the Guinness by pouring down the side of glass.

name: Guiseppi 'tini
description: Invented by Prof. Dr. Anthony Guiseppi-Elie; b. 1954, Trinidad and Tobago (home of Angustra Bitters). Guiseppi is an MIT-educated Materials/Chemical/Bio-Engineer.Place 3 oz. of Grey Goose Vodka in a shaker over cubed ice. Add 1/2 oz. Cointreau liquor and a dash of Angostura Bitters. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnesh with a twist of orange peel.
instructions: Place 3 oz. of Grey Goose Vodka in a shaker over cubed ice. Add 1/2 oz. Cointreau liquor and a dash of Angostura Bitters. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnesh with a twist of orange peel.

name: Gulf of Mexico
instructions: Fill a shaker 3/4 full with ice and add ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gulf of Mexico #2
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Gull's Wing
instructions: Pour tequila, creme de bananes and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake, strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Gulyuz
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker half-filled with cracked ice and shake for 1 minute. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gumdrop Cocktail
instructions: Pour the amarula cream liqueur, cream and butterscotch schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and pour a dash of blue curacao down two opposite sides of the glass (using a teaspoon).

name: Gumdrop Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a sugar-rimmed chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and some gumdrops, and serve.

name: Gummi Berry Juice
instructions: Pour the Maui blue hawaiian schnapps into a chilled cocktail glass. Add 7-up, top with coconut rum, and serve.

name: Gummi Worms
description: Gummi Worms is a very popular candy-tasting alcoholic drink in Bulgaria with Pushkin brand vodka. Try it here with Smirnoff Strawberry Twist vodka or Stoli Strasberi vodka.Stir ingredients together in a whiskey sour glass, and serve.
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Gummy Bear
instructions: In a cocktail glass 3/4 full with ice, pour vodka and raspberry schnapps. Fill with cranberry juice, stir and serve.

name: Gummy Worm Bomb
instructions: Drop a shot glass full of UV Raspberry vodka into a glass of lemon-lime Gatorade. Drink quickly.

name: Gun Barrel
instructions: Add vodka, triple sec and cranberry juice to a mixing glass, and mix well. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gypsy Cocktail
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Gypsy Margarita
description: Created by "Nello Greco" an Italian barman, March 2006, in his cocktail-bar the "drUnk" (in Rome) where now it's popular. That night a customer asked for a strongly but little sweet red cocktail so the Nello Greco invention (GYPSY MARGARITA) was perfect.Shake all ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: H.P.W. Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: H2O Martini
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass rimmed with colored sugar. Garnish with a lemon slice, and serve.

name: Ha Ha Tonka
instructions: Fill a 16 oz cup with ice, pour in alcohol, then top with orange juice.

name: Haacker Special
instructions: Pour vodka into a glass. Add sugar and a suitable amount of crushed ice with the lime cubes. Stir until all sugar is dissolved.

name: Habaneros
instructions: Pour the rum, lime juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Haidin-Haidin
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Haiku Cocktail
instructions: Stir both ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cocktail onion, and serve.

name: Hair Dryer
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a margarita glass, and serve.

name: Hair Gel
instructions: Add the blue curacao, vodka, lemonade and candy (jelly tots) to a blender with crushed ice. Blend until slushy. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, top with a dash of blue curacao, and serve.

name: Hair of the Dog
instructions:
The original recipe said to shake the ingredients togeather with the ice cubes, but I usually stir the whisky and the honey with a spoon until they're mixed, and then add the cream and add the Ice Cubes. It workes just fine. 

I've tried this drink with Burbon and Tennessee whiskey instead of Scotch, and it is really great! It becomes a totally different drink. 

I've also tried to add ~1 oz cold coffee, and I liked it.

name: Hair Raiser
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hairy Berry
instructions: Pour the jagermeister, peach schnapps and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Top with 7-up, and serve.

name: Hairy Bitch
instructions: Pour all ingredients over finely shaven ice in a champagne saucer, and serve.

name: Hairy Blue Balls
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Hairy Coconut
instructions: Rim a champagne saucer with egg white and sweet grated coconut. Shake ingredients and strain into the saucer. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry, and serve.

name: Hairy Muff
instructions: Stir all ingredients together with crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Hale Bopper
instructions: Pour the citrus vodka, peach schnapps and lemonade into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Haleakala Martini
description: The Haleakala Martini is named after the Hawaiian volcano Mt. Haleakala (pron. Hale-a-ka-la) meaning "House of the Sun" , otherwise known as East Maui.Pour the Absolut vodka, Chambord raspberry liqueur and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, Chambord raspberry liqueur and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Halfcast Russian
instructions: Pour the Tia Maria coffee liqueur and vodka into an old-fashioned glass with crushed ice. Layer the cappucino on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon; this should then sink to the bottom leaving a swirling marble effect. Serve.

name: Halfway Special
instructions: Combine with ice, strain, and serve in a hollowed-out pineapple.

name: Halley's Comfort
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Hallo Police
instructions: Pour the vodka and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Hammer and Tongs
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hammerhead
instructions: Stir the black sambuca and amber rum together in a cocktail glass over crushed or shaven ice. Add Coca-cola to taste, and serve.

name: Hand Job
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hangover Cure
instructions: Pour raspberry juice into beer mug, then add tequlia, rum, and amaretto slowly. Add coconut milk and sprinkle with your favourite spices.

name: Happily Ever After
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir and serve.

name: Happy Camper
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Happy Ending
instructions: Add 2 shots vodka to approx. 4 oz. of club soda. Mix in a splash of cranberry juice. Squeeze 1 lime wedge and enjoy! Happy Ending for everybody!

name: Happy Happy
instructions: Add ingredients to an old fashioned glass, stir and serve.

name: Happy Hawaiian
instructions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with pineapple juice, or add to taste, and serve.

name: Happy Honey Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a small martini glass.

name: Happy Monkey
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass, vodka first and Sprite last. Serve.

name: Happy Skipper
instructions: Pour captain morgan's spiced rum over ice and fill the glass with ginger ale. Garnish with lime.

name: Hara Kiwi
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of kiwi and a cherry, and servev.

name: Harbor Light
instructions: Make kahlua, triple sec and cognac pousse-cafe style in a cordial glass. Ignite rum in a teaspoon and float on top. Extinguish, and serve.

name: Hard Case
instructions: Stir, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve.

name: Hard Dick
instructions: Mix in a brandy snifter. Top with a little whipped cream if you'd like. Sip slowly.

name: Hard Dreamsicle
instructions: Combine the tuaca, triple sec and Bailey's irish cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hard in the Paint
instructions: Combine ingredients in a rocks glass. Stir.

name: Hard On
instructions: Pour Kahlua into a cordial glass. Layer banana liqueur next, then float the cream on top.

name: Harlem Cocktail
instructions: Shake gin, pineapple juice, and maraschino liqueur with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with pineapple chunks and serve.

name: Harley Davidson
instructions: In a mixing tin add baileys irish cream and midori melon liqueur over ice. Stir and strain into a 4 oz. rocks glass, top with jagermeister, and serve.

name: Harper's Ferry
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Harry Alligator
instructions: Layer ingredients in order listed above. Squeeze a wedge of lemon over layered ingredients. Be sure to mount lemon wedge on side of glass or place in glass.

name: Harry Boy
instructions: Mix with ice and serve cool.

name: Harry Denton Martini
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Harry Dolan
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Add Southern Comfort and DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps. Fill with Sprite or 7-Up. Add grenadine, and serve.

name: Harry Lime
instructions: Coat lime in sugar, and drop into chilled vodka in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Harry Titty
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Harry's Cocktail
instructions: Muddle two mint sprigs with vermouth and absinthe in a mixing glass. Add gin, shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a stuffed olive and remaining mint sprig, and serve.

name: Harvard
instructions: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Harvey Cowpuncher
instructions: Mix together.

name: Harvey Wall Climber
instructions: Pour vodka and orange juice into a half litre beer stein filled with ice cubes and stir. Float galliano on top.

name: Hasbrouck Heights
instructions: Stir Amaretto, Campari, and Sweet Vermouth in a cocktail shaker. Pour into an old fashioned glass on the rocks. Add two dashes of Angostura Bitters before serving.

name: Hashi Bashi
instructions: Pour gin and campari over a couple of ice cubes. Fill up with schweppes russian.

name: Hasty Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hat Trick
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the dark rum, light rum, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hat Trick #2
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Haus Mix
instructions: Pour Black Haus blackberry schnapps over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Add Smirnoff vodka and cranberry juice, stir and serve.

name: Havana Beach Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredents into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Havana Club
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Havana Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Havana Sidecar
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Havana Special
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Hawaii Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Desire
instructions: Add all of the alcohol, fill with Sprite, then splash with lemon juice.

name: Hawaiian Ho
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

ingredients.name: Marie Brizard® Poire Williams pear liqueur

name: Hawaiian Margarita
instructions: In blender, combine with ice and garnish with a lime wedge or wheel.

name: Hawaiian Orange Blossom
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a sour glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Hawaiian Screw
instructions: Pour ingredients into a large rocks glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Screw #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a large rocks glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Stone Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and pineapple slice, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Surfer on Acid
description: A refreshing drink, not too sweet.Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Pour over ice cubes into an old-fashioned glass. It will be a bit frothy on top. Garnish with a cherry and lime wheel, and serve.
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Pour over ice cubes into an old-fashioned glass. It will be a bit frothy on top. Garnish with a cherry and lime wheel, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Vodka
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a sour glass.

name: Haymaker
instructions: Shake, strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Hazelnut Martini
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hazy Skyy
instructions: Pour the vodka, Frangelico and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass (chilled). Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Head Banger
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Head for the Hills
instructions: Pour the vermouth, curacao and club soda into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Headlights
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Healthy Eggnog
instructions: Whip egg substitute and sugar together, combine with the two kinds of milk, vanilla, and rum. Mix well. Chill overnight. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Serves 4-6.

name: Healthy Spice
instructions: Pour cinnamon schnapps, irish cream, and vanilla soy milk in to cocktail shaker. Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Rim glass with brown sugar. Strain into glass, and enjoy!

name: Heart Warmer
instructions: Build over ice in an old-fasioned glass.

name: Hearty Susan
instructions: Pour the whiskey and cherry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled wiht ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Heat Wave #2
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec and soda water into an Irish coffee cup or mug. Add a drop of lemon juice, and fill with hot water. Stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a stick of cinnamon, and serve.

name: Heated Cape Cod
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a saucepan and heat gently. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Heaven Sent
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a ice filled shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve and enjoy.

name: Heavenly Hilary
instructions: Shake ingredients in a stainless steel shaker with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Heavenly Orgasm
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/3 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Heberts Alexander
instructions: Add ingredients into shaker with ice and shake well. Pour into cocktail class, and sprinkle some nutmeg or cinnamon.

name: Heidi's Comet
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass, and stir well. Add a cinnamon stick, and serve.

name: Hell Frozen Over
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared cherry, and serve.

name: Hell's Kitchen
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hell's Mary
description: Pretend not to notice that your eyes are watering when drinking this one. Hell's Mary is a perfect compliment to raw oysters. Try adding a splash of oyster juice as well.Add all ingredients (except vodka) to a blender. Blend and add Absolut Peppar vodka. Blend again to stir in vodka. Pour into a whiskey sour glass half-filled with ice. Add a stick of celery, and serve.
instructions: Add all ingredients (except vodka) to a blender. Blend and add Absolut Peppar vodka. Blend again to stir in vodka. Pour into a whiskey sour glass half-filled with ice. Add a stick of celery, and serve.

name: Hello Nurse
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hemingway Daiquiri
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Hemingway Special
instructions: Squeeze lime juice into a shaker, add remaining ingredients and shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a frosted cocktail glass.

name: Hen Night Zipper-Ripper
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry, and serve.

name: Hennessy Alexander
instructions: Combine the 3 liquids in a mixing glass over ice cubes, Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a dash of nutmeg, and serve.

name: Hennessy and Apple
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Hennessy Martini
instructions: Pour Hennessy cognac into a cocktail shaker with ice. Add a squeeze of a lemon wedge, and stir together. Strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass, garnish with lemon peel, and serve.

name: Henry Morgan's Grog
instructions: Shake all liquors and cream in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled old fashioned glass and sprinkle the nutmeg on top.

name: Henry's Special
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of broken ice, in a double-cocktail glass. Add champagne, and serve.

name: Hep Cat
instructions: Stir all ingredients together over cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Her Inner Secret
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass over crushed or shaven ice. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Her Name In Lights
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Here Today
instructions: Drop the lemon juice into an old-fashioned glass with the gin. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Herman Sherman
description: Invented by Jurgen Buysschaert. Made to go to the Rock Werchter festival in Belgium. The name Herman Sherman is a tribute to the organizer of the festival.Put ingredients in mixer and shake. Put ice in cocktail glass and poor content of mixer over the ice. Serve with slice of bloodorange.
instructions: Put ingredients in mixer and shake. Put ice in cocktail glass and poor content of mixer over the ice. Serve with slice of bloodorange.

name: Hermes
instructions: Put your alcohol in a blender, then add your ice to fill it, and then fill with OJ. Then blend (mixture should come out slushy).

name: Hermie's Hard Neapolitan
instructions: Pour the strawberry liqueur, white creme de cacao and French vanilla coffee creamer into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with milk and serve.

name: Herradura Mango Mojito
description: The Herradura Mango Mojito, which is gaining popularity during the warm summer months, provides a perfect combination of sweet mango, cool mint and rich tequila, creating a burst of flavor and refreshment.  This is a fantastic recipe to help celebrate National Tequila Day (July 24).Muddle the mint leaves, sugar and lime juice in the bottom of a tall glass. Add Herradura and mango juice.  Add a splash of club soda and ice cubes.  Serve with a mint leaf garnish.
instructions: Muddle the mint leaves, sugar and lime juice in the bottom of a tall glass. Add Herradura and mango juice.  Add a splash of club soda and ice cubes.  Serve with a mint leaf garnish.

name: Hershey Squirts
instructions: Make cocoa in the traditional method, and add whiskey liberally.

name: HeyRay
instructions: Mix Tonic water and Metaxa. Add Sherbet. Taste.

name: Hi Ho Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Hi-Speed
instructions: Add gin and lemon rum to a plastic beer cup. Fill with Red Bull. Add a few ice cubes.

name: Hidden Grapefruit
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay mango rum

name: High Jamaican Wind
instructions: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Put the cream on top.

name: High Octane Accelerator
instructions: Add all ingredients except gold tequila to a mixing glass. Mix slowly and strain into a cocktail glass. Add gold tequila on top.

name: High Road
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: High Roller
instructions: Shake Grand Marnier, vodka and orange juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into an old fashioned glass with ice. Top with a few drops of grenadine.

name: High Tide
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender with about a cup of crushed ice. Serve in a cocktail glass with mint sprig as garnish.

name: High Voltage
instructions: Shake, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: High-Octane Black Russian
instructions: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: High-Octane White Russian
instructions: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Highball Cocktail
instructions: Fill a medium glass most of the way with 4 - 5 ice cubes. Add the whiskey, and fill the rest up of the way with ginger ale.

name: Highland Cream
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Highland Fling Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

name: Highland Margarita
instructions: Pour the tequila, Grand Marnier, Drambuie and sour mix (to taste) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Hilgert Cocktail
instructions: Pour vermouth, gin, maraschino, grapefruit juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hilty Dilty
instructions: Shake ingredients together with crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hispaniola
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass. Add ice and a cherry. Stir.

name: HO-Tini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hoffman House Martini
instructions: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive, and serve.

name: Hokie
instructions: Mix ingredients in a beer mug. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Hokkaido Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hole-In-One
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Holiday Brandy Alexander
instructions: Pour the brandy, creme de cacao and eggnog into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: Hollie Pocket
instructions: Mix all ingredients top to bottom. Champagne and O.J. can be more or less to taste.

name: Holly Berry
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Hollywood Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a blue cheese-stuffed almond, and serve.

name: Hollywood Nuts
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add 7-up, and serve.

name: Holy Doodle
instructions: Add ingredients, stir, and serve.

name: Holy Water
instructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add one dash of grenadine. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.

name: Homecoming
instructions: Pour amaretto and baileys into an ice-filled rocks glass. Add a stirrer, and serve.

name: Homestead Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Homewrecker
instructions: Shake, pour over cracked ice in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Homicidal Maniac
instructions: Fill mug with ice, add ingredients, stir and enjoy. Or for more fun, put all ingredients (including the ice) into the blender and make a Frozen Homicidal Maniac!!

name: Honey Bee Cocktail
instructions: Pour the rum, honey and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Honey Drop
instructions: Fill old fashioned glass full with ice. Add melon liqueur and blue cuacao. Add shot of margarita mix and fill rest of glass with lemonade.

name: Honey Nuts
instructions: Shake the advocaat, Kahlua coffee liqueur, Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and honey in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with strawberries and/or cocoa, and serve.

name: Honeydew Martini
instructions: Pour the vodka, melon liqueur and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Honeymoon Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hong Kong
instructions: Fill boston shaker with ice. Add bitters, sake, red vermouth and campari. Stir ingredients until chilled. Strain into a martini glass and flame with either lemon or orange. Garnish with a twist of lemon or orange. Serve.

name: Hong Kong Smog
instructions: Pour Tanqueray gin and Midori melon liqueur into a shaker half-filled with ice. Stir or shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a melon ball, and serve.

name: Honolulu Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Honolulu Cocktail #2
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Honolulu Hammer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Honolulu Lulu
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Honolulu Shooter
instructions: Shake, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Hoo Doo
instructions: Mix southern Comfort, finlandia vodka, orange juice, and lime juice over ice. Top with a splash of peppermint schnapps and sprite.

name: Hooker
instructions: Pour Alize Gold Passion and Tropicana simultaneously over a few ice cubes in a cocktail glass, and serve. Alternatively, blend together with ice in a blender for a frozen drink.

name: Hoopla
instructions: Pour the brandy, cointreau, Lillet and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hoosier Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hoot Mon Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky, vermouth and benedictine into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Hoots Mon
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hop On Pop
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hop Skip and Go Naked
instructions: Add liqueurs in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Add 1/2 oz lime juice. Fill with orange juice and float the grenadine.

name: Hop Toad
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hopeless Case
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Hornless Unicorn
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Hornpipe
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Horny Toad
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients, in order, into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Horny White Girl
instructions: Pour cream soda first, then the vodka, and then add the Bailey's. Serve chilled, or on ice.

name: Horse And Jockey
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Horse and Rider
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Horsley's Honor
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, applejack, and triple sec. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice.

name: Hot and Bothered
instructions: Pour Buttershots, Bailey's and Godiva in a mug of hot cocoa, stir and serve.

name: Hot and Creamy
instructions: Combine the ice and liquors in a blender until the ice is well crushed. Add half-and-half and serve in an 8-oz margarita glass.

name: Hot and Dirty Martini
instructions: Pour the pepper vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive stuffed with a pickled jalapeno pepper, and serve.

name: Hot Apple Pie
instructions: Mix tuaca and cider in a large microwavable mug. Heat on high power for 2 1/2 minutes. Stir again, and serve.

name: Hot Benefactor
instructions: Heat sugar syrup in a saucepan with a little water. Stir until the sugar dissolves. Add jamaican rum and red wine (dry is better) and heat until it simmers. Add syrup to saucepan with a little hot water and stir until sugar is dissolved. Pre-warm a mug and pour the mixture in. Add a lemon slice and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Hot Blah!
instructions: Dilute the sour mix with water and mix with the vodka in a mixing glass. Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add Hot Damn! schnapps, and serve.

name: Hot Brandy Flip
instructions: Blend brandy, egg and sugar syrup in a blender. Pour into a saucepan and heat. Pour into a whiskey sour glass and sprinkle fresh-ground nutmeg on top.

name: Hot Brandy Toddy
instructions: Add the sugar to a coffee mug. Fill 2/3 with boiling water. Add brandy and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon, dust with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Hot Brick Toddy
instructions: Add the cinnamon, powdered sugar and butter to an Irish coffee cup/mug. Pour a single ounce of boiling water, and stir to dissolve thoroughly. Add whiskey. Fill with boiling water, stir again and serve.

name: Hot Bull
instructions: Drop a shot glass of schnapps into a rocks glass of Red Bull.

name: Hot Buttered Comfort
instructions: Stir the Southern Comfort and hot water together in a coffee mug. Float butter on top. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Hot Buttered Jim
instructions: Stir the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey and the hot water together in a coffee mug. Float butter on top. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Hot Buttered Rum
instructions: Add the sugar, butter and cloves to a coffee mug. Pour the rum, and stir well. Fill with boiling water. Stir again, and serve.

name: Hot Buttered Snow
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hot Chick's Bike Seat
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Hot Choco-Mora
instructions: Put Kahlua into a coffee mug and fill with hot chocolate. Top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings if you have them.

name: Hot Chocolate Almond
instructions: Pour the butterscotch schnapps, amaretto and hot chocolate into a coffee mug, and stir. Top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Hot Chocolate Butternut
instructions: Add schnapps and amaretto to a coffee mug. Fill with hot chocolate and top with whipped cream.

name: Hot Chocolate Sin
instructions: Prepare hot chocolate in a coffee mug, then add in a shot of Rumple Minze to give a nice minty flavor.

name: Hot Cinnamon Roll
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an Irish coffee cup or mug. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a cinnamon stick, and serve.

name: Hot Coconut Coffee
instructions: Put rum into coffee mug and fill with hot coffee. Top with whipped cream.

name: Hot College Chick
instructions: Shake everything with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hot Daring Dylan
instructions: Pour the tequila, Kahlua coffee liqueur and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass, and stir well. Float the cream on top of the drink by pouring across the back of a teaspoon, and serve.

name: Hot Deck
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hot Frenchman
instructions: Heat well in a heat-resistant glass or cup. Stir, add twists of lemon and orange peel, and serve.

name: Hot Gin
instructions: Pour into a heat-proof goblet, and serve.

name: Hot Irish
instructions: Pour into a heat-proof goblet, sweeten with brown sugar (to taste), and serve.

name: Hot Jamaican
instructions: Heat gently in a saucepan, pour unstrained into a heat-proof goblet, and serve.

name: Hot Lesbian
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a large cocktail glass over crushed ice. Serve.

name: Hot Lunch
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a small pickle. Light contents of glass on fire. Tilt head back and have your buddy pour it into your mouth (very carefully). Have four more hot lunches and go to bed. You have no business going anywhere after the abuse you just gave yourself.

name: Hot M.M.M.
instructions: Heat in a heat-resistant glass or cup. Add twists of orange and lemon peel, and serve.

name: Hot Mollifier
instructions: Pour the rum, Tia Maria and coffee into an Irish coffee glass, and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Hot Mon
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Squeeze in the juice from a twist of lemon peel, place the peel on top, and serve.

name: Hot Nun
instructions: Pour frangelico into a brandy snifter glass. Add honey, lemon peel and cloves and fill snifter with hot water.

name: Hot Pants
instructions: Shake with ice cubes and pour into an old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.

name: Hot Pecker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hot Penny Rum
instructions: Pour the rum, bourbon whiskey, creme de cacao and coffe into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Float the cream on top by pouring it over the back of a teaspoon, and serve.

name: Hot Peppermint Chocolate
instructions: Make hot chocolate (preferably using water) according to instructions. Mix in Rumple Minze and enjoy.

name: Hot Peppermint Patty
instructions: Put creme de cacao and peppermint schnapps into a coffee mug and fill with hot chocolate. Top with whipped cream, and add a teaspoon of green creme de menthe.

name: Hot Piper
instructions: Pour the tequila, lemon juice, dark creme de cacao and hot coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Hot Port Flip
instructions: Warm port on the stove with in a saucepan. Be careful not to let it boil. Whisk the egg with sugar in a bowl and blend in 2oz. of cream. Pour the mixture into the saucepan with the port, stirring constantly. Serve in a warmed mug and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Hot Rum
instructions: Add rum and lemon juice to a coffee mug. Fill it with hot water (or as much as you prefer). Stir in 2 sugar cubes. Top with cinammon.

name: Hot Rum Toddy
instructions: Place a sugar cube or equivalent into an Irish coffee cup or mug. Fill 2/3 full with boiling water. Add rum and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon, dust with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Hot Russian Christmas
instructions: Take 2 packets of hot chocolate mix and put them into the coffee mug. Add the shots of eggnog cream, vodka, and Kahlua. Fill the rest of the coffee mug with hot water. Stir. You may need to heat the drink up in the microwave for 30 seconds before serving. When nice and hot, serve.

name: Hot Scotch
instructions: Pour butterscotch schnapps (buttershots) into an 8 oz. mug and fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

name: Hot Scotch Nightcap
instructions: Pour into a heat-proof cup, and serve.

name: Hot Screaming Orgasm
description:
Coffee makes it "Hot", Vodka makes it "Scream". Add hot coffee first to warm the glass, then add remaining ingredients. Serve in Brandy Snifter, or Irish Coffee Mug. 

(May be topped with small amount of whipped cream, but personally I think that spoils it) 

Multiples? Yes please!
instructions:
Add hot coffee first to warm the glass, then add remaining ingredients. Serve in Brandy Snifter, or Irish Coffee Mug. 

(May be topped with small amount of whipped cream, but personally I think that spoils it) 

Multiples? Yes please!

name: Hot Sex
instructions: Pour the triple sec and orange juice into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top with grenadine. Garnish with maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Hot Spicy Banana
instructions: In a chilled old fashioned glass mix the first three ingredients, then place a single ice cube in the drink and splash the peppermint schnapps on the ice cube. Serve.

name: Hot Springs Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hot Tea Toddy
instructions: Heat everything in a saucepan until it is steaming (do not boil). Pour into a pre-warmed mug. Use a large piece of candied ginger for garnish.

name: Hot Throbbing Banana
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a stemless maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Hot Whiskey
instructions: Pour the whiskey into a whiskey sour glass. Add cloves into the fresh lemon and place into the whiskey. Fill with hot water and dissolve in the sugar. Serve immediately.

name: Hot Whiskey Punch
instructions: Peel and slice the lemons; place the peel into a large non-reactive saucepan. Add sugar, cinnamon sticks, cloves and 3 cups of water. Set over a medium-high heat and stir frequently to dissolve the sugar. Allow the water to reach the boil, then turn heat down to minimum. Simmer for 10 minutes. Strain the mixture and return to the pan. Add the whiskey and heat but do not boil. Serve in Irish coffee glasses with a slice of peeled lemon in each. Makes 8 (6-ounce) Irish coffee glasses.

name: Hot Whiskey Toddy
instructions: Place a sugar cube or equivalent into an Irish coffee cup or mug. Fill 2/3 full with boiling water. Add Scotch whisky and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon, dust with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Hot Zultry Zoe
instructions: Pour the tequila, Galliano and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass and stir well. Float the cream on top, and serve.

name: Hotel Plaza Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except pineapple) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the crushed slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Houston Hurricane
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker full of ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Howell Says So
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Hpno-Ade
instructions: Add Hypnotiq first, then fill with Gatorade.

name: Hpnotiq Breeze
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker, and shake. Strain over ice into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Breeze #2
instructions: Combine all ingrdients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Heaven
instructions: Pour the chilled Hpnotiq liqueur and Champagne into a Champagne flute. Slowly add Chambord raspberry liqueur. Garnish with cherries, and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Martini
instructions: Add cherry vodka to a cocktail shaker filled with ice, then add Hpnotiq liqueur. Shake, shake, shake. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Hpnotiq-tini
instructions: Shake ingredients vigorously in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. If done correctly, there will be a thin layer of ice crystals on the top. Strain into glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: HPW Cocktail
instructions: Combine vermouths and gin in a mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Add orange peel for garnish.

name: Hudson
instructions: Pour together and stir as required.

name: Hudson Bay
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hula Hoop
instructions: Pour gin, orange juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hula Hula
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hula-Hula Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Humjob
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Humper
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker over ice and shake until well chilled. Strain into a cocktail glass and enjoy. Float a small amount of dark rum on top for a little added flavor.

name: Hunter Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hunter Mountain
instructions: Combine bailey's and frangelico over ice and stir. Add vodka, stir again, and serve.

name: Huntington Special
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice.

name: Huntress Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Huntsman Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka, jamaican rum and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add powdered sugar to sweeten. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hurlyburly
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with dried cranberries.

name: Hurricane Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hurricane Flint
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hustler
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Hyperactive Apple
instructions: Put caramel liquer (cold) into the bottom of an Irish coffee mug. Layer apple schnapps (also chilled) on top, then layer steamed milk and finally espresso. Add whipped cream on top.

name: Hypnosis
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker full with ice. Add vodka and Hpnotiq liqueur, Shake vigorously. Pour into a cocktail glass and top with Squirt. Garnish with a cherry or pineapple chunk, and serve.

name: Hypnotic Martini
instructions: Combine all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into a martini or cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hypnotic Martini #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hypnotiq Breeze
instructions: Stir ingredients together with a few ice cubes in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ice Bet
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a brandy snifter, stir and serve.

name: Ice Blue Kamikaze
instructions: Shake with ice and strain.

name: Ice Breaker #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend for 15 seconds. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Ice Coffee
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug, and serve.

name: Ice Cream Flip
instructions: Shake ingredients (all except nutmeg) in a shaker with ice and strain into coupette glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Ice Cream Genius
instructions: Blend all ingredients together in a blender.

name: Ice Crystals
instructions: Fill a shaker half full with ice cubes. Pour all ingredients into shaker and shake well. Strain drink into a Cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ice-Cream Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a coupette glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Iceball
instructions: Add ingredients and 3 oz. crushed ice to blender. Blend on medium speed for about 15 seconds, until smooth. Pour into glass.

name: Iced Irish Coffee
instructions: Pour the water (about 1 oz./3 cL) into a cocktail shaker and add the instant coffee and some sugar (optional), then shake. When the coffee has dissolved, add milk and shake again. Pour into a cup and add Bailey's and a scoop of ice cream.

name: Ichbien
instructions: Add ingredients and ice to mixing glass. Shake. Strain into chilled sour glass.

name: Iconoclast
description:
This drink, reminiscient of a highball, uses premium gin, and is built in an old-fashioned glass, partly accounting for its name. The use of diet Vernors ginger ale, lemon juice with no added sugar, and the lack of
a garnish make this call drink satisfying and refreshing, yet light on calories - only 156 calories and 3 grams of carbohydrate per glass. Like a highball in a lowball glass; truly Iconoclastic!Fill an old-fasioned glass halfway with ice. Add the juice of 1/2 lemon and 2 oz. gin (I prefer Bombay Sapphire). Stir. Fill the rest of the way with diet Verners and gently stir. Enjoy.

Nutrition Info: 156 calories and 3 g carbohydrates per glass(!)
instructions:
Fill an old-fasioned glass halfway with ice. Add the juice of 1/2 lemon and 2 oz. gin (I prefer Bombay Sapphire). Stir. Fill the rest of the way with diet Verners and gently stir. Enjoy.

Nutrition Info: 156 calories and 3 g carbohydrates per glass(!)

name: Icy Clean Martini
description:
If desired, the martini can be shaken with the lemon peel, to extract even more of the oils. Remember - no garnish.  After all, this is a clean martini!

This was invented circa 2001 by VMWrites, who was seeking a clean martini, unadorned by "fruit" in the glass (olives, onions, peel, etc.).  He chose Skky Vodka for its clean finish, and the lemon for its refreshing taste.  But not in the glass. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail pitcher, including the lemon peel.  Add 2 handfuls of ice.  Stir vigorously (40 stirs should do it).  Strain into an ICED cocktail glass and serve immediately, with NO garnish.  The lemon peel will have added its oils to the martini during stirring.  It needs no further embellishment.
instructions: Add all the ingredients to a cocktail pitcher, including the lemon peel.  Add 2 handfuls of ice.  Stir vigorously (40 stirs should do it).  Strain into an ICED cocktail glass and serve immediately, with NO garnish.  The lemon peel will have added its oils to the martini during stirring.  It needs no further embellishment.

name: Ideal Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Idonis
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ignes Fatui
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Iguana
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the lime slice and serve.

name: Ike Turner Cocktail
description: Invented by Markus D. formerly of Lewis Run, PA. This is black and blue with a punch in dishonor of Ike Turner. This is the drink of choice to calm the nerves after a barroom brawl.Pour the blackberry schnapps and blue curacao over a couple of large ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with Hawaiian punch, and serve.
instructions: Pour the blackberry schnapps and blue curacao over a couple of large ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with Hawaiian punch, and serve.

name: Ikonoclast
instructions: Pour the Ikon vodka and creme de cacao into a cocktail or martini shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a chilled cocktail or martini glass. Top with three swirls of whipped cream and a cranberry rolled in sugar, and serve.

name: Il Magnifico
instructions: Throw some ice into a blender. Add the ingredients and blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve immediately.

name: Immaculata
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Impatient Virgin
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then pour into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Imperial Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Imperial House Bracer
instructions: Beat egg yolks and beat in cream. Gradually mix in port, using a whisk, and then add cognac. Heat in a saucepan over low heat, stir well, and serve in warmed wine goblets or mugs. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg. Makes two servings.

name: In and Out Martini
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice, and add a splash of dry vermouth. While glass chills, add 4 fingers of gin in a mixer of ice. Throw away ice/vermouth in cocktail glass then strain in gin.

name: In the Marketplace
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Inauguratini
instructions: Shake the vodka, cranberry juice and lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass. Make a small snowball of crushed ice in the palm of your hand. It needs to sit a little higher in the glass than the cranberry mixture. Carefully pour the blue curacao over the top of the ice. Serve with a US flag swizzler.

name: Incider Cocktail
instructions: Pour blended whiskey over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with apple cider and stir. Add the apple slice and serve.

name: Income Tax Cocktail
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Incredible Cocktail
instructions: Stir, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve.

name: Incredible Shrek
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Indian Apple Martini
instructions: Shake the above ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a martini cocktail glass with a sour apple sugar rim. Garnish with an apple slice, and serve.

name: Indigo Girl
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into a frosted martini glass. Add a small wedge of fresh lime on edge of glass, and serve.

name: Indispensable Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients together with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Indubitably
instructions: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Indy Melonade
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry, and serve.

name: Inedible Cocktail
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice, and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Ink Street
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Instant Death #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass, and drink fast.

name: Intercourse
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka and orange juice into a cocktail glass. Stir well. Top with equal amounts of Hawaiian fruit punch and mountain dew, and serve.

name: International Affair
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: International Cocktail
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice, strain and serve.

name: International Jack
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with orange peel, and serve.

name: International Stinger
instructions: Shake well with ice and pour over ice cubes (on the rocks) in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Inverted Pyramid Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with an orange twist.

name: Inverted Traffic Light
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Pour in peach schnapps, then add orange juice 3/4 to the top and shake. Slowly add and sink the grenadine to the bottom. In a mixer, mix the blue curacao with vodka and slowly strain that into the cocktail glass.

name: Ira Cocktail
instructions: Add ingredients to ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir.

name: Irish Anti-freeze
instructions: Combine all ingredients in blender with crushed ice (frozen strawberries also can be added, but optional). Blend, and pour into sugar lined glasses. Top with umbrellas.

name: Irish Blackthorn
instructions: Pour the Irish whiskey, vermouth, pernod and bitters into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Irish C-4
instructions: Pour Jim Beam and Jameson into a beer mug, than fill with one can of guinness stout. Float bailey's and irish mist on top, stir and serve.

name: Irish Cactus
instructions: Pour irish cream and tequila over ice and stir.

name: Irish Canadian
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Irish Cappuccino
instructions: Add bailey's to a standard cappuccino, and serve.

name: Irish Charlie
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, strain into a cordial glass, and serve.

name: Irish Chocolate
instructions: Prepare hot chocolate, then add Bailey's and drizzle on cream, followed by a generous helping of whipped cream and finally sprinkle on chocolate scrapings. If prefered, add a cinnamon stick, and enjoy.

name: Irish Cocktail
instructions: Mix everything in a cocktail shaker with ice. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Irish Cow
instructions: Use a small saucepan to heat the ingredients, and serve in a coffee mug. Top with nutmeg if desired.

name: Irish Cream #2
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender for no longer than 2 mins. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Irish Cream #3
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until mixed well, serve cold. Stores for up to two weeks in the fridge, but it's never lasted that long.

name: Irish Cream #4
instructions: Add condensed milk, evaporated milk, Scotch whiskey, vanilla essence and glycerine to a saucepan. Stir well. Dissolve coffee in boiling water. Mix in. Chill. Add cream if desired.

name: Irish Cream Special
instructions: Put ice cubes into the bottom of a brandy snifter. Slowly pour bailey's irish cream over ice. Next pour in milk and then stir gently. Add more to taste. For chocoholics add hearshy's chocolate sauce.

name: Irish Dawg
instructions: Put vodka in first. then add the bailey's and cream. Lightly stir and serve.

name: Irish Ending
description: This drink won "Best Overall Martini 2007" at the Monroe Symphony's "Martini Night". John Jeter - Enoch's Irish Pub & Cafe - Monroe, LA.Mix all 3 liquors and shake on ice, strain into a martini or margarita glass that has been rimmed with sugar.
instructions: Mix all 3 liquors and shake on ice, strain into a martini or margarita glass that has been rimmed with sugar.

name: Irish Fix
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain over ice into an Old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Irish Float
instructions: Float irish cream on top of the cola.

name: Irish French Kiss
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish rim with an orange wedge.

name: Irish Ghost
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 20 to 30 seconds. Strain into a cup, with some ice if desired, and serve.

name: Irish Griep
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add blue curacao and sour mix. Top off with cola. Stir until a greenish/blue mixture is obtained.

name: Irish Highball
instructions: Pour whiskey over ice. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Irish Martini
instructions: Pour the Irish whiskey into a chilled cocktail glass. Swirl around the glass in order to coat; drain excess. Pour the vodka and vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Irish Milk Punch
instructions: Pour ingredients into a heat-proof cup, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Irish Monk
instructions: Pour liqueurs into an irish coffee cup. Fill with good quality hot chocolate. Add plenty of whipped cream.

name: Irish Mudslide
instructions: Use a chilled beer mug. Add Irish cream and fill with root beer.

name: Irish Orange
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Irish Paddy
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed or a Rocks glass filled with ice.Side garnish with a York Peppermint Paddy or a Fudge Mint Oreo.

name: Irish Quaalude
instructions: Combine ingredients over ice, shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Irish Rose
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Irish Shillelagh
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice. Pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Irish Whiskey Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish the glass with an olive, and serve.

name: Iron Butterfly
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add kahlua and irish cream, and stir. Garnish with 1 - 3 optional filbert nuts.

name: Ironman
instructions: Mix seagram 7 and vodka in an old-fashioned glass. Stir. Add a few ice cubes, fill with soda and stir gently.

name: Is Paris Burning
instructions: Stirred, not shaken. Rocks acceptable. Fresh raspberry optional.

name: Island Delight
instructions: Blend vodka, rums and ice cream briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Top with whipped cream, sprinkle grenadine on top, and serve.

name: Island Donkey
instructions: Add chocolate liqueur and rum in glass, drizzle with Goldschlager. Can be served over ice or straight up. Makes a great shooter too!

name: Island Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Island Murder
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, add an umbrella and sword shaped tooth pick and serve.

name: Island Remix
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper Blue Island Pucker schnapps into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the Sprite Remix, stir and serve with a stirring straw.

name: Island Rose
instructions: Shake well with ice and serve straight up or over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Float a rose petal on the surface, and serve.

name: Island Trader
instructions: Build ingredients in order listed in a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Isle of Pines
instructions: Pour over ice cubes in a large highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: It's Not That Bad...
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Add small pieces of ice, and garnish with cherry. Serve extra cold!

name: Italia
instructions: Mix ingredients in pairs; grenadine with cherry brandy, anisette with creme de cacao, and chartreuse with curacao. Make pousse-cafe in a cordial glass. Colors should resemble that of the italian flag.

name: Italian Apple Martini
description: This Apple Martini was created in NYC by Robert E. Wilkes, and served with great reception in Las Vegas, Bahamas, Queensland and Miami.Pour all into iced shaker tin, shake until tin is cold to the touch and strain into martini glass. Garnish with lime wheel, and serve.
instructions: Pour all into iced shaker tin, shake until tin is cold to the touch and strain into martini glass. Garnish with lime wheel, and serve.

name: Italian Bulldog
instructions: Shake Galliano herbal liqueur, Kahlua coffee liqueur and milk together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Italian Cadillac
instructions: Shake the Galliano, milk and white chocolate liqueur until it gets nice and frothy. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and sink the kaluha down to the bottom. If possible garnish with three coffee beans.

name: Italian Crown
description: The Italian Crown was invented on the golf courses in central Arkansas. It's a good drink to walk around with, when you can't refresh your drink for a while.Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Allow the ice to melt for a few moments. Stir, and serve.
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Allow the ice to melt for a few moments. Stir, and serve.

name: Italian Delight
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Italian Heather
instructions: Pour the scotch and galliano into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Italian Ice
instructions: Shake well and serve with crushed ice.

name: Italian Margarita
instructions: Pour into a margarita glass, stir, and add ice cubes.

name: Italian Margarita
instructions: Pour into a margarita/coupette glass and stir. Add ice cubes.

name: Italian Sombrero
instructions: Shake amaretto and cream well, pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Italian Stallion #2
description: This recipe for an Italian Stallion was created circa 2001 by J. Steve. Mayo, with final tweeks courtesy of an Absolut representative at the Vodka-Tasting-Event in Seattle, Washington.Pour sambuca into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add Absolut Citron and orange juice, and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail/martini glass, garnish with a twist of orange peel. (To rim the glass with lemon and sugar is optional.) Serve.
