instructions: Pour sambuca into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add Absolut Citron and orange juice, and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail/martini glass, garnish with a twist of orange peel. (To rim the glass with lemon and sugar is optional.) Serve.

name: Italian Stallion Martini
description:
"Invented by Justin Rempe, and it originated from my love of all types of the Martini.  It's popular amongst my close group of friends, and I finally decided to share it with everyone else.  It is a very worthy adult beverage!"To start, you'll need a shaker filled with crushed ice.  Add the three primary ingredients into the shaker and shake for at least 60 seconds to get the alcohol truly chilled.  After completion of the shaking, pour the contents of the shaker into a chilled cocktail glass.  Next, add a long strand of lemon peel, making sure that you peel it over the glass to obtain the vast majority of the oil from the peel.  The last step is to drink up, and enjoy!

Make sure you drink responsibly, and have a plan in place if you need transportation.
instructions:
To start, you'll need a shaker filled with crushed ice.  Add the three primary ingredients into the shaker and shake for at least 60 seconds to get the alcohol truly chilled.  After completion of the shaking, pour the contents of the shaker into a chilled cocktail glass.  Next, add a long strand of lemon peel, making sure that you peel it over the glass to obtain the vast majority of the oil from the peel.  The last step is to drink up, and enjoy!

Make sure you drink responsibly, and have a plan in place if you need transportation.

name: Italian Stinger
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add brandy and galliano. Stir and garnish with wedge of lime.

name: Italian Sunrise
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral, and serve.

name: Italian Sunrise #2
instructions: Blend until slushy, pour and enjoy.

name: Ixtapa
instructions: Pour ingredients into chilled cocktail glass and stir.

name: Izayoi
instructions:
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Izayoi means the 16th moon in japanese.

name: J-Pop Idol
instructions: Pour the Alize Bleu liqueur down the side of an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Allow it to sit before adding the Gekkaikan sake. Add Sunny Delight orange juice, stir and serve.

name: J. R.'s Dallas Martini
instructions: Splash the vermouth into chilled 10-oz martini glass, swirl and spill. Half-fill a cocktail shaker with cracked ice, add vodka and shake vigorously. Strain into glass. Garnish with several extra large green olives stuffed with aged Roquefort cheese, one will not be enough.

name: J. R.'s Godchild
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the boubon, amaretto, and milk. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: J. R.'s Godfather
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine both of the ingredients. Stir to mix the flavors.

name: J. R.'s Revenge
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jacana
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Jack and Dewanne
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass (more or less mountain dew, to taste), and serve.

name: Jack and Ginger
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour jack daniels then add ginger ale. Stir.

name: Jack Frost
instructions: Combine all ingredients over ice in a glass.

name: Jack in the Summer
instructions: Fill glass 1/3 of the way with strawberries. Pour 1 part Jack Daniel's over strawberries. Fill with cola, stir.

name: Jack London Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Jack Roberts' Treat
instructions: Pour the hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Add the brandy and creme de cacao, and stir. Float the cream on top, and serve.

name: Jack Rose
instructions: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jack Rose
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Jack Rose Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jack Shit
instructions: Pour Jack Daniels, Bailey's and Kahlua over 3 ice cubes in an Irish coffee cup. Fill glass with Nesquik chocolate milk, and dash Tullamore Dew on top. Stir and serve.

name: Jack Sour
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

name: Jack Sprite
instructions: Pour the jack daniels into a glass followed by sprite to taste. Add a slice of lemon. Stir the beverage and enjoy.

name: Jack Withers
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Jack's Apple
instructions: Put apple brandy, cider and honey in a small saucepan and heat, stirring until the honey dissolves. Pour immediately into a pre-warmed mug. Sprinkle ground cinammon and nutmeg on top. Garnish with a slice of baked apple.

name: Jack-In-The-Box
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jack-in-the-Green
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a fresh lime wheel and a small slice of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Jackalope
instructions: Combine amaretto, Jamaican rum, Kahlua and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a sour glass. Add dark creme de cacao to the top of the drink.

name: Jackath
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jackbull
instructions: Mix, pour into an old-fashioned glass over three ice cubes, and serve.

name: Jackhammer
instructions: Serve over ice.

name: Jackhammer #3
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Serve.

name: Jackie O's Rose
instructions: Pour the rum, lime juice and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Add sugar to taste, stir to dissolve, and serve.

name: Jackknife
instructions: Pour the Yukon Jack into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked or cubed ice. Fill with canned pineapple juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Jacqueline Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jade
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

name: Jade #2
description: A delicious, mellow and sensual cocktail mix created with the idea of men and women enjoying the same cocktail together. Contributed by Jeffrey Alcantara, originated in Vacaville, California, United States, 2004.Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jaded Dreams
instructions: Combine everything but the lime slice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Jaffa #2
instructions: Combine creme de cacao and Triple Sec in a cocktail glass. Stir well and drop in the piece of choclate. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Jaffa Schnapps
instructions: Line the rim of a cocktail glass with sugar syrup and shaved chocolate. Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into the rimmed glass. Garnish with orange sprinkles and serve.

name: Jagasm
instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add jager and rootbeer schnapps, then fill with Pepsi, and serve.

name: Jagerenade
instructions: Pour Island Blue and Grenadine in the bottom of a glass and fill with Red Bull. Pour a shot of Jagermeister in a separate shot glass, and drop the glass in.

name: Jagpanzer
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Jai Ma Kali
instructions: Mix everything and say Jai Ma Kali.

name: Jake-Knife
instructions: Pour jagermeister over ice in a cocktail shaker. Fill with coke, shake vigorously, and pour into a cocktail glass. Top with rum, and ignite if desired. Extinguish, and serve.

name: Jamaica Cooler
instructions: Pour the dark rum into a wine goblet and stir in the sugar until it dissolves. Add bitters and lemon juice, and a few ice cubes. Fill the glass with 7-up and stir well.

name: Jamaica Ginger
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaica Glow
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jamaica Hop
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jamaica Hop
instructions: Pour Kahlua, white creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jamaica Kiss
instructions: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of tia maria and a shot of jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Jamaica Sour
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaica Sunday
instructions: Dissolve honey in rum, and pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Jamaican Apricot
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaican Banana
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except sliced banana) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a large brandy snifter and add sliced banana. Sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, top with a whole strawberry, and serve.

name: Jamaican Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jamaican Creamsicle
instructions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake for minute or two and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaican Dust
instructions: Mix all three ingredients in a strainer with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jamaican Foam
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-full of ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaican Green Sunrise
instructions: Start with the ice cubes. Pour rum and orange juice. Carefully add blue curacao, making sure it falls to the bottom. Layer pineapple vodka on top.

name: Jamaican Hop
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaican Jambaylaya
instructions: Pour rum over ice. Fill to the top with fruit punch.

name: Jamaican Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry peppers, and serve.

name: Jamaican Milk Shake
instructions: Add 1/2 cup of cracked ice to a blender, and mix in the rest of the ingredients. Blend until smooth. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Jamaican Reindeer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with half a cup of ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Jamaican Rum Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jamaican Spirit
instructions: Put the vodka, tequila, gin and triple sec into a shaker with lots of ice. Mix well then pour into a cocktail glass. Pour the orange juice and the jamaican rum. (the rum goes last) Decorate the glass with a slice of orange and a tiny umbrella. Serve.

name: Jamaican Sunrise
instructions: Pour vodka, peach schnapps, and orange juice in a glass and be sure to mix them well. Add the cranberry juice and let it sit at the top of the glass.

name: Jamaican Sunrise #2
instructions: Pour Redrum and fruit punch into a shaker with ice, shake, then pour into a tall glass; float grenadine on top and serve with a straw and pineapple slice/piece for garnish.

name: Jamaican Ten Speed
instructions: Shake and strain over ice.

name: Jamaican Tennis Beads
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaican Wind
instructions: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Jamaican Yo Yo
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: James Bond Martini
instructions: Pour the gin, vodka and Lillet blanc into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: James Bond Martini #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: James The Second Comes First
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: James' Jungle Juice
instructions: Pour Larios gin over 4 ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Add Malibu rum, and top with fruits of the forest juice. Add creme de cassis on top, insert straw, and serve.

ingredients.name: Fruits of the Forest® fruit juice

name: Jamie's Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Janet Standard
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Janne's Summernight
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, add a straw, and serve.

name: Japanese Cobbler
instructions: Muddle a skinless pineapple wedge, one piece of orange and one piece of lemon with maraschino liqueur in the bottom of a bar glass. Add the sake and shake with ice. Strain into a double old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice and top with a splash of soda. Garnish with a sprig of mint, the remaining fruit wedges, and serve.

name: Japanese Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lime peel and serve.

name: Japanese Lagoon
instructions: Shake vodka, Midori and lime juice over ice. Strain into a margarita or cocktail glass, building over blue curacao. Top with lemonade, and serve.

name: Japanese Sex
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass with a small scoop of crushed ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Japanese Slipper
instructions: Combine equal parts of each ingredient in a cocktail glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Japanese Slipper #2
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jasmine
instructions: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Java Jam
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jay Leno
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: JB Black and Pepsi
instructions: Fill a glass with about a 1/5 of ice, then pour Jim Beam Black Label until ice is covered. Fill the rest with Pepsi cola, and serve.

ingredients.name: 3 oz Jim Beam Black Label bourbon whiskey

name: JC Slammer
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Pour into beer mug over crushed ice.

name: Jealous Queen
instructions: Mix together in a glass.

name: Jean Gabin
instructions: Heat rum, calvados and syrup in a heat-resistant glass or cup. Fill with hot milk, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Jean Lafitte
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jedi Cocktail
instructions: Pour the milk over a single ice cube in a cocktail glass. Add blue curacao and creme de cacao simultaneously. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Jedi Juice
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Jeepers Creepers
description: The vodka symbolizes formaldehyde, the shelled walnut represents the brain. A good themed drink for Halloween.Pour the vodka into the glass, as slowly as possible, then shell the walnut directly previous to placing it gently on the surface. It is customary to suck loudly on the walnut after one is finished drinking, and before you chew and swallow. The shell of the walnut may be placed around the base of the glass as a garnish on certain occasions.
instructions: Pour the vodka into the glass, as slowly as possible, then shell the walnut directly previous to placing it gently on the surface. It is customary to suck loudly on the walnut after one is finished drinking, and before you chew and swallow. The shell of the walnut may be placed around the base of the glass as a garnish on certain occasions.

name: Jeff Tracy
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin and cherry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Jell-O Margarita
instructions:
Combine 1 cup boiling water and contents of box in medium sized saucepan. Stir until completely dissolved. Instead of using 1 cup cold water use 1/2 cup Jose Cuervo and 1/2 cup Margarita Mix. Pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with a piece of lime set inside mixture. Chill until set.

Note: if salt is desired, make sure to rim the glass before pouring mixture.

name: Jenny's Banana Pudding
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Jenny's Concoction
instructions: Pour the vodka and anisette into a glass and top it off with orange juice.

name: Jenny's Summer Delight
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jens Special
instructions: Pour bacardi limí³n into a glass, add the sprite and the red bull, then stir to mix.

name: Jerald
instructions: Stir together in a cup, and serve.

name: Jeremy Perkins

name: Jon Jon
description: Jon Jon was made by Jonathan Gandy and the owner of Stonewalls Pub in Sheaperdstown West Virginia.Almost fill a pint glass with ice and pour your liquors (except 151). The Red Bull and orange juice should definatly be poured to taste. Not many people like Red Bull in drinks and prefer more OJ than RB. If your ok with Red Bull it should be poured in equal amount with the OJ. Pour everything into a cocktail shaker and shake well, then pour back into the glass. Pour a small amount of 151 on the top (optional) and do not mix. Serve with a straw.

name: Key Lime Mapletini
description:
"Inventor?  Who invented the Key Lime Martini?  I have no idea.  This is my version, made for my fiance when we sailed from Ft. Lauderdale to Nassau.  I'll never forget the smile that crossed his face when he tasted it for the first time. It's now popular at garden or patio parties, quiet evenings with my (now) husband, and even at an air show or two, where we shared the recipe with the bartender!" J. Matthews.Pour first four ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with shaved ice, and shake thoroughly.  Add cream, shake 30 seconds, and strain into martini glasses.  Garnish with a twist of lime and a pinch of lime zest.  
Sit back and enjoy the bliss of the first sip!
instructions:
Pour first four ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with shaved ice, and shake thoroughly.  Add cream, shake 30 seconds, and strain into martini glasses.  Garnish with a twist of lime and a pinch of lime zest.  
Sit back and enjoy the bliss of the first sip!

It seems like every person who tries it comes back with a mission to find the recipe. :o) Quantities are an estimate, adjust to taste.The mango mix should be blended with crushed ice firstly with the schnapps. Pour the schnapps and mango mix into a cocktail glass with the grenadine already placed at the bottom.
instructions: The mango mix should be blended with crushed ice firstly with the schnapps. Pour the schnapps and mango mix into a cocktail glass with the grenadine already placed at the bottom.

name: Kraut Killer
description: This drink was invented in a red party cup at Anna Maria College out of the blue and was originally coined "the Jager martini." It was given a catchier name later on in its existance, and is now enjoyed throughout central Massachusetts, especially in its many open fields.Make sure ingredients are well chilled before making. Mix Smirnoff, Jagermeister, and Everclear in a glass or shaker with ice. Stir or shake and serve. Ice is optional. Use carefully and in moderation.
instructions: Make sure ingredients are well chilled before making. Mix Smirnoff, Jagermeister, and Everclear in a glass or shaker with ice. Stir or shake and serve. Ice is optional. Use carefully and in moderation.

instructions: Layer ingredients, in above order, into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Serve.

name: La Cafe

name: La Carre

name: La Charentaise
description:
Note: The french like their anis diluted in water, nothing else. It takes a trained palate to savour this and may seem quite rough to people, not accustomed to this drink. The orgeat (almond syup) sweetens it nicely and the milk mellows it.

"Annette von Flottwell, the great-great-great granddaughter of the Prussian Minister of the Exterior under Bismarck, likes milk with almond syrup. One evening, while her husband had some anis liquor, she added some of it to her milk-and-almond drink and liked the anis flavor addition. Annette is my wife. We live in the Charente department in France. Hence, "La Chraentaise". "Pour the anis liquor first in a chilled glass, on 2 ice cubes. Add the orgeat (almond) syrup, pouring from a height in order to mix better. Then pour the milk, also from a height. Do not stir.
instructions: Pour the anis liquor first in a chilled glass, on 2 ice cubes. Add the orgeat (almond) syrup, pouring from a height in order to mix better. Then pour the milk, also from a height. Do not stir.

name: La Cucharacha

name: La Mojita

Add vodka. Fill the glass with ice cubes and top off with club soda. Add the raspberries. Mix it with a spoon so that mint leaves and raspberries get distributed throughout the glass. Serve.

name: Leprechaun #2
description: A good tip for making the amounts of vodka and brandy exactly the same is to use a shot glass for measuring (1 shot = 1 oz. of course) with something printed on it to give a reference to exactly which specific point to fill to.  Serving cold does help it go down more smoothly, but it's better to chill the alcohol beforehand rather than adding ice cubes.The trick to making a good Leprechaun is getting the amount of vodka and brandy to be exactly the same.  Beyond that, just mix all the ingredients together and serve.
instructions: The trick to making a good Leprechaun is getting the amount of vodka and brandy to be exactly the same.  Beyond that, just mix all the ingredients together and serve.

name: Lion Tamer

name: Lips of Myristica
description:
This drink will bring you not only a spiritual experience over night and dreaming (if you sleep), but it will bring you the best entertainment the next day.

History and Facts:   Over time, natives and other people have found out that nutmeg contains a hallucinogenic property known as Myristica.  Tribes used it as rituals to connect with spirits.  During modern day parties, people have used nutmeg and vodka together, even consuming both at different times.  You see, the effects of the nutmeg's "trip" or legal "high" takes place in up to 8 hours.  During the time before "nutmeg trip" is a spiritual sense and perspective.  Never use nutmeg in a spice form; not much will happen if you use nutmeg spice.  Use the nutmeg nuts.  Also, in order to bring out the hallucinogenic-trippy property,Myristica, you would need to consume nutmeg in large quantities, like 5 nuts or more.

Where to buy nutmeg nuts? You can find them at your local food store.  Walmart carries around 9 nutmeg nuts in a small plastic-glass container in the spice section.

Have fun and be safe.Handle the nutmeg nuts first.  Take at least 4-5 nutmeg nuts and crush them up at much as possible.  Some advice would be using a food processor or maybe smashing them up with something around the kitchen.

After the nutmegs are smashed up, put them in a blender (or whatever you prefer).

Then put 3 shots of vodka in there to take out the nutmeg's flavor.  Any hard liquor does the trick.  Blend or shake till all is mixed well.

Add in the ginger ale as much to your liking.  Around 2 cups should do the trick, maybe even more.  

Add a shot of Malibu to bring a tropical hint.  Add a little bit of vanila extract (not important, but is suggested).  

Stir and mix well, settle down with ice in an old-fashioned glass.  If for some reason the nutmeg is still chunky, just consume it.  It's fine.

name: Love Punch
description:
Miranda Renay Love, orginiated in Moreno Valley 2006. It came immediately after she invented the "love tap" when someone actually wanted more vodka. Its popular in Moreno Valley making its way to Boston, and traveling throughout Denmark and Germany slowly but surely.Use mixing glass first fill with ice, and chill martini with glass. 

Pour the peach schnapps first. Then pour the vodka and 99 bananas liquer together. Fill the shaker with cranberrry and pineapple juice. Splash soda into mixer.
 
Shake then strain into martini glass, and dress it with a cherry and lime twist.

name: Lusty Leopard Martini
instructions:
Thoroughly chill a martini glass then apply small "leopard spots" randomly around the inside of the glass using chocolate shell syrup then returning the glass to the freezer to keep cold. (This can be done hours in advance for parties.)

In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the vodka, Malibu rum, mango nectar and candy syrup. Shake well until the shaker is too cold to hold. Strain the contents into the prepared glass with spots.
What you now have created is a martini with the appearance of leopard hide having the look of deep tawny orange and dark brown spots. Serve and enjoy.

instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker glass over ice. Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass, and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Malibu Paradise
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum, Absolut vodka, cranberry and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Malibu Shoe
instructions: Pour lime juice until a thin layer covers bottom of the glass. Add strawberry margarita mix and coconut rum, then fill glass with orange juice, stir well. Add cherry and serve. Best when served very cold!

name: Malibu Snapper
instructions: Fill one-quarter of a cocktail glass with malibu rum, and fill the rest with snapple.

name: Malibu Tequichi
instructions: Shake with ice and serve in a champagne flute.

name: Malibu Wave
instructions: Shake all but the lime with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

name: Mallelieu
instructions: Pour the rum, grand marnier and orange juice into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Malmaison
instructions: Pour the white rum, cream sherry and fresh lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with anisette, and serve.

name: Maltese Slipper
instructions: Shake and strain everything except grenadine into a cocktail glass. Drop grenadine into glass and serve.

name: Mama Mia
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mama's Martini
instructions: Pour the Stoli Vanil vodka, apricot brandy, angostura bitters and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mamie Taylor
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Man Boobs
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Man o' War
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with ice and pour on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Man of the Moment
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Man Overboard
instructions: Dissolve sugar, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Mandarin
instructions: Blend briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass garnished with a slice of orange speared with a cherry.

name: Mandarin Daiquiri
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with a cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Mandarin Delight
instructions: Pour absolut mandrin into a glass over ice. Fill with tonic water. Squeeze and drop the wedge of lime or orange into the drink. Stir, and serve.

name: Mandarin Dream
instructions: Pour vodka and splash juices in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously so when poured, a thin layer of ice crystals is visible. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mandarin Metropolitan
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a wedge of mandarin orange on the side.

name: Mandarine Bourbon
instructions: Stir and serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Mandeville
instructions: Combine the rums, anisette, lemon juice and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the cola and stir well.

name: Mandrin Cherry Smash
instructions: Cut the lemon half into four quarters. Muddle with the cherry brandy in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add vodka and ice, and shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Mang Tini
instructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice, add Malibu mango rum, sugar (or Splenda), 7-Up, water and lime wedges. Muddle ingredients and strain into a shot glass, or serve in sugar rimmed martini glass. (Add vodka for more kick if desired)

name: Mango & Lime Fiesta
instructions: Blend all ingredients. Garnish with lime wedge. Drink up and enjoy!

name: Mango Champagne
instructions: Combine mango juice and champagne in a champagne flute. Add a few cubes of mango and a few ice cubes.

name: Mango Cocktail
instructions: Put everything into a blender and blend 'til it's nice and smoooth. Pour into cocktail glasses then add ice and a lemon wedge garnish.

name: Mango Margarita
instructions: Shake the tequila, mango liqueur and lime juice with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mango Margarita #2
instructions: Combine in blender with about half a cup of crushed ice. Grind only to broken/crushed state. Pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with lime and/or mango slice, and serve.

name: Mango Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mango Mint
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender at low speed for 15 seconds. Strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Mango Mojito
description: The Mango Mojito is a popular variation on the Mojito. You'll find this recipe being used in parts of Palm Beach County, Florida and Crested Butte, Colorado.Muddle the mint leaves and lime wedge in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add Cruzan mango rum and club soda as above or adjusted to taste. Add ice cubes, and serve.
instructions: Muddle the mint leaves and lime wedge in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add Cruzan mango rum and club soda as above or adjusted to taste. Add ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mango Tango #2
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with fresh pineapple and cherry on a skewer. Serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay mango rum

name: Mangorita
instructions: Add ingredients into a salt-rimmed cocktail or coupette glass.

name: Mangotini
instructions: Pour the vodka, Cointreau and Snapple mango madness into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked or cubed ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Manhasset
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Manhattan Bella
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: Manhattan Cocktail
instructions:
Combine the vermouth, bourbon whiskey, and bitters with 2 - 3 ice cubes in a mixing glass. Stir gently, don't bruise the spirits and cloud the drink. Place the cherry in a chilled cocktail glass and strain the whiskey mixture over the cherry. Rub the cut edge of the orange peel over the rim of the glass and twist it over the drink to release the oils but don't drop it in.

VARIATION: No bitters. Substitute a twist of lime for the cherry and orange. Hold the lime twist in a lighted match over the drink and then drop it in. The heat really zips up the lime flavor.

name: Manhattan for Rome
instructions: Build the Maker's Mark Bourbon whiskey and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur in an old-fashioned glass over ice and garnish with a maraschino cherry. Alternatively, muddle the cherry with ice before adding the Maker's Mark Bourbon whiskey and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur.

name: Manhattan Perfect
instructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Mansion Margarita
instructions: Blend ingredients in a shaker and serve on the rocks in a margarita glass.

name: Maple Lake Irish Shock
instructions: Bring to the boil; aftershock, cinnamon schnapps and apple cider. Stir in the cinnamon sticks, stirring frequently. Add apple slices and let cool for 2 minutes. Add the apple pucker and serve.

name: Maple Leaf
instructions: Pour Canadian whisky, Irish Mist, creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maple's Antigel
instructions: Boil water. Add gin, pure Maple Syrup and boiling water to a coffee mug.

name: Maraca
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Maracuja Martini
description: Thanks to Federico Daniel Rodriguez, Bartender resident of the Hotel Picos del Sur in El Calafate, Santa Cruz, Republica Argentina for this drink. "Its a really great cocktail to taste it before dinner. And it was my nearest invention. I hope you can make this drink and enjoy it as my customers do."Put 1 1/2 ounces of Vodka Smirnoff Maracuja flavored in a stirring glass. Then put 1/2 ounce of Marie Brizard Green Apple. Stir the cocktail. Serve it in a frozen cocktail glass, then pour 1/2 ounce of lime juice to finish it. Decorate whith a 1/4 of an apple and a lime twist.
instructions: Put 1 1/2 ounces of Vodka Smirnoff Maracuja flavored in a stirring glass. Then put 1/2 ounce of Marie Brizard Green Apple. Stir the cocktail. Serve it in a frozen cocktail glass, then pour 1/2 ounce of lime juice to finish it. Decorate whith a 1/4 of an apple and a lime twist.

name: Maragato
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: Maragato Special
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled double-cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and lime.

name: Maraschino Cherry
instructions: Pour the rum, amaretto, peach schnapps, juices and grenadine into a blender with two cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass, and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Maraschino Gin
instructions: Shake both ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Marbella Sunset
instructions: Add the rum, pineapple juice and orange juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice and shake well. Slowly strain into a cocktail glass and add the strawberry liqueur (it will sink to the bottom giving pink and orange hues reminiscent of a Marbella sunset!).

name: Marc Feldini
instructions: Pour vodka and sake into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a rind sliver of cucumber, and serve.

name: Marcelita
instructions: Assemble all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled margarita glass with a blend of salt and sugar (colored salt optional) on the rim of the glass. Garnish with fresh cranberries and lemon peel, and serve.

name: Mardee Mine
instructions: Combine the rum and vermouth in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: MargaFeni
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker 1/3 filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Margaret In The Marketplace
instructions: Combine the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Margarita Cocktail
instructions: Rum the rim of a cocktail glass with lime juice, and dip in salt. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into the glass, and serve.

name: Margarita Cocktail #2
instructions: Rub the rim of a margarita glass with lemon juice, and dip in salt. Shake ingredients with ice, strain into the glass, and serve.

name: Margarita Cocktail #3
instructions: Use a large metal container with plenty of ice and a strainer. Shake ingredients well, and pour them through a strainer into a margarita glass. Serve with salt and fresh lime.

name: Margarita Cocktail #4
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a margarita glass (salt rim if desired). Makes 2 servings.

name: Margarita's Cadillac Delight
instructions: Pour jose cuervo tequila and triple sec into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Fill with squirt, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Margarita's Delight
instructions: Pour tequila and triple sec into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Fill with squirt, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Margarita's Golden Delight
instructions: Pour gold cuervo tequila and triple sec into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Fill with squirt, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Margariteata
instructions: Squeeze citrus fruits into pitcher. Add sugar to boiling water until completely dissolved. Let cool and add this simple syrup to pitcher. To serve, combine tequila, green tea, and 2 oz of citrus mixture over ice in a margarita glass.

name: Maria Mia
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a twist of lemon, slice of banana and a cherry.

name: Maria on the Beach
instructions: Add the ice to a blender. Add rum, Kahlua, Bailey's, and pina colada mix. Blend until smooth. Serve in a Margarita glass rimmed with sugar.

name: Maria Theresa
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into a glass over ice.

name: Mariachi
instructions: Build all the ingredients in an old-fashioned glass and serve with a chilli pepper or jalapeno pepper wedged onto the rim of the glass.

name: Marilyn Monroe
instructions: Pour into a champagne saucer, and serve with two cherries on a stick.

name: Marilyn's Green Thing
instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice, then add liquors and a splash of pineapple juice. Top off with sour mix, pour everything into a strainer, shake well, pour back into glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice, if available.

name: Marimba
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange and pineapple slices.

name: Mario Driver
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice and add all ingredients.

name: Marionette
instructions: Pour the rum, cherry heering, apricot brandy and sake into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Mariposa
instructions: Pour the rum, brandy, lemon juice, orange juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maritime Martini
instructions: Pour the gin and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an anchovy-stuffed olive, and serve.

name: Marjito
description:
"I invented this recipe because one of my best friends LOVES all of the ingredients of a classical mojito, but HATES rum. I figured, if could add vodka instead of rum and serve it in a martini glass...... I could call it a marjito (combo of martini and mojito). I hope you enjoy it as much as we do!!!"Using 1/2 tbs sugar, coat the rim of the glass. 

Muddle the mint and lemon juice together and add them to the glass.

In a shaker, add Absolute Citron (or any citrus flavored vodka), simple syrup, a splash of club soda and ice. Stir or VERY gently shake. Remember...... this has club soda in it so do not shake to hard!!!! Strain and pour into glass with mint and and lemon. 

Garnish with a fresh sprig of mint (serve it martini glass).
instructions:
Using 1/2 tbs sugar, coat the rim of the glass. 

Muddle the mint and lemon juice together and add them to the glass.

In a shaker, add Absolute Citron (or any citrus flavored vodka), simple syrup, a splash of club soda and ice. Stir or VERY gently shake. Remember...... this has club soda in it so do not shake to hard!!!! Strain and pour into glass with mint and and lemon. 

Garnish with a fresh sprig of mint (serve it martini glass).

name: Mark Twain Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Marlene Dietrich
instructions: Shake ingredients well with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Squeeze in a piece of lemon and orange, and serve.

name: Maroon Lipstick
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Martian Cherry
instructions: Shake and strain into a glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Martian Hard On
instructions: Layer in order.

name: Martian Martini
instructions: Combine gin and midori in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail/martini glass.

name: Martina Mandarina
instructions: Pour juice, vodka and a splash of grand marnier in a shaker. Add ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange peel curl.

name: Martinet
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Stir or shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Martinez
description: Occasionally this combination of gin, vermouth, maraschino and bitters provides us with a much needed escape. Jerry Thomas described the Martinez as "an Old Tom Gin version of the Manhatten". Epicures will know it as something of an martini incognito, sadly understated. And, given the Martini, an icon of American culture, the Martinez Cocktail is something of a washed-out memento. That's not to say it isn't appreciated, however.Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Martini Clementine
description: The Martini Clementine is named after Clementine tangerines because the taste is so reminiscent.Pour the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker, Tanqueray gin, Malibu coconut rum, Belvedere vodka and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail or martini glass. Adjust orange to taste if desired. Serve.
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker, Tanqueray gin, Malibu coconut rum, Belvedere vodka and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail or martini glass. Adjust orange to taste if desired. Serve.

name: Martini Cocktail
description:
We're more likely accustomed to the Martini by psyche than any other cocktail; James Bond, F.D.Roosevelt, Ernest Hemingway. When reminded of this drink, knowing of it's social hierarchy, few can deny it's merits.

To an old hand, a well made Martini is pure delectation. As writer and novelist Bernard DeVoto once said "You can no more keep a Martini in the refrigerator than you can keep a kiss there. The proper union of gin and vermouth is ... one of the happiest marriages on earth, and one of the shortest lived."Stir with ice cubes, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive or a twist of lemon.
instructions: Stir with ice cubes, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive or a twist of lemon.

name: Martini Dominikanis
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon, and serve.

name: Martini Milano
instructions: Pour the gin, dry vermouth, dry white wine and Campari bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist, and serve.

name: Martini Navratilova
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Martini, Patton
instructions: Combine gin, vermouth and olive juice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with onions and olives on a toothpick.

name: Martunia
instructions: Shake all three ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an edible flower, and serve.

name: Marvellaid
instructions: Combine equal parts of orange vodka and cointreau in a shaker with ice. Shake until well chilled, and strain into a chilled martini (cocktail) glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mary Elizabeth Wagoner
instructions: Shake the vodka, rum, everclear and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, add lime juice on top and serve.

name: Mary Garden Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mary Pickford Cocktail
instructions: Combine the rum, pineapple juice, maraschino liqueur, and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Mary's Delight
instructions: Pour the vermouth, brandy and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maryville Sweet
instructions: Pour southern comfort and lime juice over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Master and Commander
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a rocks glass.

name: Masturbating Butterfly
instructions: Pour Midori, Absolut and sour mix into a glass on the rocks. Splash with the Sprite. With a spoon turned scoop side down, float your shot of Jager on top. Serve.

name: Matador Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until slushy, adding more ice if required. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Matinee
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, chartreuse, orange juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Matisse
instructions: Pour stoli oranj over ice in a shaker, and shake. Glaze a chilled cocktail glass with chambord, and add the stoli oranj. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Mauipazaui
instructions: Mix ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Best made with Malibu brand rum and California style Sunny D.

ingredients.name: Sunny Delight® California Style orange juice

name: Maureen's Dream
instructions: Pour the vermouth and anisette into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Maurice Chevalier
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maurice Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maverick
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

name: Max Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Max The Silent
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Max the Silent
instructions: Pour the anejo rum, brandy, Applejack brandy and anisette into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maxi
description: The Maxi was created by Max Capone; it's very popular at the Hyatt Regency's Bar Blue in Palm Springs.Take a large chilled cocktail glass and smear a lemon wedge around the rim. Coat the rim in sugar. Add a scoop of crushed ice to a cocktail shaker, and add all ingredients. Shake vigorously. Strain the concoction into a large cocktail glass (the drink should be a little fizzy with a bit of foam on the top). Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.
instructions: Take a large chilled cocktail glass and smear a lemon wedge around the rim. Coat the rim in sugar. Add a scoop of crushed ice to a cocktail shaker, and add all ingredients. Shake vigorously. Strain the concoction into a large cocktail glass (the drink should be a little fizzy with a bit of foam on the top). Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Maxi-Pad
instructions: Stir all ingredients together over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Maxim
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maxim's
instructions: Stir brandy, cointreau, raspberry liqueur and orange juice and strain into a champagne saucer. Add the champagne, and serve with a twist of orange.

name: Mayan O'Brien
instructions: Add whiskey and Kahlua to a hot mug of coffee. Float a puff of whipped cream and sprinkle with chocolate shavings.

name: Mayan Whore
instructions: Pour the tequila into a cocktail glass. Add the pineapple juice, top with soda and float the grenadine on top. Serve unstirred, with a straw.

name: Mayfair
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mayflower Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vermouth, brandy, Pernod, Cointreau and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mayflower Martini
instructions: Mix briefly over ice in a mixing glass and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lemon or orange twist if desired, and serve.

name: Mayor Billy
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, orange juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: MC Martini
instructions: Simply shake and strain and garnish with some redcurrants.

name: Mcclelland Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: McDuff
instructions: Combine the scotch, triple sec and bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: McRita Cocktail
instructions: Combine the tequila, triple sec, sour mix and Rose's lime juice with half a cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend well, and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and salt, and serve.

name: Meadowlark Lemon
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a tumbler.

name: Meiner
instructions: Pour the gin into a cocktail glass, almost fill with orange juice, and stir briefly. Add a slice of orange, and pour the campari gently onto the slice.

name: Melloer Yello
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Mellow Yellow
instructions: Stir together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Melon Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Melon Cooler
instructions: Build melon liqueur and dark rum in a medium-sized cocktail glass. Add cranberry juice and orange juice, stir, garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Melon Fever
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, triple sec and cream in order into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Melon Kamikaze
instructions: Mix sour mix, triple sec, and vodka together with ice in a shaker and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass over ice and add 1 oz of melon liqueur.

name: Melon Lime Daiquiri
instructions: Muddle the melon, sugar syrup, maraschino liqueur and lime juice together in a container. Add rum and ice, shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh sprigs of mint, and serve.

name: Melon Margarita
instructions: Serve on the rocks in a margarita glass or blend with ice.

name: Melon Margarita #2
instructions: Add the tequila, melon liqueur, orange juice and triple sec to a blender with some crushed ice. Blend until desired consistency. Pour intoa rimmed margarita glass, and serve.

name: Melon Martini
instructions: Muddle the melon, honey syrup, maraschino liqueur and lime juice together in a large mixing glass. Add vodka and ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Melon Pousse Cafe
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients in a cordial glass.

name: Melon Rudder
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice; strain into a sour glass.

name: Melon Sour
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail glass, stir and serve.

name: Melon Starburst
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Melon Tree
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Melonade
instructions: Add to an ice filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a green cherry.

name: Melonrita
instructions: Salt the rim of a margarita glass and add crushed ice. Pour all ingredients into the glass, stir and serve.

name: Melty Snowman
instructions: Tastes just like melted ice cream. Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Memory Loss
instructions: Pour the rum and the vodka over ice into the glass, and then add the rum. Then pour in the apple juice and squeeze the lemon on the top. Do not stir.

name: Menage A Trois
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Menday's Peril
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mendolsohn
instructions: Pour the Malibu mango rum into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the Coca-cola, then top it off with Smirnoff Triple Black, and serve.

name: Mercenary
instructions: Pour the vermouth, Armagnac and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Merete
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry, and serve.

name: Merete
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the cherry, and serve.

name: Merlin's Love Potion
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a lemon slice and sugar-dipped strawberry.

name: Merlins Monkey
instructions: Add milk to cocktail glass. Then add liquors together with milk. Stir, and add ice if desired.

name: Merry Widow #2
instructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, add a twist of lemon and drop into glass. Serve.

name: Merry Widow Cocktail
instructions: Stir maraschino and cherry brandy with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry and serve.

name: Metropolis
instructions: Pour the Absolut Mandrin vodka, triple sec, Rose's lime juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Metropolis #2
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of ruby grapefruit, and serve.

name: Metropolitan
instructions: Shake the Skyy vodka, cranberry juice and orange juice in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the cranberries, and serve.

name: Metropolitan
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Metropolitan #2
instructions: Build ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain carefully into a sugar-rimmed 10-oz cocktail glass so as not to knock sugar off rim. Garnish with a large lemon twist, and serve.

name: Metrosexual
instructions: Fill a glass with ice and add 3/4 oz. Mount Gay Mango Rum, 3/4 oz. Bacardi O, 1/2 oz. banana liqueur and fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a flag.

name: Mexican Beesting
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Mexican Bliss
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with half a slice of orange.

name: Mexican Blonde
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Cherry Bomb
instructions: Layer grenadine, then Kahlua, then the cream. Shoot.

name: Mexican Chocolate
instructions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig, and serve with short straws.

name: Mexican Fuck
instructions: Pour all in glass ... in that order! DO NOT STIR! Place handkerchief over glass and slam down on counter! Then drink it before the foam bubbles away!

name: Mexican Hot Chocolate
instructions: Put all ingredients into an Irish Coffee Mug. Dust with cocoa powder if desired.

name: Mexican Iceberg
instructions: Mix tequila and yukon jack together with ice cubes in a large tumbler glass. Add triple sec and lime juice (to taste). Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Mexican Iced Tea
instructions: Pour the tequila and Corono lager into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir gently, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Mexican Madras
instructions: Pour juices and tequila into a shaker 1/2 filled with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mexican Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a large cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a large cocktail/martini glass (8+ ounces) with a salt rim. Add two olives on a spear, and serve.

name: Mexican Martini #2
instructions: Add vodka, triple sec and lime juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake, strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Midget
instructions: Pour the gin, tequila and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranapple juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Mexican Mocha
instructions: Combine the espresso, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and chili pepper in the bottom of your coffee mug. Add the alcohol and chocolate. Stir with the cinnamon stick. Add hot water, milk/cream optional, drink and enjoy!

name: Mexican Mountie
instructions: Pour each part into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Top with a wedge of lime.

name: Mexican Mouthwash
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice, and gently swirl together. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Roots
instructions: Pour tequila and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Sexy Lemonade
instructions: Pour jose cuervo, triple sec and 7-up into a large ice-filled rocks glass. Fill with sweet and sour, and add sugar. Drop in a slice of lemon, stir well, and serve.

name: Mexican Skirt
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass. Add the shot of the tequila, and serve.

name: Mexican Strawberry
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry.

name: Mexican Sunset
description: Invented by H.B. Stone in California on Cinco de Mayo. Important to serve with a straw so that the Kahlua and grenadine (both very sweet) aren't left for last.Pour Kahlua coffee liqueur into a thoroughly chilled cocktail glass. Shake tequila and orange juice well with cracked ice and strain carefully into the glass, layering it atop the Kahlua. Pour a tiny dash of grenadine into the glass; it will sink and mix with the Kahlua. Serve with a short straw.
instructions: Pour Kahlua coffee liqueur into a thoroughly chilled cocktail glass. Shake tequila and orange juice well with cracked ice and strain carefully into the glass, layering it atop the Kahlua. Pour a tiny dash of grenadine into the glass; it will sink and mix with the Kahlua. Serve with a short straw.

name: Mexican Sunset #2
instructions: Pour 16 oz of Corona into a Pilsner glass, fill the remaining space with OJ until the color resembles a dusty sunset, drink chilled.

name: Mexican Surfer
instructions: Pour the malibu rum into an old-fashioned glass, and add tequila and pineapple juice. Add ice and stir.

name: Mexican Wife Beater
instructions: Pour the lemon juice, gold tequila and triple into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a beer glass. Fill glass with Stella Artois lager, and serve.

name: Mexican's Revenge
instructions: Shake and pour over ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve with straws.

name: Mexicana
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Meyer Lemon Martini
description:
"I accidentally invented these while making Key Lime Martinis.  I ran out of Key Limes and had to run around the corner to our Meyer Lemon tree.  Well, to my delight, they actually tasted smoother and richer.  The same recipe will make the Key Lime Martini, simply by trading the Meyer Lemons for Key Limes."Combine ingredients, over ice, into a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously and then strain into a chilled martini glass.  Garnish with a paper thin slice of Meyer Lemon, floating on the top.

These are DELICIOUS!  They have a richness to them, due to the vanilla vodka and the Meyer Lemons, which are sweeter, smoother and richer than regular lemons.
instructions:
Combine ingredients, over ice, into a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously and then strain into a chilled martini glass.  Garnish with a paper thin slice of Meyer Lemon, floating on the top.

These are DELICIOUS!  They have a richness to them, due to the vanilla vodka and the Meyer Lemons, which are sweeter, smoother and richer than regular lemons.

name: Miami Beach Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Miami Cocktail
instructions: Pour the white rum, creme de menthe and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Miami Meloni
instructions: Pour the white rum, melon liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Miami Sunset
description: A recipe with quite a bit of bite, found in a 1975 issue of Playboy magazine. Miami Sunset tastes like a Tequila Sunrise with more kick.Pour ingredients together on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Mix with a stirring stick, and garnish with a slice of orange.
instructions: Pour ingredients together on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Mix with a stirring stick, and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Miami Vice
instructions:
1. Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum w/ ice. Set aside.

2. Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum w/ ice. 

3. While frozen, add pina colada mix to a cocktail glass. Add the daiquiri mix on top, keeping it seperated from the pina colada mix. Serve.

name: Michael Angelo
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Michael Moros Detroit Boy
instructions: Combine ingredients with cracked ice in a blender. Blend for a few seconds until smooth. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with mint leaves, and serve.

name: Midas' Touch
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into the glass.

name: Midgetini
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Midland Mayham
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a beer mug / pint glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Midnight Caip
description:
Original drink made by a Greg Bale,a bartender in Brighton, UK. Basically a caipirinha w/ honey and espresso.1. Start with 8 lime cubes.
2. Add two barspoons of sugar.
3. Muddle limes and sugar.
4. Add two barspoons of Honey.
5. Add 1 shot of espresso.
6. Mix well - allowing for espresso to cool .
7. Add CRUSHED ice to top of glass.
8. Add 2 oz of Cachaca over the ice.
9. Mix well (shake if preferred).
10. DRINK.
instructions:
1. Start with 8 lime cubes.
2. Add two barspoons of sugar.
3. Muddle limes and sugar.
4. Add two barspoons of Honey.
5. Add 1 shot of espresso.
6. Mix well - allowing for espresso to cool .
7. Add CRUSHED ice to top of glass.
8. Add 2 oz of Cachaca over the ice.
9. Mix well (shake if preferred).
10. DRINK.

name: Midnight Cocktail
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy, triple sec and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Midnight Cowboy
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Midnight Express
instructions: Pour the dark rum, Cointreau, lime juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Midnight Kiss
instructions: Pour the vodka into a sugar-rimmed champagne flute and fill the rest of the glass with Champagne. Top with the Curacao, and serve.

name: Midnight Mint
instructions: Rim a cocktail (martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into the cocktail glass.

name: Midnight Samurai
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Midnight Sun
instructions: Pour the vodka, Cointreau, apricot brandy, grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne saucer or small wine glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Midnight's White Whisker
description: "We created this drink the morning after our big, black, cat died.  It was made and dedicated to his honor.  Of course, his name was Midnight and he had a distinctive white whisker." Rebecca and Tom Beasley. A great morning drink to open the eyes and bid Midnight a fond farewell.2 shots of Brandy and 4 ounces of cranberry juice (or to taste).  Simply pour the ingredients over ice and drink.
instructions: 2 shots of Brandy and 4 ounces of cranberry juice (or to taste).  Simply pour the ingredients over ice and drink.

name: Midori Alexander
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a brandy snifter. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Midori Champagne
instructions: Stir together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Strain into a champagne glass, and serve.

name: Midori Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a champagne saucer. Top with champagne, and serve.

name: Midori Firecracker
instructions: Fill a whiskey sour glass with cubed ice. Pour in Midori, then sour apple, and finish with cranberry juice producing a layered effect. Serve.

name: Midori Hack
instructions: Shake midori, vodka, and sweet and sour over ice in a tin. Prepare a large rocks glass by juicing lime garnish into the glass half filled with ice. Strain in the chilled cocktail, add a splash of pineapple juice (upto half an ounce), and serve.

name: Midori Margarita
instructions:
Moisten the rim of a cocktail glass with lime juice and dip in salt. Shake ingredients together, and pour into a glass filled with crushed ice. 

Optional: Mix above ingredients with one cup of ice in a blender for a smooth, "granita" type drink.

name: Midori Martini
instructions: Shake Midori and vodka with ice. Strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Midori Sour #3
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Midori Splice
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add Midori, then Malibu, and top with pineapple juice to create a layered effect. Serve.

name: Midori Sunrise
instructions: Mix one part of midori (or equivalent melon liqueur) with one part orange juice. Add a splash of grenadine syrup, and serve.

name: Midtwinkle Martini
instructions: Combine spirits over ice in a cocktail shaker, shake, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a segment or two of peeled clementine or tangelo, and serve.

name: Mikado
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Mike Hoffman's Manhattan
instructions: Shake and strain into chilled martini glass. Add cherry.

name: Mike Tyson
instructions: Mix and serve with ice.

name: Mike's Chocolate Orange
instructions: Put some ice in a rocks glass. Pour creme de cacao into glass, followed by triple sec. Stir and enjoy!

name: Mikey's Breakfast Banger
instructions: Pour the ingredients over ice, allow it to chill for a moment and then strain into a red wine glass. Garnish with an orange and serve.

name: Mikhail's Martini
instructions: Pour the Stoli coffee vodka (Kafya) and Stoli vanilla vodka (Vanil) into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Milano Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, galliano and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: MILF
instructions: Put everything in a mixing cup with ice, shake and strain into glass.

name: Milk Stiffy
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Milkshake Cocktail
instructions: Combine the Bailey's irish cream, milk, egg yolk, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Milky Way Galaxy
instructions: Combine milk, amaretto and vanilla extract in a blender for 60 seconds. Pour over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass, and sprinkle with cinnamon. Stir with a straw, and serve.

name: Milky Way Martini
instructions: Combine all ingredients, mix, and serve in a cocktail glass without ice.

name: Millennium Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Beefeater gin, cherry brandy, orange juice and ginger ale into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Milli Vanilli
instructions: Pour the Dr. McGillicuddy's vanilla schnapps and Kahlua coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top with cream or milk, to taste, and serve.

name: Million-Dollar Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Millionaire
instructions: Shake well and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with broken ice.

name: Mimosa Moon
instructions: Chill all ingredients. Pour into champange flute.

name: Mind Bender
instructions: Pour the vodka, amaretto and Sprite into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice, and stir. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Mind Eraser
instructions: Pour vodka, kahlua, and tonic water into a rocks or old-fashioned glass. Serve with a straw.

name: Mind Eraser #3
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice, and carefully layer in each ingredient; kalhua, vodka, butterscotch schnapps, then 7-up.

name: Mind Slicer
instructions: Serve over crushed ice, stir gently.

name: Minerva McGonagall
instructions: Rim cocktail glass with lime juice. Add ingredients, mix and serve.

name: Ming Tran
instructions: Stir together in a cocktail glass. Top with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Mingtini
instructions: Place all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake till ice cold. Place a cherry in the bottom of a large martini glass, strain contents of shaker into the glass, and serve.

name: Mint Chip
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Mint Chip Ice Cream
instructions: Pour all ingredients over crushed ice and serve with a cocktail sipping straw.

name: Mint Chocolate Chip #2
instructions: Build over ice in a double old-fashioned glass.

name: Mint Cocoa Mocha
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Mint Condition
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve with a straw.

name: Mint Daiquiri
instructions: Prepare in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mint Gin Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mint Martini
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and creme de menthe. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Mint Russian
instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add creme de menthe, top with cream and serve.

name: Mint Russki
instructions: Place twisted or crushed fresh mint leaves into a medium sized cocktail glass. Add frozen vodka, and ice if desired. Stir briefly.

name: Mint Tea
instructions: Pour white creme de menthe over ice in a cocktail glass and add iced tea to taste.

name: Minttini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, then pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

name: Mirage
instructions: Shake with ice and stir in chilled glasses. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Miscegenation
instructions: Put the vanilla and chocolate ice cream into a large martini cocktail glass. Add the half and half and vodka, give it just one stir. Drizzle on the Kahlua, top with a splash of bourbon and the cherry. Serve.

name: Miss Belle
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Miss Money Penny
description: A drink for chocolate lovers everywhere. The first appearance of a Miss Money Penny is rusty brown but soon darkens to a rich dark almost translucent brown. Created by Jason Wright at No.10 Cafe Bar, Bridport, UK.Shake all ingredients with lots of ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a frozen cocktail/martini glass. Flame orange zest onto the surface and use orange peel as garnish.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with lots of ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a frozen cocktail/martini glass. Flame orange zest onto the surface and use orange peel as garnish.

name: Miss Tina
instructions: Stir ingredients together over crushed ice in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Missile Rider
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Missile Stopper
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Mission Accomplished
instructions: Pour the vodka, triple sec, Rose's lime juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mississippi Mud
instructions: Combine the Southern Comfort, coffee liqueur and ice cream in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Missouri Rattlesnake
instructions: Shake well and pour in a cocktail glass over ice.

name: Mist Cream
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mister Christian
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mister Pibb
instructions: Almost fill a 12-oz highball glass with ice. Add the whisky, amaretto and cola last. Serve.

name: Mister Wu
instructions: Pour two ounces of whiskey and one ounce of vodka on ice into a regular glass. Add three ounces of lemon-lime soda and a dash of orange juice. Serve.

name: Mistletoe Martini
instructions: Chill cocktail glass. In a mixing glass, pour all ingredients together. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Mistral
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Pour into a champagne saucer, and serve.

name: Misty Loch
instructions: Pour the drambuie, gin and bailey's irish cream into a shaker with ice. Shake, strain into a brandy snifter, and add two small dashes of kahlua.

name: Mithering Bastard
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Mocha Blanca Martini
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a chocolate curl, and serve.

name: Mocha Martini
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Mocha Mint
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mocha Nut
instructions: Add everything to a hot mug of coffee, splashing the cream on top.

name: Mochatini
instructions: Shake all ingredents with ice in a martini shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Serve.
