name: MoCo Melon
instructions: Shake all ingredients except Midori in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into glass and float Midori on top.

name: Model United Nations
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass with/without ice as desired, and serve.

name: Modern Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mofo Cocktail
instructions: Layer ingredients in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mohican
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Sprinkle with a straight line of grated chocolate.

name: Moira
instructions: Shake and strain into a liqueur or cordial glass.

name: Mojito Martini
instructions: Wet the rim of a cocktail glass and press down in sugar to get it on the rim. Put mint leaves and lime juice (per drink) in a cocktail shaker. Mash ("muddle") the mint with spoon. Add light rum and ice. Shake, strain, pour. If it's too tart, add sugar to the shaker.

name: Mojito Tampa
instructions: Squeeze and add the lime slices into an old-fashioned glass. Add the mint leaves and decorate with mint leaves on the stem. Add the ice, sugar and soda water to make simple syrup. Use a large wooden spoon to crush and infuse the ingredients together. Add the rum last, and serve.

name: Mojo Jojo
instructions: Shake in glass with a cube of ice. Remove ice and serve chilled.

name: Molehill Lounger
instructions: Pour whiskey and creme de cacao into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Moles Juice
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, Southern Comfort and blue curacao into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Add sour mix and pineapple juice according to personal tastes, and serve.

name: Molester Cocktail
instructions: Stir the rum, vodka, watermelon schnapps and hawaiian schnapps together in a wine goblet filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of 7-up and sour mix, and serve.

name: Moll Flanders Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, sloe gin, dry vermouth and Angostura bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mom's Apple Pie
instructions: Pour apple schnapps over ice in a brandy snifter and float hot damn on top.

name: Moment Brutale
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except gin) in a blender. Strain into seperate cocktail glasses, stir in the gin, and serve.

name: Monastery Cocktail
instructions: Pour the coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Add the sugar; stir to dissolve. Add the benedictine and stir again. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon to float on top, and serve.

name: Monday Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice; strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice if desired.

name: Monet Carribean Frost
instructions: Add rums and vanilla to an ice-filled brandy snifter. Add a splash of cola and fill with orange juice. Pour mixture into blender and half blend so it isn't too thick. Pour back into a brandy snifter and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Mongolian Dingbat
instructions: Combine the Bacardi white rum, Tia Maria coffee liqueur and ice cream in a blender. Blend well. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Monk Cocktail
instructions: Combine the Bailey's irish cream, Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and vanilla ice cream in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass, add a straw and serve.

name: Monk Special
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a short glass, and serve.

name: Monk's Martini
instructions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Monk's Rope Coffee
instructions: Pour the coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Add the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and creme de cacao; stir. Float the heavy cream on top, and serve.

name: Monkey Gland
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange wrapped around a cherry.

name: Monkey Gland #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Monkey Tree
instructions: Rim a frosted cocktail glass with grenadine/caster sugar. Shake ingredients and strain into the glass.

name: Monkey Wrench
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Monkey's Dessert
instructions: Shake Kahlua and banana liqueur in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and fill with chocolate milk.

name: Monkey's Heaven
instructions: Pour liqueur in glass, then milk and stir.

name: Monkey's Lunch
instructions:
Pour alcohol over ice in a cocktail glass and add milk.

Note: For a bit of a twist you could add a splash of bailey's irish cream. This drink is also tasty as a 'special' coffee. Just sugar your rim, add liquor, pour coffee and add some whip.

name: Monkey's Nuts
instructions: Mix Creme de Almond and Banana Liqueur together in a rocks glass filled with ice, then add Kahlua and top with whipped cream.

name: Monongahela Cobbler
instructions: Place the icing sugar in a tumbler with some thin parings of orange and lemon peels. Fill 1/3 of the glass with shaved ice and add bourbon whiskey to taste. Stir and garnish with fruit and 2 straws.

name: Monster Mash
instructions: Mix everything in a large beer glass and enjoy!

name: Montana
instructions: Stir all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Montana Smoothie
instructions: Pour Black Velvet brand whiskey into glass, top with schnapps. Do not chill or add ice.

name: Montezuma
instructions: Blend ingredients briefly, with half a cup of crushed ice, in a blender at low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Montgomery
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of lemon.

name: Montmartre Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Montreal Club Bouncer
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: Montreal Gin Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Moo Moo Land
instructions: Shake everything (except nutmeg) with ice; strain into cocktail glass. Dust with nutmeg.

name: MOO-salini
instructions: Combine Amaretto, Galliano, Triple Sec in shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Add Half n Half into glass and serve.

name: Moocow's Brown Cow
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a cinnamon stick, and serve.

name: Moon Inn Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black grape and lime twist, and serve.

name: Moon Quake Shake
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Moonlight
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Moonlight Drive
instructions: Pour alcohol into a shaker, and add juices. Shake and pour into a punch cup with ice. Add a cherry and a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Moontini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. If actual moonshine can be acquired it is better. If not, Georgia Moon will suffice.

name: Moose Martini
instructions: Shake both ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with juniper berries macerated in vermouth, and serve.

name: Mooselips
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Morgan's Mountain
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the kahlua into the center of the drink.

name: Morley's Driver
instructions: Pour the rum, cherry brandy, creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee glass, and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon to float on top, and serve.

name: Morning Cocktail
instructions: Pour the brandy, dry vermouth, triple sec, maraschino, anisette and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Morning Glory Cocktail
instructions: Combine the vodka, creme de cacao and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a dusting of nutmeg, and serve.

name: Morro
instructions: Rub the rim of old-fashioned glass with lime juice, and dip into powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Morro
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into tumblers with sugared rims.

name: Morticia
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Mortini
instructions: Pour grenadine and amaretto into a chilled cocktail glass. Add chilled vodka.

name: Moscow Bobsled
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Moscow Chill
instructions: Pour the Stoli pepper vodka (Pertsovka) into a champagne saucer filled with shaved ice. Fill with Dr. Pepper soda, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Mostly Mal
instructions: Combine the rum, vermouth, triple sec and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass garnished with a cherry.

name: Mother Fucked Up
instructions: Pour it all in a tall cup and stir slightly.

name: Mother Fucking Ape
instructions: Pour all ingredients except for brandy into a mug filled with ice cubes, and stir. Drizzle brandy on top and serve.

name: Mott Street Manhattan
instructions: Mix all liquid ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lychee nut, and serve.

name: Moulin Rouge Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mounds Martini
instructions: Pour over ice in shaker. Shake well. Served up in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with shaved coconut if desired.

name: Mount Chocolate
instructions: Make a hot chocolate. Add Godiva white liqueur and another chocolate liqueur. Top with whipped cream. Put approx. 1 tablespoon chocolate chips on top of whipped cream.

name: Mount Fuji
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mountain Berry Punch
instructions: Combine the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey, blueberry and raspberry schnapps, strawberry liqueur, cranberry juice and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a splash of 7-up. Float the cherry brandy on top. Garnish with an orange twist and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mountain Blue
instructions: Add blue curacao, schnapps, vodka, and gatorade together in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass over ice, and serve.

ingredients.name: Gatorade® Cool Blue Raspberry energy drink

name: Mountain Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mountain Don't
instructions: Mix in an old-fashioned, over ice. Stir and enjoy.

name: Mountain Stream
instructions: Shake everything (except 7-up) with ice; strain into cocktail glass. Fill with 7-up.

name: Mountain Sunrise
instructions: Shake and serve over crushed ice.

name: Mountaineer On Acid
instructions: Mix in shaker, and serve chilled.

name: Mountie
instructions: Pour whisky and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mozart Cocktail
instructions: Combine the rum, vermouth, triple sec and orange bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve with a lemon twist.

name: Mozart Cocktail
instructions: Pour the anejo rum, sweet vermouth, triple sec and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Mozart Sonatine
instructions: Pour the chocolate liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add grand marnier, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Mozartus
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of star-fruit.

name: Mr. Jetson
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with plenty of ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a pre-chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

ingredients.name: Vincent Van Gogh® Dutch chocolate vodka

name: Mr. Manhattan Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, orange juice, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with 4 sprigs of mint, and serve.

name: Mr. New Yorker
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mr. P
instructions: In a cocktail glass, add cherry flavouring, cherry juice, vodka, and fill the rest of the glass with Mountain Dew and garnish with a piece of pineapple.

name: Mr. Stumpfy
instructions: Start with a cup, pour in one shot of the gin then a splash of grenadine to taste (you will figure this out after you drink 2 or 3) then add a dash of lime juice and a dash of lemon juice. Fill up the rest of the cup (about 6 oz) with vault energy soda and stir.

name: Much Fuss for the Conquering Hero
instructions: Pour the vermouth, brandy, juices and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mud Puddle
instructions: Place the vodka, Dr. Pepper, and orange juice into a pint glass with ice. Stir.

name: Mud Slide
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Muddpuddle
instructions: Mix all ingredients into shaker, pour over ice.

name: Muddy River
instructions: Shake ingredients well and pour into a rocks glass.

name: Mudslide
instructions: Pour hershey's chocolate syrup around the inside rim of a rocks glass. Fill with ice, add ingredients, and serve.

name: Mudwrestle
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker. Serve in an ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

name: Mulata
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass.

name: Mulatto Russian
instructions: Pour the vodka and coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with light cream, add chocolate syrup to taste, and serve.

name: Mulch Muncher
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into cocktail glass.

name: Mule
instructions: Pour smirnoff vodka into a glass. Fill with ginger beer, add ice and squeeze in the lime juice.

name: Mule's Hind Leg
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Mulled Port
instructions: Peel and slice the oranges, and place the peel in a large nonreactive saucepan. Add cloves, mace, nutmeg, allspice, cinnamon stick, sugar and 2 cups of water. Set over a medium-high heat and stir frequently to dissolve the sugar. Allow the reach the boil and turn down to medium heat. Simmer for 10 minutes. Strain the mixture and return to the pan. Add port and heat, but do not boil. Serve in Irish coffee glasses with a slice of peeled orange in each. Makes 6 (6-ounce) Irish coffee glasses.

name: Mulled Red Wine
instructions: Heat in a small saucepan and strain into a heatproof cup. Do not boil.

name: Mullens Mai Tai
instructions: Combine ingredients in an empty shaker. Shake vigorously then pour contents into a tall cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, a wedge of pineapple or a cherry (or all three).

name: Mumbai Bombshell
instructions: Pour the cherry brandy, Malibu rum, cognac and vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mumbo Jumbo
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Mumsicle
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, bourbon, and bitters. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Murder in the Forest
instructions: Add all ingredients (except grenadine) to a shaker, shake well, and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes if desired. Slowly add a dash of grenadine, garnish with a cherry, and serve with a straw.

name: Muscovy Martini
instructions: Pour the Stoli cinnamon vodka (Zinamon), Stoli orange vodka (Ohranj), triple sec and orange juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel, first squeezing it over the drink then dropping it on top. Sprinkle a bit of ground cinnamon over the top, and serve.

name: Muskmelon
instructions: Combine the dark rum, pieces of cantaloupe melon, lime juice, orange juice and sugar with 1/3 cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend well until smooth. Pour into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a piece of cantaloupe, and serve.

name: Mussaka
instructions: Pour ouzo and drambuie into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with pepsi cola, and serve.

name: Mutagen
instructions: Pour the dark rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Add cream to taste. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Mutiny
instructions: Combine the rum, dubonnet, and bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: My Dear Aunt Ruby
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a citrus slice, and serve.

name: My Malibu Delight
instructions: Get a cold beer mug and a straw. Add 1 part (about 3 shots worth) of Malibu Rum, and add 1 to 2 parts (depending how strong you want it) of Sprite or 7-up. Add a few cherries or a lemon twist or two, -or- add all the fruit. Put in the straw, add ice to chill, and enjoy!!

name: My Own Worst Enemy
instructions: Layer BíƒÂ¤renjíƒÂ¤ger then JíƒÂ¤germeister into shot glass. Drop shot into half filled glass of Rockstar and shoot.

name: My Sweet Red Lips
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice, or blend with ice. Strain into glass.

name: N'awlins Mudslide
description: Invented by John Juneau, making a contribution to re-build New Orleans.Add ice to an old-fashioned glass and add all three ingredients. Swirl the glass to blend the colors. Prolonged sipping is suitable or drink it like a shot. Savor the flavor!
instructions: Add ice to an old-fashioned glass and add all three ingredients. Swirl the glass to blend the colors. Prolonged sipping is suitable or drink it like a shot. Savor the flavor!

name: Nagel Nectar
instructions: Combine butterscotch schnapps and milk in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Naked Pear
instructions: Mix apple vodka, melon liqueur and triple sec in a shaker. Fill a glass with ice. Pour the ingredients from the shaker into glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sour mix and pineapple, garnish with a cherry.

name: Naked Pretzel
instructions: Pour the vodka, melon liqueur, creme de cassis and pineapple juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nan's Special
instructions: Mix the vodka, 7-up, and soda in that order. Add lemon juice. Add salt gradually until the sweet taste of 7-up just disappears.

name: Nantucket Cocktail
instructions: Pour the white brandy, cranberry juice and grapefruit juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Napalm #2
instructions:
Add ice to glass 1/2 full. Pour in Gin. Squeeze lemon juice over ice. 
Add Gatorade mix. Slowly add 7-up to top. Gently stir until powder mix is dissolved.

name: Naple's Old-Fashioned
instructions: Muddle a sugar cube with bitters in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Stir in the whiskey and the orange juice. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, slices of orange and a maraschino cherry. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Napoleon
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Napoleon on the Back
instructions: Serve straight on the rocks.

name: Napoleon's Mexican Winter
instructions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a mug, followed by the cream, and then the Courvoisier, and stir them together. Microwave on high for about 30 seconds, and serve.

name: Narragansett
instructions: Combine the bourbon, vermouth, and anisette in an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Nasty Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka, Kahlua coffee liqueur, Wild turkey whiskey, brown creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: National Cocktail
instructions: Pour the rum, apricot brandy, pineapple juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Naughtios Anemos
instructions: Stir together on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Naughty Angel
instructions: Stir.

name: Naughty Boy
instructions: Fill Jagermeister first, then add orange juice, then add Red Bull.

name: Naughty Gnome
instructions: Pour the rum into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with Vernors ginger soda, add a dash or two of bitters, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Private Stock dark rum

name: Naughty Nick
instructions: Fill a glass with cubed ice. Add McCormick's vodka. Fill the rest of the glass with Mountain Dew. Stir and enjoy.

name: Navy Seal
instructions: Serve on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Nazi Cola
instructions: Combine jagermeister and rumple minze over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with cola, and serve.

name: Nazzy Baby
instructions: In a straight tall pint glass fill 2/3 of it with ice then add liquors. Add a dash of lemonade and fill the rest of the glass with fresh orange juice.

name: Neato Bandito
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass with a salted rim.

name: Negroni - Zimbabwe Style
instructions: Coat the rim of an old-fashioned glass with sugar. Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker, and pour into the glass over plenty of ice.

name: Negroni Cocktail
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass 3/4 filled with cracked ice. Add a splash of soda water if desired. Garnish with a half slice of orange.

name: Negus
instructions: Heat ingredients (with lemon thinly sliced into rings, and a heaped teaspoon of sugar). Strain into a heat-proof goblet when hot.

name: Nelson Special
instructions: Pour gin into a cocktail glass with ice cubes, and fill one-quarter full with cranberry juice. Fill with tonic water. Blend briefly with a small stick and drop in a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Neo-Tropical
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Neon Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, strain into glasses.

name: Neon Ghost
instructions: Shake it with ice, and serve it in a cocktail glass

name: Neon Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients and pour into beer mugs filled with ice. Top with a cherry.

name: Neon Voodoo
instructions: Combine the vodka, apple juice, and mountain dew in a blender with about 6-8 ice cubes, and blend on high for about 10 seconds. Add more vodka if desired.

name: Neon-Geek
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with one cup of crushed ice. Strain into a margarita glass and serve immediately.

name: Neopolitan
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, chill and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Neopolitan Martini
instructions: Pour stoli vanil, stoli oranj, grand marnier, parfait d'amour and lime juice into a mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and garnish with orange peel.

name: Net Surfer
instructions: Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass frosted with strawberry.

name: Netherland
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Network Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients except 151-proof rum in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Float 151-proof rum on top.

name: Neutered Purple Squirrel
instructions: Pour the light rum, dark rum, blue curacao, grenadine and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice. Add the club soda. Garnish with an almond-embedded slice of lime, and serve.

name: Neva Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Stoli pepper vodka (Pertsovka), tomato juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice, and serve.

name: Nevada Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Nevins
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nevinson
instructions: Shake all ingredients except club soda with ice. Strain into ice-filled old fashioned glass. Top up with club soda.

name: New Fashioned
description: Served at various golf clubs in Northern California.In a pint glass, muddle fresh basil, one strawberry, sugar, and bitters. Add ice along with bourbon and vermouth and gently swirl to mix and chill. Dump(don't strain) mixture into an old-fashioned glass - add more ice if needed. Garnish with remaining strawberry and serve.
instructions: In a pint glass, muddle fresh basil, one strawberry, sugar, and bitters. Add ice along with bourbon and vermouth and gently swirl to mix and chill. Dump(don't strain) mixture into an old-fashioned glass - add more ice if needed. Garnish with remaining strawberry and serve.

name: New Moon
instructions: Pour the gin, triple sec and Rose's lime juice into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with tonic water, or add to taste. Stir again gently. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: New Old Fashioned
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes or cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and drop in a maraschino cherry before serving.

name: New Orleans Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: New Orleans Martini
instructions: Pour the Stoli vanilla vodka (Vanil), dry vermouth, Pernod and Angostura bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: New Orleans Sazerac
instructions: Place a sugar cube into an old-fashioned glass, and saturate with angostura bitters. Add ice cubes, pour in liquors, and add a twist of lemon peel. Fill with water, stir well, and serve.

name: New York Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of orange.

name: New York Flip
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: New York Lemonade
instructions: Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a frosted rim (lemon and sugar).

name: New York Motherfucker
instructions: Pour the vodka, rum, gin and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with cream as desired, and serve.

name: New York Peppermint Patty Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: New York Sour
instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret red wine on top, and serve with a half-slice of lemon and a cherry.

name: New York Tiger
description: Invented by Thomas McDonley while bartending at a UF party. A variation on the New Yorker that is similar to the Tiger Jack. Also known as a Orange New Yorker.Put a ice filled Martini glass in the refrigerator to chilll. Fill cocktail shaker 3/4 the way full with ice. Add and combine all ingredients into the cocktail shaker. Shake vigourously until the shaker is coated with a layer of condensated ice. Take martini glass out of fridge and dump ice out. Strain cocktail shaker into the martini glass.
instructions: Put a ice filled Martini glass in the refrigerator to chilll. Fill cocktail shaker 3/4 the way full with ice. Add and combine all ingredients into the cocktail shaker. Shake vigourously until the shaker is coated with a layer of condensated ice. Take martini glass out of fridge and dump ice out. Strain cocktail shaker into the martini glass.

name: New Yorker
instructions: Pour bourbon over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Squeeze a lime wedge into the drink, and drop into glass. Add grenadine, stir well, and serve.

name: Newbury Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, sweet vermouth and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Newtron Bomb
description: Invented in Auburn, Alabama by A Mr. Will Newton, a discrete field goal kicker on the Auburn football team, he was known more for his wild parties than his kicking ability. This drink has been around for nearly a decade in Auburn, but is known mostly by people in the athletic and fraternity circles.Pour the jagermeister into an old-fashioned glass. Add ginger ale to taste, and serve.
instructions: Pour the jagermeister into an old-fashioned glass. Add ginger ale to taste, and serve.

name: Niagara Falls
instructions: Build all ingredients (except ginger ale) in a cocktail or champagne glass. Add ginger ale, and serve.

name: Nice Melons
instructions: Combine the light rum, watermelon pieces, lime juice and peach in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well, and pour into a hurricane glass. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Nick and Nora Martini
instructions: Pour gin and vermouth into a mixing glass filled with ice, and stir well. Strain into a chilled martini glass, garnish with an olive, and serve.

name: Nick's Mountain Dew
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nickel Fever
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, Southern Comfort, galliano, cream and orange juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with ice chips and 8-10 drops of blue curacao, and serve.

name: Nicky Finn
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon twist.

name: Nicky's Kingpin
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Nicky's Red Devil
instructions: Pour ingredients over an ice cube in a cocktail glass. Stir, add a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Nifty
instructions: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a martini cocktail glass. Fill with cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Night and Day
instructions: Add to a wine goblet half-filled with crushed ice, and serve

name: Night Cap
instructions: Pour the rum into an Irish coffee mug and fill with warm milk. Sweeten to taste. Stir, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Night Light
instructions: Combine all three ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Night on Bourbon Street
instructions: Pour ingredients into rocks glass over ice.

name: Night Skies Over London
instructions: Serve in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Nightboat to Brazil
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain.

name: Nightboat to Recife
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a tumbler with crushed ice.

name: Nightie Lifter
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice, pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Nightmare
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nikita
instructions: Fill shaker with ice and shake everything until it's ice cold! Pour into glass.

name: Nilla Wafer Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with a vanilla bean if you're feeling generous.

name: Nina's Special
instructions: Blend together in equal parts in a cocktail glass.

name: Nineteenth Hole
instructions: Stir the gin, dry vermouth, sweet vermouth and bitters with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with an olive, and serve.

name: Ninja Turtle
instructions: Pour the vodka into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top with the Hawaiian Punch juice. Add a lime slice, and serve.

name: Ninotchka Cocktail
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nirvana
instructions: Shake everything with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Nixon
instructions: Add ice to common plastic cup. Fill cup approximatly halfway with the MacMasters. Fill remaining cup with half Squirt and half Mountain Lightning. Serve with straw.

ingredients.name: Sam's Choice® Mountain Lightning citrus soda

name: No Fucking Idea
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes (on the rocks), and serve.

name: No Way
instructions: Shake everything together and pour into a pint glass.

name: No Worries
instructions: Pour the brandy over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add Dr. Pepper, and serve.

name: Noblesse
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a seedless grape, and serve.

name: Nog De Cacao
instructions: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with cocoa, and serve.

name: Nookie
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nooner
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: North Dakota Special
instructions: Add shots to an old-fashioned glass. Fill with coca-cola and serve.

name: North Polar
instructions: Mix and serve over ice with a slice of orange.

name: North Pole Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except whipped cream) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Northern Exposure
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: NoSay
instructions: Fill a beer mug with beer and drop in a raw egg. Drop in a shot of overproof rum and chug the whole thing. Swallow the raw egg when you hit the bottom of the glass.

name: Notre Dame Pick-Me-Up
instructions: Add all items to a whiskey sour glass. Mix well with a bar spoon.

name: Novocaine
instructions: Shake pisang, gin, and chartreuse with half a glassful of broken ice, and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Add the bitter lemon, and serve.

name: Now and Later
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nubian Queen
instructions: Add ice to the mug and add JíƒÂ¤germeister and the dark rum. Fill with chocolate milk. Gently pour the caramel vodka into the drink.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Private Stock dark rum

name: Nuck'n Futs
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail glass with crushed/shaven ice, stir and serve.

name: Nuclear Kamikaze
instructions: Mix sour mix, triple sec, and vodka in shaker with ice. Strain into cocktail glass and add Blue Maui to mixture.

name: Nuclear Meltdown
instructions: Shake all ingredients except soda in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a double old-fashioned glass over ice and fill with soda.

name: Nuclear Smoothie
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Nuclear Waste
instructions: Blend vodka, blue curacao and bailey's in a shaker. Pour into a cocktail glass and top up with coke.

name: Nude Ell Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nummer 10
instructions: Fill a whiskey sour glass one-third full with raspberry vodka. Sprinkle a few drops of kahlua on top and mix. Fill with schweppes russian and serve.

name: Nut Case
instructions: Pour the light rum, Frangelico hazelnut liqueur, amaretto almond liqueur and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nut Crusher
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Sprinkle with chopped hazelnuts, and serve.

name: Nut Sauce
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff watermelon vodka into a cocktail glass. Add the raspberry sparkling water. Serve with a piece of watermelon and 2 raspberries inside the glass.

name: Nutcracker #2

name: Nuts and Cream
instructions: Pour ingrdients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Nutty Belgian

description: Nutty Italian is a popular after-dinner cocktail. It was created by Patricia Richards, a bartender at Fiamma Trattoria, MGM Grand Hotel, Las Vegas.Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Strain over fresh ice in an old fashioned glass, and serve.
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Strain over fresh ice in an old fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Nutty Russian
instructions: Mix well over ice and serve.

name: Nutty-Tini

instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: O & Cream

name: O Circle Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain and serve into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

name: O Martini Cocktail

name: O My Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Top with grenadine.

name: O.D.

name: Oakland Cocktail

name: Occhi Blu

name: Ocean Drive

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay mango rum

name: Octapussy

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Of Darkness

instructions: Pour the ojen, peychaud bitters, sugar and water into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ol' Dirty Bastard

name: Old 7's

name: Old Bastard
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass with a couple of ice cubes.

name: Old Country Martini
instructions: Pour the vodka, madeira wine and cherry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Old Groaner's Wife

name: Old Moorhen's Shredded Sporran

name: Old-Fashioned Cocktail

name: On the Green
description: A popular golf-themed cocktail.Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake until well chilled. Pour with or without ice in a cocktail/martini glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake until well chilled. Pour with or without ice in a cocktail/martini glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Once Upon a Time

name: Once-Upon-A-Time
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

Add an old-fashioned glass of ice to the mixing glass, then pour in the vodka. Shake well for 10 seconds, and pour everything out into the old-fashioned glass. Add additional cracked ice where needed, and serve.

name: Oppressor

instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Orange Monk
instructions: Also good as a shot.

name: Orange Rita
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker, and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh orange and lime slices.

name: Orange Smooth
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Orange Tiger

name: Orchard Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into sugar rimmed glass. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Orchid Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, violet liqueur and egg white into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Organ Grinder
instructions: Blend and pour over crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with coconut shavings and serve.

name: Orgasm
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Orgasm #12
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Orgasm #7
instructions: Pour both ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Orgasm #8
instructions: Pour both ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Orgasm #9
instructions: Pour all three ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass, stir and serve.

name: Orgasm a la Denmark
instructions: Stir together until it masks the vodka and looks like bailey's.

name: Orgasm on the Beach

name: Orgasmic Fantasy
instructions: Pour vodka into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Add the bailey's, kahlua, and vanilla extract. Stir, and serve.

name: Orient Express
instructions: Put cinnamon and sugar, mixed, on the rim of a cocktail glass. Add the Smirnoff, Frangelico, Bailey's, and espresso to the glass and mix thoroughly. Add cream to taste, and serve.

name: Oriental Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Oriental Peacock
instructions: In a mixer add crushed ice (or just some broken ice cubes). Add liqour then top up with cider to taste. Don't shake it, just leave it for 30 seconds and pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Original By the Pool
instructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass. Add splash of orange juice on top.

name: Original Mai Tai (slight variation)
description:
"This is a slight modification of Trader Vic's original recipe (I chose those rums, because I think they lend an excellent flavor to this drink.) You may choose any rum you want (its a matter of taste, as I see it), just make sure its 2 ounces.
There is NO pineapple juice, NO sweet and sour, NO orange juice... and NO BLENDER (unless you are using one to crush the ice) The travesties there are out there these days claiming to be a mai tai are both amusing and sad. Try one like this and see.. everyone I have made one for has come to realize the truth about the real Mai Tai: it truly is.. the best."Hand shake, the lime juice from 1 lime should be squeezed into the shaker. Pour over crushed ice and garnish with half of the lime shell inside the drink and float a sprig of fresh mint at the edge of the glass.
instructions: Hand shake, the lime juice from 1 lime should be squeezed into the shaker. Pour over crushed ice and garnish with half of the lime shell inside the drink and float a sprig of fresh mint at the edge of the glass.

name: Original Margarita
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass, garnish with a lime or lemon slice, and serve.

name: Original Old Fashioned
instructions: Pour the sugar, bitters and water into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well until dissolved. Pour over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass, and stir in the bourbon whiskey. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Original Sin
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except champagne and fruit) over six crushed ice cubes in a brandy snifter or goblet. Stir contents, and add slices of fruit (orange, lemon and lime). Top with champagne, and serve.

name: Orlando Amethyst
instructions: Stir the gin and chambord raspberry liqueur together in a cocktail shaker. Add the pineapple juice and shake well. Serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Ortensia
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Orville's-Gasm
instructions: Place a few icecubes in a cocktail shaker. Add each ingredient in its respective amount. Leave the ice in the glass once poured into the cocktail glass (don't strain). Sit back and enjoy Orville's-Gasm.

name: Osaka Dry
instructions: Pour the vodka and sake into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a picked plum, and serve.

name: Oscar Cocktail
instructions: Add ingredients to a snifter filled with ice. Garnish with an orange wedge and a stemmed cherry.

name: Oueureum
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel and a cherry.

name: Our Stanley
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Outrigger

name: Ovaltini

name: Owdham Edge

name: Oxymoron
instructions: Maintain the vodka and juice at room temperature. Mix in an old-fashioned glass, and add the honey. The honey will sink to the bottom. Swirl the drink more or less to vary the amount of honey dissolved.

name: Oyama
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Oz Dust
description: An apple-cinnamon flavored drink with a gold and ice sparkle.Pour both schnapps' and vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake until bruised. Strain into a Champagne saucer or martini cocktail glass. Top off with 7-up or Sprite.
instructions: Pour both schnapps' and vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake until bruised. Strain into a Champagne saucer or martini cocktail glass. Top off with 7-up or Sprite.

name: Ozone #2

name: P & P

name: P'tit Caribou

name: Pacific Wet Dream
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked ice, and serve.

name: Pacifica
instructions: Stir in a shaker with ice and strain into a glass.

name: Pacifist
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Paco Mix
instructions: In a beer mug add ice, lemon and salt, then add the beer, stir a bit, add the tabasco sauce and the worcestershire sauce. Finally add the tequila and vodka.

name: Padas Battery
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Padas Passoa
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Paddy Cocktail
